column3: THE 1st LITHIUM-ION BATTERY RECYCLING MICROFACTORY IN ASIA
column7: We are excited to launch Asia’s first scalable smart lithium-ion battery recycling Microfactory, featuring our proprietary Nano-I technology, advanced AI, and robotics for efficient metal extraction, separation, and purification. Our compact Microfactory occupies a small footprint of 20 sqm for processing 200 kg to 120 sqm for up to 5 tons of lithium-ion batteries daily. This modular system is designed for placement at battery sources or with consumer electronics manufacturers, enabling a closed-loop approach to material use. The high-quality outputs include lithium carbonate, cobalt sulfate, and nickel—essential materials for new battery production. 我们很高兴推出亚洲首个可扩展的智能锂离子电池回收微工厂，该工厂采用我们专有的 Nano-I 技术、先进的 AI 和机器人技术，实现高效的金属提取、分离和纯化。 我们的微工厂占地面积仅为 200 平方米至 120 平方米，每天可处理多达 5 吨锂离子电池。该模块化系统设计用于放置在电池源或消费类电子产品制造商处，实现闭环材料使用方法。高质量的产出包括碳酸锂、硫酸钴和镍——这些都是新电池生产所需的必要原料。

column3: Aereve, ranked top RegTech Company globally, enhances AML/KYC compliance using patented multilingual technology, reducing false positives for BFSI.
column7:
Project description: Aereve has been recognized as #1 leading RegTech New Company globally by StartUs Insights. The company specializes in enhancing anti-money laundering (AML) and know-your-customer (KYC) compliance through its innovative patented technology that handles multilingual data. This unique capability allows Aereve to effectively manage non-Latin languages, which is essential in today’s globalized financial landscape. Integrated within a sophisticated analytics platform, Aereve’s solutions cater to financial institutions, virtual asset service providers, and enterprises. By leveraging both on-chain and off-chain analytics, Aereve provides a comprehensive suite of RegTech, SupTech, and Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) solutions. One of the key advantages of Aereve’s technology is its ability to significantly reduce false positives during name and transaction screening processes. This not only streamlines compliance efforts but also enhances operational efficiency for organizations. Aereve’s commitment to innovation and excellence positions it as a crucial partner for businesses seeking to navigate the complexities of regulatory requirements in an increasingly digital and interconnected world. Through its advanced solutions, Aereve aims to empower organizations to maintain compliance while minimizing the risks and costs associated with regulatory failures. 專案說明： Aereve 被 StartUs Insights 評選為全球第一大領先的 RegTech 新公司。該公司專精於透過其可處理多語言資料的創新專利技術，強化反洗錢 (AML) 和瞭解您的客戶 (KYC) 的合規性。這項獨特的功能讓 Aereve 可以有效管理非拉丁語系的資料，這在今日全球化的金融環境中是非常重要的。
Aereve 的解決方案整合於精密的分析平台，可滿足金融機構、虛擬資產服務供應商和企業的需求。透過利用鏈上和鏈下分析，Aereve 提供了一套全面的 RegTech、SupTech 以及環境、社會與治理 (ESG) 解決方案。
Aereve 技術的主要優勢之一是能夠大幅降低姓名和交易篩選過程中的誤判。這不僅簡化了合規工作，還提高了企業的運營效率。Aereve 致力於創新和卓越，是企業在日益數位化和互聯化的世界中應對複雜的監管要求的重要合作夥伴。通過先進的解決方案，Aereve 旨在使企業在保持合規性的同時，最大限度地降低與監管失敗相關的風險和成本。

column3: welcome to know about wealth management
column7: AIA (AIA Group Limited) in Hong Kong AIA in Hong Kong is a leading life insurance and financial services organization. AIA offers a wide range of insurance products such as life insurance, critical illness insurance, and retirement plans. These products provide financial protection for individuals and their families. For example, life insurance can ensure that in the event of the policyholder's death, the beneficiaries receive a sum of money to maintain their living standards and cover financial obligations like mortgages and educational expenses. In terms of wealth management, it plays a crucial role. Wealth Management Importance • Long - term Financial Security: Wealth management helps Hong Kong residents plan for their long - term financial goals. With the high cost of living and an aging population, it's essential to have a proper strategy to ensure a stable financial future. For instance, through investment - linked insurance plans, people can accumulate wealth over time to support their retirement life. • Asset Diversification: In a volatile global economic environment, AIA's wealth management services assist clients in diversifying their assets. Hong Kong is an international financial center, and investors have access to a variety of investment vehicles such as stocks, bonds, and funds. By spreading investments across different asset classes, the risk of significant losses due to the poor performance of a single investment can be reduced. • Tax - efficient Planning: Wealth management also takes into account tax - efficient strategies. Hong Kong has its own tax regime, and through proper planning, clients can optimize their tax liabilities. For example, some insurance - based wealth management products offer tax - deferred benefits, allowing clients to grow their wealth more effectively. • Inheritance and Estate Planning: For families in Hong Kong, wealth management is vital for inheritance and estate planning. AIA can provide solutions to ensure a smooth transfer of assets to the next generation. This may include setting up trust - based insurance plans to protect family wealth and distribute it according to the client's wishes.

column3: Climate Change Mitigation by decomposing Greenhouse Gas and VOC of open space by coating on surfaces
column7: Atmospheric pollution is a new problem faced by mankind in just one hundred years after industrialization. It is also one of the most serious basic survival problems. Among them, greenhouse gas (GHGs) emission reduction has been a key issue related to the survival of human beings. The climate anomaly caused by global warming has seriously threatened the survival of human beings. On top of that, the nitrogen oxide (NOx) pollution brought by human activities not only form acid rain in the air to corrode our cities, but also form smog in the air to corrode our lungs and body. In addition to improving the efficiency of industrial emissions to reduce industrial emissions and increase forest area, this project hope to bring some unique and valuable solutions to these world problems with our innovative air purification technology on surfaces. 大气污染是人类在工业化后一百年内面临的新问题。这也是最严重的基本生存问题之一。其中，温室气体 （GHG） 减排一直是与人类生死存亡相关的一个关键问题。全球变暖造成的气候异常严重威胁着人类的生存。最重要的是，人类活动带来的氮氧化物（NOx）污染不仅在空气中形成酸雨腐蚀着我们的城市，而且在空气中形成烟雾腐蚀着我们的肺和身体。除了提高工业排放的效率以减少工业排放量和增加森林面积外，该项目还希望通过我们创新的空气净化技术为这些世界问题带来一些独特而有价值的解决方案。

Founded in 1994, Allied Environmental Consultants Limited is a Hong Kong based pioneer sustainability and environmental consulting firm, striving to provide one-stop on-demand services for our clients covering five business areas, including (a) Green and Healthy Building; (b) Acoustics, Audiovisual, Lighting and Theatre Planning; (c) Environmental Consultancy and Sustainable Design; (d) Green Finance, Sustainability Strategies and ESG; and (e) Smart and Green Internet of Things (IoT). Our holding company, Allied Sustainability and Environmental Consultants Group Limited (“AEC Group”; Stock Code: 8320), is the first listed sustainability and environmental consultancy service provider in Hong Kong.
Today, AEC Group is an award-winning sustainability and environmental consulting firm with an extensive portfolio spanning Hong Kong, mainland China and the Asia Pacific region. We strive to offer independent and professional advice to our clients, positively transform the environment and communities, and shape a sustainable future for the world. Our projects cover (i) residential buildings including public and private housings; (ii) commercial buildings including office buildings, plaza, data centre and mixed usage building; and (iii) public usage building and infrastructure including academic buildings, government complex, district cooling system, football pitch, public library, public transport interchange, hospital and swimming pool. We have established a stable and long-term relationship with our clients.

column3: Unlocking profit opportunities with deep AI segmentation  |  使用深度人工智能分割解锁盈利机会
column7: amplifair offers a transformative AI-driven platform that revolutionizes risk modeling and underwriting for insurers. By employing deep AI segmentation techniques, amplifair pinpoints critical loss trends within claim data across P&C commercial and personal lines, as well as life and health insurance portfolios. This capability enables insurers to proactively address inefficiencies and align their strategies more closely with actual risk dynamics. The platform stands out for its ability to deliver actionable insights within just 48 hours, all while requiring no IT integration. Clients can easily feed data into the system through a straightforward CSV file upload, ensuring a seamless user experience. By analyzing anonymized data, amplifair exposes hidden segments that substantially affect insurers' profit and loss statements. These insights empower insurers to refine their policies effectively, leading to substantial improvements in their operational metrics. Insurers working with amplifair have consistently achieved improvements in their loss ratios, often exceeding 10 points.. amplifair 提供了一个改革性的人工智能驱动平台，彻底改变了保险公司的风险建模和承保。通过采用深度人工智能细分技术，amplifair 可以准确定位 P&C 商业和个人险以及人寿和健康保险组合索赔数据中的关键损失趋势。此功能使保险公司能够主动解决效率低下的问题，并使其策略与实际风险动态更加紧密地保持一致。 该平台的突出之处在于能够在短短 48 小时内提供可操作的见解，同时无需 IT 集成。客户可以透过上传CSV 文件将数据轻松输入系统，确保用户体验畅通无阻。通过分析匿名数据，amplifair 揭露了对保险公司损益产生重大影响的隐藏项目。这些见解使保险公司能够有效地改进其政策，从而大幅改善其运营指标。 与 amplifair 合作的保险公司的损失率一直在改善，通常超过 10 个百分点。

For more information: www.andispartners.com Andis Partners 是一家总部位于韩国的风险投资和私募股权公司，覆盖从初创公司、成长阶段企业到并购、收购和特殊情况的全投资领域。 我们的团队由经验丰富的专业人士组成，拥有在全球投行、金融机构及跨境交易方面的深厚专业知识。我们在多个行业领域积累了广泛经验，包括制造业、航空航天、半导体、酒店业等。 作为投资者和值得信赖的并购顾问，我们专注于发掘并发现韩国中小型市场的投资机会，通过战略性投资和定制化解决方案为合作伙伴创造价值。 在 AFF Deal-making 环球投资项目对接期间，我们的目标是与以下对象建立联系： 对韩国投资机会感兴趣的香港及亚洲地区机构投资者和企业 希望通过战略性投资进入韩国市场的公司 寻求跨境合作机会的相关利益方 我们期待与您探讨潜在机会并建立合作伙伴关系。 更多信息，请访问：www.andispartners.com

column3: ApexCarbon Limited
column7: The scope of ESG is covering a wide range of subjects. If we deep dive into the KPIs required by exchanges, most of the KPIs are related to environmental impact. Precisely, more than 50% KPIs are regarding energy use and wastes treatment. Emission comes from hydrocarbon energy. Company emissions cannot simply be wiped out by purchasing carbon credits for abatement. It is known that emissions stay in the atmosphere for 300-1000 years, whereas a tree can sequester CO2 for several decades. The only way to mitigate companies’ climate impacts is to reduce emissions by using clean energy. Clean energy can be sourced from hydrogen. Green hydrogen energy is best alternative for companies’ emission reduction. The beauty of it would be zero emission throughout production to consumption. However, there may be structural changes, despite of cost effectiveness, for the transition from hydrocarbon energy to hydrogen. It is important that some of the areas around the world (e.g. Hong Kong) cannot 100% shift from hydrocarbon to clean energy in a short period of time. For instance, to meet with 1.5oC target, carbon credits are the effective tools during the transition. Understanding carbon offsets has proven to be a difficult task if the companies are not an expert in the field. Carbon credits in voluntary market has been established for years and riddled with greenwashing, to make a difference, the company is encouraged to co-invest into nature-based solutions, including conservation of existing forest, reforestation, soil carbon, biochar and blue carbon. These types of nature-based carbon credits have been received global recognition and best fit for companies’ unavoidable emission with demonstrated true climate impact . This also allow projects to be financed by issuing carbon credits from quantifying carbon removals.

column7: ArborChat, AI for Finance & Investment ArborChat is an Al-driven financial intelligence platform designed to empower institutions with real-time insights, advanced analytics, and streamlined decision-making capabilities. Built on Arbor's robust LLM system design and Enhanced Retrieval-Augmented Generation, ArborChat transforms the complex world of finance into accessible and actionable knowledge. With a conversational chatbot interface, flexible APls, and an intuitive Excel Add-in, ArborChat seamlessly integrates into existing workflows, enabling individuals to accomplish tasks that previously demanded entire teams. From portfolio optimization and comprehensive risk assessments to strategic market forecasts and dynamic sentiment analysis, ArborChat adapts to a variety of financial contexts and organizational scales. By combining powerful Al-driven techniques with deep industry expertise, ArborChat helps businesses optimize performance, manage risk, and elevate operational efficiency. Whether you're a boutique advisory firm or a global banking institution, ArborChat fosters collaboration, speeds data-driven decisions, and paves the way for sustainable growth in an ever-evolving market. Through ArborChat, financial innovation flourishes. ArborChat是Al驅動的金融智慧平台，結合Arbor先進LLM與強化RAG技術，以即時分析與深入洞察協助機構優化投資決策。其多種介面，包括聊天機器人、API、Excel Add-in 方便使用，讓個人能夠完成原需團隊才能執行的複雜分析任務。從投資組合優化、風險評估到市場情緒分析，ArborChat全面提升效率與靈活度，協助金融業者在瞬息萬愛的市場中把握機遇，成就永續成長。ArborChat亦與多家金融機構合作，確保系統合規與數據安全，合力推動投資創新。

column3: TEGnology, devices converting wasted heat into power to supply the next generation of IoT devices and renewable energy infrastructure.
column7: TEGnology is a Danish headquartered industry recognised B2B Sustainable Electric Power Solutions provider with a subsidiary in Hong-Kong. As on a global scale, more waste heat is generated by industrial manufacturing than by all renewable energy sources combined, there is a huge opportunity to harness this untapped resource. With a very small team and limited resources, the company has developed 4 products, of which 3 are CE certified and currently being sold in different fields of application including Industrial, Oil & Gas, District Heating, Pharma, Maritime & Defense. The company has seen a dramatic pick-up in client prospect pipeline in 2023 & 2024 and seeks to capitalise on this considerable momentum by expanding its resources and capabilities. Having passed a critical inflection point, this investment goes directly to rapidly scaling with more clients. The pipeline of over >EUR38 million is only currently constrained by limited outreach. By adding key sales, marketing and distribution staff, adding working capital, and further developing next-generation R&D and application, together with opening a subsidiary in HK and China to decrease production cost and increase scalability the company can significantly accelerate its global market share and revenue generation. TEGnology 是一家总部位于丹麦的备受行业认可 B2B 可持续电力解决方案提供商，在香港设有子公司。在全球范围内，工业制造产生的废热比所有可再生能源的总和还要多，因此利用这一未开发资源的机会巨大。该公司拥有一支很小的团队和有限的资源，开发了 4 种产品，其中 3 种已通过 CE 认证，目前在工业、石油和天然气、区域供暖、制药、海事和国防等不同应用领域销售。该公司在2023年和2024年的客户前景项目中的采用率急剧上升，并寻求通过扩大其资源和能力来把握这一相当大的势头。这项投资通过了一个关键的转折点，直接扩展到更多客户。超过 > 3800 万欧元的管道目前仅受到有限外展活动的限制。通过增加主要销售、营销和分销人员、增加营运资金、进一步开发下一代研发和应用，以及在香港和中国开设子公司，降低生产成本并提高可扩展性，该公司可以显著加快其全球市场份额和创收。

column3: The Next Generation of Aerial Sports Entertainment
column7: Introduction: We are introducing a cutting-edge evolution in aerial sports entertainment, poised to revolutionise the world of competitive flying. Building upon the thrilling legacy of past air racing events, our reimagined concept combines high-speed aerial acrobatics with state-of-the-art technology and a focus on sustainability. This document outlines our vision to create a global spectacle that will captivate audiences, showcase host cities, and push the boundaries of aviation technology. Overview: ●  Building on the legacy of Red Bull Air Races (2003-2019) ●  94 championship races held globally, attracting 230 million viewers in 187 countries ●  Some cities like Rio de Janeiro and Porto drew over 1 million spectators per race weekend Key Objectives: 1. Establish new host city calendar Increase host city fees Secure global and local sponsorships Enhance content streaming and broadcast rights Integrate music/festival elements Promote green and ESG credentials Vision: ●  To become the "F1 of the skies" ●  Push boundaries of modern air racing ●  Showcase latest developments in Green Power and Advanced Aerial Mobility Benefits for Host Cities: ●  Showcase city to a global audience ●  Boost tourism cost-effectively ●  Generate additional revenue ●  Participate in an innovative, world-class sporting event New Racing Entity: ●  Developed infrastructure and race teams ●  Acquired race track equipment ●  Secured worldwide TV distribution agreements ●  Finalised partnerships in TV Production, ●  Telemetry, and Aviation sectors Future Developments: ●  New race categories: EVTOL (electrical vertical take-off and landing) and Jetpacks ●  Expansion into Gamification, E-Sports, and Metaverse Business Model: ●  6 race cities in first 2 years, expanding to 8+ subsequently ●  Host city fees: 20 million USD per event (staged payments) ●  Cities retain revenues from ticketing, F&B, and local sponsorship ●  Profit sharing from TV and media revenue Capital Requirements: ●  Seeking strategic operational partner ●  Ideal model: Partner brings 2 race events in key cities at $25 million each ●  Partner receives 15% stake in new racing company ●  Initial company valuation projected at over $300 million

column3: Floating Solar Farm 16MW Price to take over US.$17 million  |  浮动太阳能农场 16MW 转让价：1700万美元
column7:
Project Details: Private PPA Floating Solar 16MW Project Contract Remaining: 29 years • Electricity Selling Price: 2.3832 THB per unit (before VAT) • Investment Cost: 560 million THB • Solar Panel Degradation Rate: 0.04% per year • Year 1 Electricity Production: 23,862,000 kWh • O&M Costs: 150,000 THB per MW per year Project Benefits: • The IRR for the project is approximately 8.87% demonstrates stable returns for investment in renewable energy. • The project will break even in year 11 is reasonable for a large-scale energy project. • The net profit at the end of the project is approximately 969,516,146.00 THB Net profit 969,516,146.00 THB by the end of the project shows potential for longterm revenue generation. 项目详情： 私营购电协议 (PPA)  浮动太阳能项目规模：16MW 合同剩余期限：29年 •电价：每单位电费 2.3832 泰铢（未含增值税） •投资成本：5.6亿泰铢 •太阳能板年衰减率：0.04% •第一年发电量：23,862,000 千瓦时 •运行与维护成本：每年每MW 150,000 泰铢 项目收益： •内部收益率大约是8.87%，展现出可再生能源投资的稳定回报。
•对于一个大型能源项目来说，项目在第 11 年实现收支平衡是合理的
•项目期末净利润约为969,516,146.00泰铢
•项目结束时的净利润为 969,516,146.00 泰铢，显示出长期创收潜力。

column3: EV Rental & Charging Station   电动汽车租赁和充电站
column7: For Investment in the Electric Vehicle (EV) Car Rental and Charging Station Business in Thailand This proposal focuses on investment in the electric vehicle (EV) rental business, offering various vehicle types such as sedans, SUVs, MPVs, vans, buses, heavy-duty trucks, and other vehicle categories. A financial feasibility analysis has been conducted based on target customers, including private companies, government agencies, and state enterprises. The analysis is structured around cost and budget considerations as outlined below: Costs 1. The cost of purchasing EVs for rental purposes. 2. Handover fees on the date of vehicle handover to customers. 3. Insurance premiums and maintenance costs over six years. 4. The cost of spare vehicles in case of breakdowns or during repairs. 5. The cost of replacing tires and shock absorbers. 6. Vehicle registration renewal fees, including road tax and mandatory insurance (พ.ร.บ.) for six years. Investor Revenue 1. Interest income throughout six years, calculated at a fixed rate of 2.5% per annum. 2. Revenue from the resale of vehicles after the lease contract ends, estimated at 100,000–150,000 THB per vehicle as 6 year and 5 year of rental contract. 3. Monthly rental income for the entire six-year lease term. 关于在泰国投资电动汽车（EV）租赁和充电站业务的建议书 本建议书重点是关注电动汽车（EV）租赁业务的投资，提供各种类型的汽车，如轿车、运动型多用途汽车、多用途汽车、面包车、巴士、重型卡车和其他类型的车辆。根据目标客户（包括私营公司、政府机构和国有企业）进行了财务可行性分析。分析围绕成本和预算方面的考虑因素展开，概述如下： 成本 1. 为租赁目的而购买电动汽车的成本。 2. 向客户移交车辆之日的移交费用。 3. 六年内的保险费和维护费用。 4. 发生故障或维修期间的备用车辆费用。 5. 更换轮胎和减震器的费用。 6. 车辆登记续费，包括路税和六年的强制保险（พ.ร.บ.）。 投资者收入 1. 六年的利息收入，按固定年利率 2.5% 计算。 2. 租赁合同结束后转售车辆的收入，按 6 年和 5 年租赁合同计算，每辆车估值为 100,000-150,000 泰铢。 3. 整个 6 年租赁期的月租金收入。

With the vision to foster passionate, self-directed learners, we work with global STEAM academia and industry experts to provide experiential and transformative learning experience. Since inception in 2020, our programmes have reached over 25,000 students across Hong Kong, Singapore, Taiwan and the US. Big Bang Academy 是一家教育科技公司，重新定义3-16岁儿童学习科学和技术的方式。我们的愿景是培养充满热情、自主学习的学习者，与全球的STEAM学术界和行业专家合作，提供体验式和变革性的学习体验。自2020年成立以来，我们的课程已经惠及超过25,000名来自香港、新加坡、台湾和美国的学生。

column3: BioMed specializes in bioinformatics and is dedicated to promoting precise and personalized microbiome-based interventions.
column7: "BioMed Technology Holdings Limited, a startup nurtured by Hong Kong Science Park, was founded by a group of CUHK professors and alumni. The company specializes in bioinformatics and is dedicated to promoting precise and personalized microbiome-based interventions. Up to now, BioMed has successfully built a microbiome database comprising over 10,000 data points gathered from diverse regions across Asia. This valuable database continues to grow and serves as a promising cornerstone for the company's future R&D endeavors. Commercially, BioMed has established collaborations with over 200 healthcare service providers in Hong Kong and directly markets its products to consumers through more than 260 retail outlets under the PGut Brand. Furthermore, the company has also expanded its operations to Macau, Mainland China, and Thailand. BioMed has raised funds from Alibaba Hong Kong Entrepreneurs Fund (AEF), Gobi Partners GBA, CUHK Innovation Fund, The International Medical Co. Ltd. (TIMC) and Human Health Holdings Limited (1419.HK)." "生物医学科技控股有限公司(BioMed)是香港科学园培育的公司，由中大教授 及校友创立。该公司专长于生物信息学，研发以微生物为本的精准、个人化 健康管理方案。 目前，BioMed 已在亚洲收集超过 10,000 多个微生物数据。商业上，BioMed 已与香港超过 200 家医疗服务供应商合作，并在 260 多个零售销售点售卖其 PGut 准肠康产品。公司已将业务扩展至澳门、中国内地和泰国。 BioMed 已获阿里巴巴香港创业基金、戈壁创投大湾区、香港中文大学创新 Page 6 of 6 基金、全球药业有限公司和盈健医疗（1419.HK）的资金。"

column3: AI-Powered Compliance Software for Financial Advisors
column7: Seven months ago, we launched an AI-powered compliance and all-in-one practice management solution for financial advisors (especially the one focused on Life and health insurance), transforming how advisors conduct business. Our product is gaining continuous traction, helping insurance companies and distributors monitor advisors effortlessly. Designed with simplicity, it aligns with upcoming regulatory requirements. If you're interested in joining us as we expand into the U.S. market and being part of our upcoming seed funding, let's connect via LinkedIn or AFF Deal-making 2025. 七个月前，我们面向财务顾问（尤其是关注生命和健康保险的财务顾问）推出了 AI 支持的合规和一体化实践管理解决方案，改变了顾问行使业务的方式。我们的产品正变得愈发流行，持续帮助保险公司和分销商轻松监管各个顾问。这一产品设计旨在简洁，与即将到来的监管要求保持一致。如果您有兴趣加入我们，助力我们扩张进入美国市场，加入我们即将到来的种子轮融资，请通过 LinkedIn 或 AFF 交易会 2025 联系我们。

column3: Project Livestock
column7:
Project Livestock is a leader in Australia’s livestock nutrient supplementation, by providing market-leading precision dosing systems that use a farm’s existing water infrastructure to deliver protein and vital nutrients, that automate and optimise livestock supplementing for farmers.
The Company achieved 163% revenue growth over the past 3 years with the revenue expected to exceed $7.7m this financial year and the Company realised a positive EBITDA in FY24.
BlueMount Capital is mandated to assist Project Livestock with raising up to $5,000,000 in equity to validate methane reduction methods and monetise the generation of carbon credits, accelerate growth into international markets, enhance our technology offerings, expand the product portfolio and support further R&D into AI solutions for farm operations. 畜牧业项目是澳大利亚畜牧业营养补充领域的领导者，提供市场领先的精确配量系统，利用农场现有的水基础设施提供蛋白质和重要营养，为农民自动化和优化畜牧业补充。
该公司在过去 3 年实现了 163% 的收入增长，本财年的收入预计将超过 770 万美元，并且公该司在 2024 财年实现了正 EBITDA。
BlueMount Capital 的任务是协助Project Livestock通过股权融资筹集高达 5,000,000美元，以验证甲烷减排方法并将碳信用的产生货币化，加速在国际市场实现增长，改善我们的技术产品，扩大产品组合，并支持进一步研发用于农场运营的 AI 解决方案。

column3: Project Doceo
column7: Project Doceo is a software company with a recurring SaaS revenue model, that provides workforce skills and training management for asset-intensive and highly regulated industries. The Company’s platform provides software functionality across the entire process: ➢ Project resourcing and skills management; ➢ Mobilisation and onboarding; ➢ Training and competency assessment management; ➢ Certification, authorisation, and site access; ➢ Site compliance and skills development; ➢ Use of innovative technology such as online/offline mobile apps and virtual reality (VR). Funding Strategies has been appointed to assist Project Doceo in looking for a strategic partner and an investor to grow its current operations and take advantage of adjacent market opportunities, including overseas growth. Key Highlights: ● SaaS software business model, once scale is reached ($2m revenue) gross profit margin is forecasted to be very high at 85%+; ● Providing a product for a known business problem that enterprises have an increasing appetite to resolve given the severe skills shortage; ● Once installed, the product is very sticky because it is embedded in core business processes – delivering a reliable and consistent revenue stream; ● Projected revenue growth is over 100% year-on-year for three years from 2025; ● Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) is projected at 70% of total revenue; ● Strategic opportunity to leverage existing capabilities of an investor and expedite profitable business growth; ● Right product for the current market with both sector extension options and geographic expansion options. Project Doceo 是一家软件公司，拥有经常性 SaaS 收入模式，为资产密集型和受高度监管的行业提供劳动力技能和培训管理。 该公司的平台在整个流程中提供软件功能： ➢ 项目资源和技能管理； ➢ 动员和入职； ➢ 培训和能力评估管理； ➢ 认证、授权和现场访问； ➢ 现场合规和技能发展； ➢ 使用创新技术，如在线/离线移动应用程序和虚拟现实 (VR)。 已指定融资策略，以协助Project Doceo 寻找战略性合作伙伴和投资者，以发展其当前业务并利用邻近的市场机会（包括海外增长）。 主要亮点： ● SaaS软件商业模式，一旦达到规模（200万美元收入），毛利率预计会非常高，达到85%以上； ● 针对已知业务问题提供产品。鉴于严重技能短缺，各企业越来越愿意解决； ● 一旦安装，该产品就具有非常强的粘性，因为它嵌入到核心业务流程中 - 从而提供可靠且始终如一的收入流； ●自2025年起三年内，收入预计会同比增长100%以上； ● 年经常性收入 (ARR) 预计占总收入的 70%； ● 具有利用投资者现有能力并加快盈利业务增长的战略机会； ● 产品适合当前市场，具有行业扩展选项和地域扩展选项。

column3: Project Luxury Homes
column7: Project Luxury Homes is an Australian company that specializes in crafting high-end luxury homes and providing end-to-end services to clients. The Company’s teams consist of design, construction, and client engagement personnel to provide home building solutions from the initial design stages through to final completion and handover. The Company is raising up to $2,000,000 in return for approx. 30% equity in the Company to fund an increase in working capital to support business activities and increase speed of projects, staff to expand and take on more projects, as well as to strengthen brand and marketing by bringing on more referral partners. The Company is also seeking up to $8,000,000 for a joint venture development, utilising the current infrastructure of DGP to build and sell high-end residential homes. Key Highlights: ● Strong reputation in delivering high quality luxury homes on time and on budget; ● Current project portfolio is worth $15.3m with a projected profit of approx. $3.18m; ● The Company has a pipeline of new projects worth approx. $21m. ● EBITDA is expected to be positive in FY24/25 due to onboarding of more clients and reducing costs; ● Outsourcing costings resulting in projects being on average 7-8% under budget; ● Introduction of a ‘cost plus’ contract for clients deemed to have a higher risk based on the project (usually renovations); ● Implemented a new project management software, that improves the oversight of projects for the Company and customer. Project Luxury Homes 是澳大利亚的一家公司，专门从事高端豪华住宅的建造，并为客户提供端到端服务。该公司的团队由设计、施工和客户服务人员组成，提供从最初设计阶段到最终完成和移交的住宅建筑解决方案。 该公司正在以该公司约 30% 的股权筹集至多 2,000,000 美元，为增加营运资本提供支持，加快项目速度，增加员工数量和让员工承担更多项目，并通过引入更多合作伙伴来加强品牌和营销。 该公司还寻求募集至多 8,000,000 美元用于合资项目开发，利用DGP目前的基础设施来建造和销售高端住宅。 主要亮点： ● 在按时、按预算交付优质豪华住宅方面享有盛誉； ● 当前项目组合价值 1,530 万美元，预计利润约为 318 万美元； ● 该公司拥有价值约 2,100 万美元的新项目待完成。 ● 由于有更多客户加入和成本降低，2024/2025财年的EBITDA 预计为正值； ● 把成本外包，导致项目平均比预算低 7-8%； ● 为根据项目（通常是翻修）被视为具有较高风险的客户引入“成本加成”合同； ● 实施了新的项目管理软件，以为公司和客户改善了对项目的监督。

column3: Project Rum
column7: Project Rum 'is an industry leader holding first mover advantage as Australia's only pure-play craft rum distillery.' Commissioning its own urban distillery in 2018, the Company has established an efficient operating model supported by a strong management and advisory team providing comprehensive corporate governance achieving year on year revenue growth of more than 60% up to FY23. Project Rum is seeking to raise $4,500,000 over three phases from sophisticated investors as either debt or equity. Funds raised will be used to build inventory, accelerate distribution and promote the brand. Key Highlights: ● Ingredients for Success: Project Rum has assembled a strong management &advisory team, garnering numerous product awards from world-recognized competitions, validating the exceptional quality of its product. ● Competitive Strength: With a minimum 2-year maturation period and holding140,000 LALs of rum under maturation, Project Rum is in a strong position to establish itself as the standout leader in the market among few direct competitors ● High Exit Multiples: Supported by its competitive strengths, exit multiples for dark spirit brands can far exceed industry average. Having established ourselves as a market leader, Project Rum has the potential to present an exciting acquisition prospect for a major industry player delivering a significant ROI. Project Rum是行业领导者，作为澳大利亚唯一一家纯粹的精酿朗姆酒酿酒厂，具有先发优势。 该公司于 2018 年试运行自己的城市酿酒厂，建立了高效的运营模式，由强大的管理和咨询团队提供支持，具有全面的企业治理，截至 2023 年的收入同比增长超过 60%。 Project Rum 正寻求分三个阶段通过债务融资或股权融资从成熟投资者那里筹集4,500,000 美元。筹集的资金将用于建立库存、加快分销和推广品牌。 主要亮点： ● 成功要素：Project Rum 组建了一支强大的管理和咨询团队，从世界公认的比赛中夺得众多产品奖项，这验证了其产品的卓越质量。 ● 竞争优势：拥有至少 2 年的成熟期，并在成熟期持有 140,000 LAL 的朗姆酒。Project Rum在只有少数直接竞争对手的市场中脱颖而出，成为领导者。 ● 高退出倍数：凭借竞争优势，黑烈酒品牌的退出倍数远远超过行业平均水平。作为市场领导者，Project Rum 有可能为一家主要的行业参与者带来令人兴奋的收购前景，从而实现重大的投资回报。

column3: Project Trading
column7: Project Trading is an Australian technology company that develops world-class solutions to replace obsolete technology, systems and processes to make financial markets more efficient (ie better and cheaper). Project Trading’s core IP is its proprietary back end, cloud-based, data caching and compression engine, to simplify the aggregation of any market data, from any source to facilitate real time, two-way livestream to/from unlimited devices, which in turn creates the potential for exponential low-cost scaling. The Company has two distinct business units/strategies operating concurrently: • Technology (wholesale/B2B/SaaS); • Broking (retail/B2C). Key Highlights: • De-risked, world class, revenue generating proprietary technology; • Dual path to growth and scale: o Retail (B2C) ▪ Proven ability to compete for market share against the largest competitors; ▪ Proven media channel-partner customer acquisition strategy; o Wholesale (B2B, SaaS) ▪ the only ready-made replacement for incumbent technology ; ▪ Readily identifiable clients with obvious need for our technology; ▪ Unlimited capacity for exponential growth; ▪ Unique IP position; • Clear path to IPO; previously demonstrated visibility uplift post-IPO; • Numerous potential corporate investment/acquisition prospects • Low market cap relative to peers; • Unique profitability profile. Project Trading 是澳大利亚的一家科技公司，致力于开发世界级的解决方案，以便取代过时的技术、系统和流程，使金融市场更加高效（即更好、更便宜）。 Project Trading的核心知识产权是其专有的后端、基于云的数据缓存和压缩引擎，可以简化来自任何来源的任何市场数据的聚合，以促进无限设备进行实时双向直播，这反过来又创造了无限低成本扩张的可能性。 该公司有两个不同的业务单位/战略： • 技术（批发/B2B/SaaS）； • 经纪（零售/B2C）。 主要亮点： • 无风险、世界级、创收的专有技术； • 实现增长和规模的双重途径： o 零售 （B2C） ▪ 已证明有能力与最大的竞争对手竞争市场份额； ▪ 成熟的媒体渠道合作伙伴客户获取策略； o 批发（B2B、SaaS） ▪ 现有技术的唯一现成替代品； ▪ 易于识别且明显需要我们技术的客户； ▪ 无限制的指数级增长能力； ▪ 独特的知识产权优势； • 明确的 IPO 途径；此前已证明 IPO 后知名度提升； • 众多潜在的企业投资/收购前景 • 相对于同行而言市值低； • 独特的盈利能力概况。

column3: Project HQB
column7: Project HQB is an Australian specialty wholesale bakery producing high-quality baked stone baked organic sourdough and artisan flatbreads. The Company operates through a unique business model, selling direct to end user, via national supermarket chains and via regional distributors. This includes supplying products under their brands, as well as its own label products for distributors such as Metcash, Costco, ALDI, Grill’d Burgers and many more recognised outlets throughout Australia. Utilising the latest technology, customers can place their daily orders on-line or via an app with delivery occurring the next day, seven days a week. Customers can pay directly on-line at time of order, reducing cash handling and risk of default. Project HQB’s production facilities use the latest technology to ensure, wherever possible, the automation of its processes. Whilst the nature of its product is primarily a handmade artisan bakery offering, the Company use automation efficiencies wherever possible. Investor Highlights: ➢ The Company’s products are available to wholesale and food service customers across Australia in frozen, thaw-serve and par-baked options. ➢ Operates out of a state-of-the-art artisan bakery facility, to bake artisan breads cost effectively to supply frozen to supermarkets and foodservice customers around Australia. ➢ The Company operates a highly efficient, single production line with capacity to add a further two production lines within the existing facility. ➢ The business has each of the three major Australian supermarkets as customers, Coles, Aldi and Woolworths. ➢ The business has a large number of potential growth opportunities in existing markets / customers as well as with new customers (including export). HQB 项目是一家澳大利亚特色批发面包店，生产优质烘焙石烤有机酸面包和手工扁面包。 该公司通过独特的商业模式运营，通过全国连锁超市和区域分销商直接向最终用户销售。这包括以自有品牌供应产品，以及为 Metcash、Costco、ALDI、Grill’d Burgers 等经销商和遍布澳大利亚的许多知名商店提供贴牌产品。 利用最新技术，客户每天可以在线或通过应用程序下单，第二天即可收到产品。客户可以在订购时直接在线支付，从而降低现金处理和违约风险。 HQB 项目的生产设施使用最新技术，尽可能确保其流程的自动化。虽然其产品的性质主要是手工制作的手工面包店产品，但该公司尽可能使用自动化来提升效率。 投资亮点： ➢ 该公司的产品面向澳大利亚各地的批发和食品服务客户，提供冷冻、解冻和标准烘焙选项。 ➢ 在最先进的手工面包店经营，以经济高效的方式烘焙手工面包，为澳大利亚各地的超市和餐饮服务客户提供冷冻食品。 ➢ 该公司经营着一条高效、单一的生产线，能够在现有工厂内再增加两条生产线。 ➢ 该公司的客户包括澳大利亚三大超市，分别是 Coles、Aldi 和 Woolworths。 ➢ 该公司在现有市场/客户和新客户（包括出口）方面有大量潜在增长机会。

column3: Project Triplex
column7: BlueMount Capital is mandated to assist Project Triplex with raising $200-$250m to acquire regional Australian accommodation properties. Project Triplex provides investors with an opportunity to gain exposure to a diversified portfolio of Australian regional accommodation properties including hotels, motels, resorts and backpacker accommodation. There are no pubs or gaming assets involved. The properties will be actively managed by an experienced and skilled team. The fund seeks to deliver stable quarterly cash distributions and capital gains over time. The target income return range is 8% p.a in the medium term. Project Triplex’ earlier offering has distributed an average annual yield of 8.5% since inception in 2015 to June 20211. The unit price at 30 June 2021 was $1.18 per unit providing investors with an 18% capital gain since inception in addition to the strong distribution profile despite a material Covid impact on trading. ● Project Triplex will invest in similar established and income producing hospitality properties. ● Additional value will be added through its centralised management team and systems. This includes improved marketing, operational management, yield management and tight cost control. ● Project Triplex will also undertake value enhancing capital expenditure by upgrading and expanding portfolio properties, consistent with their 15 year track record. ● Project Triplex’ initial term is 5 years. The Company has a number of alternatives to create liquidity for investors including single property sales following the completion of value-add initiatives or one or more bulk sales delivering a potential portfolio premium. BlueMount Capital 获授权协助 Triplex 项目筹集 2 亿至 2.5 亿美元，以收购澳大利亚的区域性酒店。 Triplex 项目为投资者提供了一个机会，能够投资于一个多样化的澳大利亚区域住宿，其中包括酒店、汽车旅馆、度假村和背包客住宿。其中不会涉及酒吧或博彩资产。 这些房产将由经验丰富和技术熟练的团队进行积极管理。 该基金寻求随着时间的推移实现稳定的季度现金分配和资本收益。中期的目标收益回报率是每年 8%。 从 2015 年启动到 2021 年 6 月，Triplex 项目早前发行的基金的平均年收益率为 8.5%。2021 年 6 月 30 日的单价为 1.18 美元/单位，而且，尽管 Covid 疫情对交易产生了重大影响，但自启动以来，除了强劲的分红状况外，投资者还获得了 18% 的资本收益。 ● Triplex 项目将投资于类似的现有的和产生收入的酒店房产。 ● 将通过其集中管理团队和系统来增加额外价值。这包括改进营销、运营管理、收益管理和严格的成本控制。 ● Triplex 项目还将通过升级和扩大组合中的房产来提高资本支出，从而与他们 15 年的业绩记录保持一致。 ● Triplex 项目的初始期限为 5 年。该公司有多种另类方案来为投资者创造流动性，包括完成增值计划后的单一房产销售，或一次或多次批量销售，用于提供一次潜在的投资组合溢价。

column3: Project Ore
column7: Project Ore is creating a new (initially unlisted) Gold Mining company consolidating the highly prospective historical gold mining region in South Australia by acquiring a nearby operating gold and copper processing facility and initially adding its own project's ore through that facility. An initial strong cashflow is planned together with a long life from adding additional ore from regional stranded old gold mining projects. Management have a track record in operating mines and significant geological knowledge of the region. Key Highlights ● Potential for strong cash flows, low cost mining operations, low capex with large prospective gold asset; ● Potential >$60m net cash from ore processing over 5 years; ● Significant gold production assets; ● Production starts on investments; ● Strong team: CEO has decades of experience in developing gold assets in Australia and across the region, transferring 9 staff in with the aim to immediately establishing an experienced operating team focused on a safe and efficient operation, strong local heap leach operating, mine development and geological/metallurgical experience; ● Use of funds: Acquisitions, development and working capital; ● Potential exit via listco. Project Ore 正在建立一家新的（最初未上市的）金矿开采公司，通过收购附近运营的金铜矿加工厂，并最初通过该工厂增加自有项目矿石，从而巩固南澳大利亚极具潜力的历史悠久金矿开采区。 计划会有强劲的初始现金流，同时利用来自该区域滞留的旧金矿开采项目的额外矿石，从而延长矿山寿命。管理层在运营矿山和深入了解该地区的地质方面拥有良好的记录。 主要亮点 ● 具有强劲现金流、低成本采矿作业、低资本支出和大量有潜力的黄金资产； ● 5 年内矿石加工产生的现金净额 > 6,000 万美元； ● 重要的黄金生产资产； ● 生产始于投资； ● 强大的团队：首席执行官在澳大利亚和整个地区拥有数十年的黄金资产开发经验，调动了 9 名员工，旨在立即建立一支经验丰富的运营团队，专注于安全高效的运营、强大的本地堆浸操作、矿山开发和地质/冶金经验； ● 资金用途：收购、开发和营运资本； ● 可能通过上市退出。

column3: Project Battery
column7: Project Battery is developing a new nickel plant in Western Australia, utilizing the latest processing technology to unlock stranded ore. The Company’s portfolio covers four projects in WA, including nickel-cobalt and lithium. In addition, the Company co-owns an advanced gold exploration tenement. The processing technology offers the following advantages: More tolerant of ore range, lower pressure, lower temperature, less acid and zero waste. Studies indicate that the operation costs will be much lower. BlueMount Capital is mandated to raise $34m; approx. $14m via IPO and $20m+ in debt. The main deliverable from the IPO is planned to be the Preliminary Feasibility Study (PFS) to occur within 18 months of listing. The Company is looking for debt funding of $20m+ to fund the Definitive Feasibility Study (DFS). Opportunity: ➢ Project Battery is an established UK resource company planning a nickel/cobalt plant in WA; ➢ Long term nickel demand is increasing to meet EV needs; ➢ US Government has blocked environmentally challenged Indonesia’s bid to become nickel free-trade partner - applauded by Australian nickel miners; ➢ Australia has joint largest nickel reserves, but production only 10% that of Indonesia; ➢ EIA (US Energy Information Administration) predicts 60 new nickel mines are needed by 2030; ➢ Preliminary economic study completed with favourable economics; ➢ Target production of battery grade nickel-sulphate in 2030; ➢ Best practice Environmental, Social & Governance standards jurisdiction, means accelerated route to production; ➢ The Company’s existing projects all focused on supply of battery metals into US and European EV battery markets; ➢ Additional project is concentrating on lithium exploration; ➢ ASX IPO – H2 2024; IPO raise A$25m; ➢ IPO funds to complete nickel-cobalt project Preliminary Feasibility Study. Project Battery 正在西澳大利亚州建设一座新的镍厂，利用最新的加工技术来解锁滞留矿石的潜力。 该公司的投资组合涵盖西澳大利亚州的四个项目，包括镍钴和锂。此外，该公司还共同拥有一个优质金矿勘探权。 这项加工技术具有以下优势：适合更广的矿石范围、更低压力、更低温度、更少酸和零废弃物。研究表明，运营成本会低得多。 BlueMount Capital 被要求筹集 3,400 万美元；通过 IPO 筹集约 1,400 万美元，通过债务融资筹集超过 2,000 万美元。从IPO筹得的资金打算用于上市后 18 个月内进行的初步可行性研究 (PFS)。该公司正在寻求2000多万美元的债务融资，以便为最终可行性研究(DFS)提供资金。 机会： ➢ Project Battery 是英国的一家成熟的资源公司，计划在西澳大利亚州建设一座镍/钴工厂； ➢ 长期镍需求不断增加，以满足电动汽车需求； ➢美国政府阻止了对环境构成挑战的印度尼西亚成为镍自由贸易伙伴 - 这受到澳大利亚镍矿工人的赞赏； ➢ 澳大利亚拥有最大的联合镍储量，但产量仅为印度尼西亚的10%； ➢ EIA（美国能源信息管理局）预测，到2030年将需要60座新的镍矿山； ➢ 初步经济研究已完成，结果表明具有有利的经济效益。 ➢ 计划在2030年生产出电池级硫酸镍； ➢ 恪守环境、社会和治理标准的最佳实践，这意味着加速投产； ➢ 该公司的现有项目都专注于向美国和欧洲电动汽车电池市场供应电池金属； ➢ 其他项目专注于锂勘探； ➢ 在澳大利亚证券交易所进行 IPO – 2024 年下半年；通过IPO筹集 2,500 万澳元； ➢ 从IPO筹集的资金用于完成镍钴项目初步可行性研究。

column3: Project Mel
column7: Project Mel is monetizing and leveraging the medicinal properties of using organic Jarrah Honey to treat skin conditions such as eczema, dermatitis, nappy rash, burns and wounds effectively and sustainably. It is TGA approved, and all R&D has been completed. The honey is only found in Southwest WA and has antibacterial and antimicrobial properties against many common bacteria and fungi including MRSAs and Staphylococcus Aureus similar to Manuka Honey. Project Mel’s route to market is to sell through distribution partnerships into hospitals, chemists, pharmacies and direct to consumer online. It already has traction in Australia, Hong Kong and the US, selling direct to consumer. The Company is looking to raise between $500k and $1m for 10-25% equity, to seek FDA approval, manufacture more creams, TGA approve new products and engage marketing to drive awareness. Opportunity: ➢ Unique solution to skin conditions requiring antibacterial and antifungal creams without using topical steroids and antibiotics to fight off infection risk. ➢ Up to 70% of all eczema and dermatitis sufferers have ‘golden staph’ on their skin which further inflames the skin and subsequent itch response. ➢ TGA approved (i.e. regulatory approval) and all R&D has been completed. ➢ Disrupting the traditional approaches and traditional treatments. ➢ Satisfies growing demand in hospitals, by chemists and pharmacies around the world as effective treatment for these conditions, expecting to shorten the drain on medical systems and resources. ➢ Post-revenue. 50% profit margin. ➢ The Company is profitable with an annual revenue of almost $500k. Project Mel正在利用有机赤桉蜂蜜的药用特性，有效且可持续地治疗皮肤病，如湿疹、皮炎、尿布疹、烧伤和伤口。已获 TGA 批准，所有研发工作均已完成。 这种蜂蜜仅在西澳大利亚州西南部发现，对许多常见的细菌和真菌具有抗菌和抗微生物特性（包括耐甲氧西林金黄色葡萄球菌是(MRSA)和金黄色葡萄球菌），类似于麦卢卡蜂蜜。 Project Mel的产品上市途径是通过分销合作伙伴关系向医院、药剂师、药房和直接面向在线消费者进行销售。它已经在澳大利亚、香港和美国有吸引力，直接向消费者销售。 该公司希望用10-25%股权筹集50万美元至100万美元，以便寻求FDA批准，制造更多乳膏。TGA批准新产品并参与营销以提高知名度。 机会： ➢ 针对需要抗菌和抗真菌乳膏的皮肤病的独特解决方案，而无需使用局部类固醇和抗生素来抵御感染风险。 ➢ 高达 70% 的湿疹和皮炎患者皮肤上有“金葡萄球菌”，这导致皮肤进一步发炎，随后出现瘙痒反应。 ➢ 已获 TGA 批准（即监管批准）且所有研发工作均已完成。 ➢ 颠覆传统方法和传统治疗。 ➢ 满足世界各地的医院、药剂师和药房的日益旺盛需求，作为这些疾病的有效治疗方法，预计会减少对医疗系统和资源的消耗。 ➢ 收益后 50% 利润率。 ➢ 该公司已盈利，年收入近 50 万美元。

column3: Project Prebiotics
column7: Project Prebiotics is the only global manufacturer of natural prebiotic products derived from sugarcane. The products are for the health and wellness market covering the retail market for human gut health, the equine market (working horses and racehorses) and as an ingredient for food manufacturing. The Company is engaged with global players in the health and wellness market for its products, focused on gut health and the microbiome in humans and horses. Project Prebiotics is raising $800,000 at a subscription price of $0.40 per share through a private placement to professional and sophisticated investors. The Company reserves the right to take oversubscriptions of a further $500,000 in this round. Highlights: ➢ Manufacturing facility 100% owned by Project Prebiotics and operating in Australia. Capacity 1,000,000 kilos per annum, average ingredient sale $40/kg; ➢ Rapid expansion of sales forecast for 2024 / 2025 based on customers sales figures; ➢ Protected process, patented research, globally trademarked branding; ➢ Commercial onboarding of some of the best scientific minds in their field. Project Prebiotics是唯一一家从甘蔗中提取天然益生元产品的全球制造商。这些产品用于健康和保健市场，涵盖人类肠道健康的零售市场、马匹市场（工作马和赛马），并作为成分用于食品生产。 该公司与健康和保健市场的全球参与者合作，专注于肠道健康以及人类和马匹的微生物组。 Project Prebiotics通过向专业投资者和成熟投资者进行私募，以每股0.40美元的认购价格筹集80万美元。 该公司保留在本轮中额外接纳 500,000 美元的超额认购的权利。 亮点： ➢ 生产设施完全由Project Prebiotics所有，并且在澳大利亚运营。产能为1,000,000公斤/年，平均原料销售为 40 美元/公斤； ➢ 根据客户销售数据，2024/2025 年销售预计会飞速增长； ➢ 受保护的流程、专利研究、全球商标品牌； ➢ 已吸引了该领域的一些最优秀科学家入职。

column3: Project Cor
column7: Project Cor is an Australian drug development company committed to increasing the longevity and quality of life for people suffering from Restrictive Cardiomyopathy. The Company is focusing on a novel repurposed orphan drug (orphan means rare diseases without specific drug treatments – heavily subsidized by Governments) that is at clinical stage. Such diseases are some of the most significant causes of Heart Failure — an ailment that heavily impacts on a large spectrum of the cardiovascular disease population. Project Cor is looking to raise $5m for approx. 21.7% equity in the Company at a pre-money valuation of $18m with possible oversubscription. Opportunity: ➢ Repurposed drug in orphan indications (de-risked). ➢ New formulation covered by the Company - Novel Composition of Matter (high value). ➢ Restrictive Cardiomyopathies - areas of major unmet medical need. ➢ Precision Medicine (accelerated pathway). ➢ Proven efficacy and superior to class competitors in Heart Failure (HF). ➢ 15,000 humans recruited in past clinical trials within HF syndrome. ➢ Clinical profile well understood. ➢ Positive Freedom To Operate (FTO). ➢ First in class (MoA) for lead indications – No direct competitor. ➢ The Company has raised $4.7m equity capital to date and receives several Australian Government R&D grants. Project Cor 是澳大利亚的一家药物开发公司，致力于延长限制性心肌病患者的寿命和改善其生活品质。 该公司专注于一种处于临床阶段的新型再利用孤儿药（孤儿药是指没有特定药物治疗的罕见疾病 - 由政府大力资助）。这些疾病是心力衰竭的一些最重要原因 - 心力衰竭严重影响了大量的心血管疾病患者。 Project Cor希望按照 1,800 万美元的投资前估值，以公司约 21.7% 的股权筹集 500 万美元，并可能超额认购。 机会： ➢ 孤儿药适应症方面的再利用药物（无风险）。 ➢ 公司涵盖的新配方 - 新颖的物质成分（高价值）。 ➢ 限制性心肌病 - 主要医疗需求未得到满足的领域。 ➢ 精准医学（加速途径）。 ➢ 在心力衰竭 (HF) 方面具有经证实的疗效并且优于同类竞争对手。 ➢ 过去在 HF 综合征的临床试验中招募了 15,000 人。 ➢ 充分了解临床特征。 ➢ 积极的自由实施(FTO)。 ➢ 首要适应症的首创新药 (MoA) – 无直接竞争对手。 ➢ 迄今为止，该公司已筹集了 470 万美元的股本，并获得了多项澳大利亚政府研发拨款。

column3: Project IHD
column7: Project IHD is an Australian unlisted public company founded in 2004 to develop biopharmaceutical drugs in the immunology space. Project IHD's drug candicate regulates pathogenic inflammatory responses to infection and injury and has great potential across a variety of disease areas. Right now, the Company is focused on testing its efficacy in the fight against motor neurone disease (MND) or amyotrophic lateral sclerosis (ALS), cardioimmunology and all-cause acute respiratory distress syndrome (ARDS). The Company is now raising working capital of $500,000 as part of a $5m funding round to fund 3 key clinical trials to the end of CY2024. Funding can be structured as equity or convertible notes and is open to s708 Qualified Investors only. The closing date for this offer is 30 September 2024. Opportunity: • Key indications being treated are heart failure and cardiomyopathy (resulting from cardiac inflammation and fibrosis). • Developed a drug candidate that regulates inflammatory responses to infection and injury (inflammatory heart diseases). • Commercialising drug platform via Phase 1b patient trials underway in the USA (clinical studies). • Strong IP platform including patents and orphan drug designation. • Project IHD founders have extensive research and commercialization experience. • Plan to exit via trade sale, currently in due diligence with two pharma companies. Project IHD是澳大利亚的一家非上市公众公司，成立于2004年，旨在开发免疫学领域的生物药物。 Project IHD的药物有望调控对感染和损伤的致病性炎症反应，并在各种疾病领域具有巨大的潜力。目前，该公司专注于测试其在对抗运动神经元疾病 (MND) 或肌萎缩性侧索硬化症 (ALS)、心脏病免疫学和全因急性呼吸窘迫综合征 (ARDS) 方面的疗效。 该公司目前正在筹集50万美元的营运资金（作为500万美元融资的一部分），为2024日历年底的3项关键临床试验提供资金。资金可以构建为股票或可转换票据，仅对 s708 合格投资者开放。此要约的截止日期为 2024 年 9 月 30 日。 机会： • 正在治疗的关键适应症是心力衰竭和心肌病（由心脏炎症和纤维化引起）。 • 开发了一种有望调节对感染和损伤的炎症反应（炎症性心脏病）的药物。 • 通过在美国进行的 1b 期患者试验（临床研究）将药物平台商业化。 • 强大的 IP 平台，包括专利和孤儿药指定。 • Project IHD 创始人拥有丰富的研究和商业化经验。 • 打算通过交易销售退出，目前正在与两家制药公司进行尽职调查。

column3: Project Shopping Centre
column7: Project Shopping Centre is an opportunity to invest in a property development located in Adelaide. Subject to raising sufficient funds from Investors via the issue of Units, the Trustee intends to acquire preference shares in the Developer and enter into an agreement with existing shareholders. The Developer will have in place a Project Development Agreement (PDA) with the Land Holder that has acquired the Subject Property in December 2023 with a view to undertaking a residential-led development and will use funds from the Trust to fund the proposed development and share the profits with Investors following a sale of the development. The Sponsor has significant expertise in the delivery of high quality residential buildings and have a broader pipeline in excess of $500m of residential-led projects developed over the last six years. Principals within the Investment Manager have managed multiple billions of dollars of projects over more than twenty years with extensive experience as responsible managers with the AFSL regime. Investment Highlights: • The Subject Property on which development is proposed is an Adelaide metropolitan asset located in one of the city’s premium residential suburbs; • The Subject Property is a corner site in a high-profile location on a major arterial road in a premium suburb dominated by white collar employees and self-employed, surrounded by residential dwellings with values in the upper quartile for Adelaide; • The Subject Property has existing high quality social infrastructure and excellent access to public transport (albeit ample parking is proposed within the development); • The area and adjoining suburbs have demographics approaching retirement age with many residents considering local down-sizing and right-sizing options; • There is limited availability of apartments with appropriate amenity for “downsizers” and “right-sizers” in the surrounding area; • There is an existing retail centre on the Subject Property and this provides supporting income throughout the period during which planning approvals and presales are to be achieved; • Discussions with State Commission Assessment Panel (SCAP) and Planning Consultants indicate strong support for preliminary concept plans (subject to finalisation); and • Early expressions of interest are being received for office and commercial spaces prior to any formal marketing campaigns. Project Shopping Centre是一个可投资阿德莱德房地产开发项目的机会。 在通过发行单位向投资者筹集足够资金的前提下，受托人打算收购开发商的优先股，并与现有股东签订协议。开发商将与已于 2023 年 12 月收购标的物业的土地持有人签订项目开发协议 (PDA)，以开展以住宅为主的开发，并将使用信托基金为拟议开发提供资金，并在出售开发项目后与投资者分享利润。 发起人在交付高质量住宅建筑方面拥有丰富的专业知识，并在过去六年中开发了超过5亿美元的住宅主导型项目。 二十多年来，投资经理管理了数十亿美元的项目，并作为 AFSL 制度下的负责经理拥有丰富经验。 投资亮点： • 拟开发的标的物业是一个位于该市高级住宅郊区的阿德莱德大都市资产； • 标的物业是位于主要由白领雇员和自雇人士组成的高档郊区主干道上的显眼地点的一个拐角处，周围环绕着价值位列阿德莱德上四分位的住宅； •标的物业现有的优质社会基础设施，公共交通便利（尽管在开发中拟提供充足的停车位）； • 该地区和相邻的郊区人口统计资料接近退休年龄，许多居民考虑当地小规模化和适度规模化的选项。 • 周边地区具有“小规模化”和“适度规模化”设施的公寓数量有限。 • 标的物业设有现有的零售中心，在规划审批和预售的整个待实现期间提供支持性收入； • 与国家委员会评估小组 (SCAP) 和规划顾问的讨论表明了对初步概念计划的强烈支持（有待最终确定）；以及 • 在任何正式营销活动之前，潜在买家早早表达了对办公空间和商业空间的兴趣。

column3: Project Car Share
column7: Project Car Share launched in December 2016 with just three vehicles and has since expanded to be an integral part of living for tens of thousands of members. Its expansion in February 2022 provided a template for rolling out into new cities and displays the scalability of the Company's model. The Company has ambitions to launch in 20 regional cities, with at least three cities targeted for 2025. By providing instant, convenient access to cars for individuals and businesses, Project Car Share replaces car ownership, car leases, car rentals and taxi trips. Importantly, it targets trips between one hour and one day, an area of the market underserved by the likes of Uber or traditional car rental companies. Third-party research suggests that every Project Car Share vehicle replaces 10+ private vehicles (via sold or foregone purchases by users). This supports a fundamental change to our cost of living, congestion, emissions, and how we use the space in the cities we call home. Investment Highlights ➢ New Zealand’s leading tech-driven car-sharing service, providing on-demand car access as an alternative to private ownership and corporate fleets; ➢ 50,000+ members, including hundreds of business and corporate clients; ➢ Grown revenue from c.NZ$1m FY20 to c.NZ$5.4m FY24 at a CAGR of 52%; ➢ A successful 2022 launch into the Auckland market highlighted the opportunity for further New Zealand growth; ➢ 3+ New Zealand cities targeted for launch in 2025; ➢ NZ$4.42 of funds have been committed to date. Project Car Share于2016年12月推出，当时只有三个投资工具，此后扩展成为成千上万股东不可或缺的一部分。2022年2月的扩张为进入新城市提供了模板，并展示了公司模式的可扩展性。该公司致力于是在20个区域城市推出，在2025年至少面向三个城市推出。 通过为个人和企业提供即时、便捷的汽车使用，Project Car Share 取代了汽车所有权、汽车租赁和出租车旅行。重要的是，它瞄准的是一个小时到一天之间的旅行，这是Uber或传统汽车租赁公司等服务不足的市场区域。 第三方研究表明，每辆Project Car Share汽车都会取代10多辆私人汽车（通过用户出售或放弃购买）。这有助于从根本上改变生活成本、拥堵、排放以及在城市中使用空间的方式。 投资亮点 ➢ 新西兰领先的技术驱动型汽车共享服务，提供按需汽车使用，作为私人汽车和企业车队的替代； ➢ 50,000 多名会员，包括数百家企业客户； ➢ 收入从 2020 财年的 100 万新西兰元增长到 2024 财年的 540 万新西兰元，复合年增长率为 52%； ➢ 2022 年成功进入奥克兰市场，凸显了在新西兰进一步增长的机会； ➢ 计划于 2025 年面向至少 3 个新西兰城市推出； ➢ 迄今为止，已承诺提供 4.42 新西兰元的资金。

column3: Project Satus
column7: Project Satus is a collective of international investors, operators and ecosystem builders with a shared passion for Australia and New Zealand (ANZ). The Company’s mission is to nurture, build and back global businesses based in ANZ. Project Satus is building on the success of its first fund launched in 2021, which focused exclusively on New Zealand and invested in 50+ of the region's leading startups. Over 20 notable investors participated. The portfolio has demonstrated exceptional performance, achieving a 1.6x MOIC to date and an IRR of 20%. This success is largely attributed to Project Satus’ hands-on approach with its portfolio companies and its extensive global network. Over time, the Company has established a strong brand and reputation as one of the most value-adding venture funds in the region. Key Highlights: • Building bridges to global markets: Project Satus is based in New Zealand, Australia and Silicon Valley, with strong ties to Europe and Asia; • Access to global ecosystems: Project Satus has built and invested in companies around the world; • Strong brand, credibility and track record: Project Satus has a great track record of working with founders in the region and built a brand that is globally recognised. Investment Criteria: • Seed to Series A; • 45-55 Portfolio Companies: o 25-30 Tech for Equity; o 20-25 Capital investments; • $500k-$1m initial investment in 40-50 seed stage; • $1.5m-$3m follow-on investment 1/3 top performers; • Preferred, SAFE, Convertible Note, Pro Rate Rights; • Globally focused AU and NZ startups; • <$10m target valuation at seed for initial cheque. Project Satus 是一群对澳大利亚和新西兰 (ANZ) 有着共同热情的国际投资者、运营商和生态系统建设者。该公司的使命是培育、建立和支持位于ANZ的全球企业。 Project Satus建立在2021年启动的第一只基金的成就基础上。那只基金专注于新西兰，并投资了该地区50多家领先的初创公司。超过20名知名投资者参与了出资。该投资组合表现优异，迄今已实现 1.6 倍 MOIC，内部收益率为 20%。 这一成功主要归功于Project Satus对其投资组合公司采取的亲力亲为方法及其广泛的全球网络。随着时间的推移，该公司建立了强大的品牌和声誉，成为该地区最增值的风险投资基金之一。 主要亮点： • 搭建通向全球市场的桥梁：Project Satus 位于新西兰、澳大利亚和硅谷，与欧洲和亚洲有着紧密的联系； • 连接全球生态系统：Project Satus已在全球各地建立并投资公司； • 强大的品牌、信誉和业绩记录：Project Satus 在与该地区的创始人合作方面有着良好的记录，并建立了一个在全球各地备受认可的品牌。 投资标准： • 种子轮到A轮； • 45-55 家投资组合公司： o 25-30 技术换股； o 20-25 项资本投资； • 在 40-50 个种子轮进行 50 万美元至 100 万美元的初始投资； • 向 1/3 表现最佳者进行后续投资（150 万至 300 万美元）； • 优先股、SAFE、可转换票据、按比例权益； • 澳大利亚和新西兰的专注于全球市场的初创公司； • 首次进行投资的种子轮阶段目标估值 < 1000 万美元。
column8: Deep Technology,Financial Technology,Healthcare Technology,Manufacturing Technology,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology

column3: Project Growth
column7: Project Growth is a mid-market private equity fund. The Company partners with business owners in Australia and New Zealand to drive transformative growth and value creation. Project Growth is a $250 million fund investing in essential B2B businesses with enterprise values between $20-50 million. This segment of the market is ideal for private equity to value add and the team has a strong track record of delivering operational improvements to drive significant investor returns. By carrying out direct proprietary investments, no auctions, Project Growth can source and execute terms for the most attractive investment opportunities. Project Growth is actively deploying capital and has already completed two platform investments since launch in November 2023. Key highlights: Essential Business Services: Strong and defensive market position provides solid foundation for growth. Profitable with opportunity to grow: History of stable cashflow and opportunity for transformative growth and value creation. Small to mid-market companies: Target enterprise value of $20-$50m with EBITDA of $3-8m. Exceptional team: Investing in highly motivated founders and management looking for a partner to drive growth. Project Growth 是一家中型市场私募股权基金。该公司与澳大利亚和新西兰的企业主合作，推动变革性增长和价值创造。 Project Growth 是一个 2.5 亿美元的基金，投资于企业价值在 2000 万到 5000 万美元之间的基本 B2B 企业。这一细分市场非常适合私募股权增值。该团队在实现运营改进方面拥有良好的业绩记录，可促进丰厚的投资回报。 通过进行直接的专有投资（没有拍卖），Project Growth可以寻找最具吸引力的投资机会并执行条款。Project Growth 正在积极部署资本，自 2023 年 11 月启动以来，已经完成了两宗平台投资。 主要亮点： 基本业务服务：强大的防御性市场地位为增长奠定了坚实的基础。 盈利且有机会成长：历来具有稳定的现金流，以及能把握变革性增长和价值创造的机会。 中小型市场公司：目标企业价值为 2000 万至 5000 万美元，EBITDA 为 300 万至 800 万美元。 出色的团队：投资于那些寻找合作伙伴以推动增长的积极进取的创始人和管理层。

column3: Project Cattle & Carbon
column7: BlueMount Capital has been appointed by Project Cattle & Carbon to broker the sale of the property bare of stock and plant with an operating and producing ACCU project. The property has the option for the current lessee to stay and operate, or to be available bare with no ongoing operational lease. As part of the Carbon project there is an ongoing ILUA. The property is offered for sale on a bare basis. A key component of the sale is the consideration of the active carbon project. As such, a detailed data pack is available on request providing suitably qualified parties with a full suite of relevant documentation. ✓ Located within the Northern Gulf of Carpentaria region of Queensland. ✓ The Property is accessed via a formed gravel road which provides adequate access to service domestic and live export markets located to the south and east. ✓ Featuring a gently undulating topography, the property is benefited by two creeks which dissect the property and run in a general east to west direction. ✓ From an operational perspective, the property is benefited by an established homestead complex along with a set of steel cattle yards. ✓ Water is a feature of the property with an established network of 63* catchment dams along with two (2) bores. Services on the property include electricity, telephone, bottled gas, septic system, television and internet access. Mail delivery and School of the Air are available. ✓ In addition to the pastoral enterprise the property is benefited by a registered Human-Induced Regeneration (HIR) carbon project for a crediting period of 25 years which commenced on 7 August 2020. With a permanence period of 100 years, the project is expected to generate 233,900 Australian Carbon Credit Units (ACCUs). BlueMount Capital 已被 Cattle & Carbon 项目任命，通过经营性和生产 ACCU 的项目，为出售物业库存和植物提供经纪服务。 该物业提供的选项包括：让当前承租人入住和运营；无持续经营租赁的裸露房型。 作为 Carbon 项目的一部分，存在一个正在进行的 ILUA。 该物业以裸屋形式出售。 销售的一个关键组成部分是活性炭项目的考虑因素。因此，可应要求提供详细的数据包，为适当合格的各方提供全套相关文件。 ✓ 位于昆士兰州的卡奔塔利亚湾北部地区。 ✓ 该物业通过一条成形的砾石路进入，该道路提供充足的通道，通往位于南部和东部的国内和现场出口市场。 ✓ 该物业具有轻微起伏的地形，坐拥两条小溪，这两条小溪把该物业分为两块，并沿从东到西的大致方向延伸。 ✓ 从运营的角度来看，该物业受益于一个成熟的家园综合体以及一组钢铁围栏牛场。 ✓ 水是该物业的一个特点，拥有由 63* 个集水坝和两 (2) 个水井组成的既定网络。物业服务包括电力、电话、瓶装燃气、化粪池系统、电视和互联网接入。提供邮件投递和远程学校服务。 ✓ 除了牧场企业外，该物业还受益于从 2020 年 8 月 7 日开始的计入期为 25 年的注册人为诱导再生 (HIR) 碳项目。该项目拥有100年的永久期限，预计将产生233,900个澳大利亚碳信用单位(ACCU)。

column3: Project Aviation
column7: BlueMount Capital is mandated to assist Project Aviation with raising up to $34,000,000 in equity and/ or debt to acquire an aircraft hangar, acquire additional aircraft and improve the Company’s working capital position. Project Aviation is an integrated aeromedical aviation services and solution enterprise that looks after charter clients from the lounge experience through to curated travel. It provides ongoing management of aircraft and commercial services by delivering personnel, goods and even vital organs safely around Australia and the world. ✓ Project Aviation is aiming to expand its aeromedical operations globally and become the global leader of air ambulance services. ✓ The Company is looking to acquire an aircraft hangar which is expected to add $1.6m in annual EBITDA. ✓ Project Aviation has a track record of positive EBITDA that is forecasted to more than double from FY25 to FY26 as a result of adding 3 aircraft. ✓ Its air ambulance service was launched in 2018, and it has since grown to be one of the leading aeromedical aviators in Australia and the APAC region, having flown more than 2,000 hours for individuals, insurance companies, governments and hospitals. ✓ Project Aviation’s vertically integrated group structure, for all services relating to private aircraft, allows for efficiency and cost savings in all operations. ✓ Project Aviation operates globally with bases in Australia and in Singapore, providing a competitive edge in the APAC region. ✓ The Company is the preferred partner for numerous companies and areas and has been awarded numerous accreditations.

column3: BlueMount Capital (Qld) Pty Ltd
column7: BlueMount Capital is a capital markets group with offices in Sydney, Brisbane, Melbourne, Perth, London, Los Angeles and Beijing. We have global connections to capital market groups through our colleagues in the USA/UK/Europe and India.  We are also a member of Orion International Advisors (formerly IAIB), an exclusive network of investment bankers from America, UK, Europe and Asia. BlueMount Capital 是一家位于澳洲的资本市场集团，在悉尼、布里斯班、墨尔本、珀斯、伦敦、洛杉矶和北京均设有办事处。我们通过位于美国/英国/欧洲和印度的同事与资本市场的机构建立了全球联系。我们也是Orion International Advisors（一个由来自美国、英国、欧洲和亚洲的投资银行家组成的独家网络，前身为IAIB）的成员。

column7: My company is involved with PPA solar projects that are 10-50MW in size in South East Asia and South America, most of them for under developed communities. These are government authorized projects with at least 10-15 years time span. These projects are looking for investors who can sponsor the initial investments with sizable returns. Please get in touch if you are interested to discuss more. 我们公司参与了东南亚和南美洲规模为10-50MW的PPA太阳能项目，其中大部分服务于欠发达社区。这些是政府授权的项目，时间跨度至少为 10-15 年。 这些项目正在寻找能够赞助具有丰厚回报的初始投资的投资者。如果您有兴趣讨论更多内容，请联系我们。

column3: Bolt Battery & Bolt Energy
column7: Bolt began its journey as a leading battery manufacturer in Asia, leveraging army grade proprietary technology to create innovative energy solutions. Our humble beginning includes supplying batteries for fighter jets and submarines in China and standby power solutions for national telecom companies in the PRC. Over the years, Bolt has evolved into a global pioneer in battery energy storage systems (BESS), delivering comprehensive solutions for renewable energy projects worldwide. With clients such as Swisscom (Switzerland), Aramco (Saudi Arabia), Brititsh Telecom (UK) and as a qualified supplier for the World Bank, Bolt is trusted to provide top-tier products and services that meet the highest international standards. At the heart of Bolt’s success is a dedicated engineering team, offering customized solutions to clients seeking efficient and reliable energy storage systems. We work closely with our partners to design, develop, and implement systems tailored to their specific project needs, ensuring optimal performance and longevity. Our commitment goes beyond just technology. Bolt is deeply dedicated to promoting a resilient, sustainable, and self-sufficient energy solutions for all. We believe that our innovations in energy storage will help empower communities and industries to embrace renewable energy sources, reduce reliance on fossil fuels, and minimize environmental impact. Our current projects include a rural electrification project in Peru, a 100 MW+ solar energy storage project in the State of Nevada, a 20,000+ solar street light project in Thailand, a wind power energy storage system project in Germany among others. With a shared vision of creating a cleaner, greener world, Bolt invites partners, stakeholders, and communities to join us in building a sustainable energy future for generations to come. Together, we can make a meaningful difference. Bolt始于成为亚洲领先的电池制造商，利用军用级专有技术创造创新的能源方案。我们最初只为中国的战斗机和潜艇供应电池，以及为中国的国家电信公司提供备用电源方案。多年来，Bolt已发展成为全球电池储能系统（BESS）的先锋，为全球的可再生能源项目提供全面方案。我们的客户包括瑞士电信 (瑞士)、Aramco (沙特阿拉伯)、英国电信 (英国)，并作为世界银行的合格供应商，Bolt被信任以提供符合最高国际标准的顶级产品和服务。 Bolt成功的核心是一支敬业的工程团队，他们为寻求高效可靠的储能系统的客户提供定制方案。我们与合作伙伴紧密合作，设计、开发和实施量身定制的系统，以确保最佳性能和耐用性。 我们的承诺超越技术。Bolt致力于促进韧性、可持续和自给自足的能源方案。我们相信，我们在能源存储方面的创新将帮助社区和行业采纳可再生能源，减少对化石燃料的依赖，并最大限度地减少对环境的影响。我们当前的项目包括在秘鲁的农村电气化项目、内华达州100 MW以上的太阳能储能项目、泰国的20,000多个太阳能路灯项目以及德国的风能储能系统项目等。 秉承创建一个更清洁、更绿色世界的愿景，Bolt会邀请合作伙伴、利益相关者和社区与我们共同建设可持续的能源未来，造福子孙后代。我们相信，携手合作，我们可以带来有意义的改变。

column3: BWSea Technology
column7: BWSea is an innovative technology venture aiming to make aquaculture simple and sustainable, for resolving the pressing issues of food security, productivity, biosecurity and food safety. BWSea’s AIoT Precision Aquaculture Management Solution core technologies center around (1) place: intelligent offshore aquaculture deployment system, (2) prevention: intelligent aquaculture diseases prediction system and fish health management platform, and (3) monitoring: intelligent biomass detection system. BWSea is certified as national science and technology SME in China, and has been granted 4 patents and a national standard. BWSea is incorporated in Shanghai, Shenzhen and Hong Kong, and our Hong Kong R&D arm is admitted to the HKSTP incubation program. BWSea 是一家创新科技企业，旨在简化和可持续发展水产养殖，以解决食品安全、生产力和生物安全等紧迫问题。BWSea 的 AIoT 精准水产养殖管理方案的核心技术围绕以下三个方面展开：(1) 位置：智能离岸水产养殖部署系统 (2) 预防：智能水产养殖疾病预测系统和鱼类健康管理平台，以及 (3) 监测：智能生物量检测系统。BWSea 被认证为中国国家科技中小企业，并获得了4项专利和1个国家标准。BWSea 在上海、深圳和香港注册成立，而我们的香港研发部门已被纳入香港科技园的创科培育计划。

column3: Critical Minerals and Infrastructure Fund
column7: The African Union and its member states have highlighted the global green energy transition as a critical economic and investment theme for the next decade. Critical mineral value chain optimization and the associated infrastructure investing will form the backbone of economic growth on the African continent, laying the foundation for a brighter future, connecting people and opportunities. In recognition of this theme and it's importance in the outlook for the continent as a whole, the Cannon Asset Managers team has put together a African focused Critical Minerals and Infrastructure private markets fund. The fund leverages the Cannon's multi-decade experience managing institutional assets as well as the team's entrepreneurial acumen to offer investors a pool of strategic investments across the EV battery value chain throughout the African continent.

column3: Canpanion AI EdTech
column7: Canpanion aims to be APAC largest child development and Special Education Needs (SEN) platform, promoting tailored learning and neurodiversity. Our professional and evidence-backed solutions identify hidden talents in the system, increase social productivity that support country's long-term development, and introduce the best practices in psychology and child development globally to Asia, shaping the best AI personalized experts for Asian children. Our cutting-edge AI-powered EdTech solutions seamlessly integrate into the current educational landscape, catering to children aged 0-12. We offer an array of innovative features, including AI gamified assessments and training, AI-driven personalized learning plans, an enhanced AI analytical system, an advanced 3D holographic virtual professional teacher, and specialized support for neurodiversity. With 1 in 6 children globally requiring special education—some of whom include iconic figures like Albert Einstein, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs—our platform addresses an urgent need exacerbated by incomplete evaluation systems in Asia. By co-developing with esteemed professors from The Education University of Hong Kong (EdUHK) and a network of psychologists and professionals, Canpanion is at the forefront of educational innovation. Backed by leading organizations like HKSAR Digital Policy Office, Cyberport, CityU Tech 300, and CUHK, we are set to transform educational outcomes, impacting over 10 key stakeholders around each child. Partnering with 60+ industry leaders including prestigious advisors, schools, NGOs, government entities, professionals, educational centers, and organizations to create a brighter future for every child.

column3: Canpanion AI EdTech
column7: Canpanion aims to be APAC largest child development and Special Education Needs (SEN) platform, promoting tailored learning and neurodiversity. Our professional and evidence-backed solutions identify hidden talents in the system, increase social productivity that support country's long-term development, and introduce the best practices in psychology and child development globally to Asia, shaping the best AI personalized experts for Asian children. Our cutting-edge AI-powered EdTech solutions seamlessly integrate into the current educational landscape, catering to children aged 0-12. We offer an array of innovative features, including AI gamified assessments and training, AI-driven personalized learning plans, an enhanced analytical system, an advanced 3D virtual professional teacher, and specialized support for neurodiversity. With 1 in 6 children globally requiring special education—some of whom include iconic figures like Albert Einstein, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs—our platform addresses an urgent need exacerbated by incomplete evaluation systems in Asia. By co-developing with esteemed professors from The Education University of Hong Kong (EdUHK) and a network of psychologists and professionals, Canpanion is at the forefront of educational innovation. Backed by leading organizations like HKSAR Digital Policy Office, Cyberport, CityU Tech 300, and CUHK, we are set to transform educational outcomes, impacting over 10 key stakeholders around each child. Partnering with 60+ industry leaders including prestigious advisors, schools, NGOs, government entities, professionals, educational centers, and organizations to create a brighter future for every child. Canpanion 的目标是成为亚太地区最大的儿童发展和特殊教育需求 (SEN) 平台，促进量身定制的学习和神经多样性。我们有证据支持的专业解决方案可在系统中识别出潜藏的才能，提高支持国家长期发展的社会生产力，并向亚洲推行全球心理学和儿童发展方面的最佳实践，为亚洲儿童塑造最好的人工智能个性化专家。 我们先进的人工智能驱动的 EdTech 解决方案可无缝集成到当前的教育环境中，适合 0-12 岁的儿童。我们提供一系列创新功能，包括人工智能游戏化评估和训练、人工智能驱动的个性化学习计划、增强的分析系统、先进的 3D 虚拟专业教师以及对神经多样性的专业支持。全球六分之一的儿童（其中包括爱阿尔伯特·因斯坦、比尔·盖茨和史蒂夫·乔布斯等标志性人物）需要特殊教育，我们的平台解决了由于亚洲的评估系统不完善而加剧的迫切需求。 Canpanion 由我们与香港教育大学 (EdUHK) 的知名教授和心理学家和专业人士网络共同开发，处于教育创新的前沿。在香港特别行政区数字政策办公室、数码港、CityU Tech 300 和香港中文大学等领先组织的支持下，我们将会改变教育成果，为每个儿童身边的 10 多个关键利益相关者带来福音。与 60 多个行业领导者合作，其中包括著名顾问、学校、非政府组织、政府实体、专业人士、教育中心和组织，为每个儿童创造更光明的未来。

column3: Cancer therapeutic vaccine against non-small cell lung cancer designed through proprietary technology
column7: Canthevac Limited, a start-up established in 2024, is the subsidiary company of Hong Kong Universal Vaccine (HKUV). HKUV, in turn, originated as a spin-off from the Centre for Virology, Vaccine, and Therapeutics (CVVT) and The University of Hong Kong. Our mission is to enhance global health and save lives from infectious diseases and cancers. We will first focus on a therapeutic vaccine tailored for non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) and have currently obtained the patents for the technology in both US and China. In our research, we will embark on a multi-step approach to develop effective therapeutic lung cancer vaccines. We invite you take the opportunity to learn and invest in a breakthrough technology that could help make a change in the years to come.

column3: Transforming Automotive Retail with Carage Tech
column7: Carage: Revolutionizing the Automotive Industry through Retail-Tech Innovation Seeking 1 mil USD Angel Funding in exchange of 10% Stake in CARAGE SDN BHD Introduction: Carage is a pioneering retail-tech company that envisions a seamless, one-stop solution for automotive needs. Inspired by the success of Malaysia's Mr. DIY, we aim to create a nationwide chain of accessible, affordable, and tech-enabled automotive stores. By combining retail convenience with digital transformation, Carage is set to become the go-to destination for car owners, mechanics, and enthusiasts alike. Market Opportunity: The automotive aftermarket industry in Southeast Asia is projected to grow exponentially, driven by increasing vehicle ownership and a rising demand for convenient, cost-effective services. However, the sector remains fragmented, with inconsistent pricing, limited accessibility, and a lack of trust among consumers. Carage addresses these challenges by introducing a standardized, customer-centric retail experience. Unique Value Proposition: 1. Comprehensive Product Range: From spare parts to accessories, maintenance tools, and car care products, Carage offers everything under one roof. 2. Retail-Tech Integration: Smart inventory management to ensure product availability, as well as O2O bussiness model/ (i) PWA APP for easy browsing, price comparison, and in-store navigation. (ii) Capitalizing all automotive players by different category into an integrated marketplace. i.e: Workshop, Detailer, etc (iii) Developing AI friendly platform for users to solve and design automotive problem and needs. Loyalty programs and personalized recommendations using AI analytics. 3. Affordable Pricing: Leveraging economies of scale to provide competitive pricing without compromising on quality. 4. Franchise Expansion Model: A scalable business model designed for rapid growth across Malaysia and beyond. Funding Request: We are seeking a $1 million investment for 10% equity in Carage. This funding will be allocated to: Technology Development: Enhancing our app and backend systems. Store Expansion: Setting up120 additional outlets in prime locations. Marketing and Branding: Creating awareness and driving foot traffic. Supply Chain Optimization: Building strong supplier relationships and ensuring cost efficiency. Why Invest in Carage? 1. Untapped Market Potential: With no direct competitors operating at our scale, Carage has first-mover advantage. 2. Experienced Leadership: Our team brings extensive experience in retail, automotive, and tech industries. 3. Sustainability Commitment: Promoting eco-friendly products and services, contributing to a greener automotive sector. Key Retail-Tech Innovations: 1. Integrated Omni-Channel Experience: A mobile app and web platform that allow customers to search, compare, and purchase products online, with the option to pick them up in-store or have them delivered. In-store digital kiosks for self-service, enabling quick product lookups, price checks, and virtual assistance. 2. Personalized Customer Experience Through AI: AI-powered recommendations based on customers’ purchase history, vehicle models, and browsing behavior. Targeted promotions and loyalty rewards to enhance customer retention. Tailored maintenance schedules and reminders sent via the app, improving customer engagement and satisfaction. 3. Augmented Reality (AR) Integration: AR tools that allow customers to visualize how parts or accessories will fit into their vehicles before purchase. AR-supported product tutorials and DIY guides accessible through the app, empowering customers with knowledge. 4. Connected Ecosystem for Workshops and Mechanics: Partnerships with workshops and independent mechanics integrated into our platform, enabling customers to schedule installations or maintenance directly through Carage. A rating system for service providers to ensure quality and trustworthiness. Exclusive product bundles and discounts for B2B customers like workshops and fleet owners. --- Join us in shaping the future of automotive retail in Malaysia and beyond. Your investment will not only drive significant returns but also position you as a key player in revolutionizing this high-potential market. Let’s drive innovation together. Contact Details: James Chai - Managing Director +6019-317-0323 jameschai@carage.com.my https://carage.com.my/

column3: Scaling Growth of a Canadian B Corp through Social Impact Real Estate Investment   |   通过房地产的社会影响力投资扩大加拿大共益企业的增长
column7: **Unlocking Returns in Canadian Government-Funded Real Estate within the Social Services Sector **EXECUTIVE SUMMARY Objective: Purposeful Property Investments aims to secure funding to support its existing portfolio of 10 tenanted group homes, assisting child intervention agencies in Alberta. The objective is to expand operations into multiple provinces and attract strategic investors interested in high-impact social investing with above-market returns. Market Opportunity: A significant gap exists between the demand and supply of group homes. This discrepancy presents a niche real estate investment opportunity for Purposeful Property Investments to capitalize on. Portfolio Specifications: This portfolio includes 10 bungalows converted into two separate living spaces (main floor and basement). These units range from 1,000 to 1,400 sq ft. Long-Term Contracts: Child intervention agencies hold long-term contracts with the Government of Alberta to provide care in these licensed facilities, ensuring near-zero vacancies after the initial tenancy. Future Expansion Plan: The plan includes expanding the portfolio of turnkey, licensed group homes to meet the growing demand for child intervention services in Alberta and British Columbia. **解锁加拿大政府资助的社会服务领域房地产的回报 **执行摘要 **目标：**Purposeful Property Investments 旨在获得资金以支持其现有的 10 栋出租集体住宅组合，协助阿尔伯塔省的儿童干预机构。目标是将业务扩展到多个省份，并吸引对高于市场回报的高影响力社会投资感兴趣的战略投资者。 **市场机会：**集体住宅的需求和供应之间存在着巨大的差距。这种差异为 Purposeful Property Investments 提供了一个利基房地产的投资机会。 **投资组合规格：**这个投资组合包括把 10 间平房，改建成两个独立的起居空间（主楼层和地下室）。这些单位的面积从 1,000 到 1,400 平方英尺不等。 长期合同：儿童干预机构与阿尔伯塔省政府签订了长期合同，为儿童在这些持照机构中提供护理，使初始租赁后空置率接近于零。 **未来扩展计划：**计划包括扩大交钥匙、获得许可的集体住宅组合，以满足阿尔伯塔省和不列颠哥伦比亚省对儿童干预服务日益增长的需求。

column3: Level-Up Language Learning: Craft Lessons and Exams 10X Faster!   Cathoven专为语言教育工作者量身打造，是一款高效智能的AI助手。它能够协助教师设计符合学生水平的课程与考试。
column7:
Cathoven AI, headquartered in the United States, also has branches in Hong Kong,
Europe, and Turkey. Founded in 2022, Cathoven is a smart assistant tailored for
language educators, helping them create level-appropriate lessons and exams,
assess and score student work, identify weaknesses, and provide actionable
feedback. Used by top institutions like Columbia Uni, Cathoven was ranked the
second-best AI in Education project by QS after Duolingo.
Currently, Cathoven has completed its seed round of funding, with its primary
target markets being the United States and Europe. "Cathoven AI 的總部位於美國，同時在香港、歐洲及土耳其均設有分公司。公司成立於2022年，專為語言教育工作者量身打造，是一款高效智慧的AI助手。它能夠協助教師設計符合學生水準的課程與考試，對學生作業精准評估打分，識別學習短板，並提供系統性回饋指導。
這款工具已贏得哥倫比亞大學等眾多頂尖教育機構的青睞，並在QS排名中緊隨多鄰國之後，在教育人工智慧領域名稱列第二。
已完成種子輪融資，主要目標市場為美國和歐洲。" "Cathoven AI 的总部位于美国，同时在香港、欧洲及土耳其均设有分公司。公司成立于2022年，专为语言教育工作者量身打造，是一款高效智能的AI助手。它能够协助教师设计符合学生水平的课程与考试，对学生作业精准评估打分，识别学习短板，并提供系统性反馈指导。
这款工具已赢得哥伦比亚大学等众多顶尖教育机构的青睐，并在QS排名中紧随多邻国之后，在教育人工智能领域名列第二。
