column3: Quantitative Rapid Test for At-home Screening and Management of Personal Healthcare  |  用于居家监测和个人健康管理的定量快速检测仪
column7: We are developing a quantitative rapid test for at-home self-screening and management of personal healthcare. This quantitative rapid test includes a microfluidic device and a mobile app. Urine or blood specimen is sampled by dipping, with a fixed volume through a capillary valve. Next, the sample will resuspend the dried magnetic microparticles (MMPs) and polystyrene microparticles (PMPs) in the reaction chamber. MMPs and PMPs will be surface coated with binding agents so the presence of target biomarker would alter the connections between MMPs and PMPs. After reaction, the particle solution will be directed to a magnetic separator that removes the MMPs and the connected PMPs, leaving free PMPs to keep on flowing until they are trapped at a particle dam. Thus, the level of biomarker would alter the PMP accumulation length, which is quantifiable by a mobile app. The project is supported by the HK Tech300 Angel Fund from City University of Hong Kong and Incu-Bio Programme of Hong Kong Science & Technology Parks Corporation. Additionally, the project has received investment intentions amounting to tens of millions of Hong Kong dollars from several venture capital firms, as well as support from multiple companies in the industry. It has been nominated by City University of Hong Kong to participate in the latest RAISE+ program. We look forward to having more partners to accelerate the commercialization process of the project. 我们正在开发一款用于居家自我监测和个人健康管理的定量快速检测工具。这款定量快速检测工具包含一个微流控设备和一款移动应用程序。检测时，通过毛细管阀采集固定体积的尿液或血液样本。接下来，样本会重新悬浮在反应腔内的干燥磁性微粒子（MMPs）和聚苯乙烯微粒（PMPs）中。MMPs 和 PMPs 的表面涂有结合剂，所以目标生物标志物的存在会改变 MMPs 和 PMPs 之间的连接关系。反应完成后，颗粒溶液会被引导至磁分离器，磁性分离器会移除 MMPs 和已连接的 PMPs，留下来的自由PMPs，令其继续流动直至被阻挡颗粒的阻挡槽捕获。因此，生物标志物的水平会改变 PMP 的累积长度，这一过程可通过移动应用程序进行量化。 该项目获得了香港城市大学 HK Tech300 天使基金和香港科学园公司生物医药科技培育计划（Incu-Bio Programme）的支持。此外，该项目还获得了多家风险投资公司数千万港元的投资意向，以及多家行业公司的支持。项目已被香港城市大学提名参与最新的 RAISE+ 计划。我们期待与更多合作伙伴携手，共同加速项目的商业化进程。

column3: ColdBlock Technologies -- bringing our revolutionary analytical laboratory sample preparation technology to Asia
column7: ColdBlock is seeking investment partners to help fund the scale up of our business -- inventory build, expanded sales and customer support team, and expanded manufacturing and logistics. We are also seeking partners who can help to accelerate our market penetration in Asia. ColdBlock's sample digestion technology provides a significant, step-function improvement in a standard laboratory process that is commonly used in a wide range of industries from mining & metals, to food & agriculture, to environmental & consumer goods.  Elemental analysis is the process to identify content and quantity of specific elements in a sample -- and a key step is preparing the sample, converting it from solid to liquid, digesting it.   Typically the longest, most expensive, and most hazardous step in elemental analysis, sample digestion has been the bottleneck -- until now.  ColdBlock provides labs with a significantly improved sample digestion process, completed in minutes vs hours, with improved safety, greater scalability and flexibility, and lower costs, with the same or better results.  ColdBlock technology has been vetted and approved by some of the largest leading commercial labs.  We have made sales around the world and have a commercially proven product, an established distribution network, and sales are rising. ColdBlock 正在寻求投资合作伙伴来帮助为我们业务扩张提供资金 - 用于库存构建、扩大销售和客户支持团队，以及增强制造和物流能力。我们还在寻找能够帮助加快我们在亚洲市场渗透率的合作伙伴。 ColdBlock 的样品消解技术为标准实验室流程提供了显著的步骤功能改进，该流程通常用于采矿和金属、食品和农业、环境和消费品等众多行业。  元素分析是识别样品中特定元素的含量和数量的过程 - 一个关键步骤是制备样品，将其从固态转化为液态，消解它。   样品消解通常是在元素分析中最长、最昂贵和最危险的步骤，并且迄今为止仍是瓶颈。  ColdBlock 为实验室提供了显著改善的样品消解流程。该流程只需几分钟（而非几小时）即可完成，安全性更高，可扩展性和灵活性更高，成本更低，并且具有相同甚至更好的结果。  ColdBlock 技术已经过一些大型商业实验室的审核和批准。  我们在世界各地进行了销售，并拥有经过商业验证的产品、成熟的分销网络和不断增长的销售额。

column3: ColdBlock Technologies Inc
column7:
ColdBlock sample digestion technology uses focused short-wave infrared heating and a unique cooling zone to dissolve solid sample matter into solution for multi-element analysis with a significantly faster, simpler, and safer process compared with older digestion methods. ColdBlock’s sample digestion system is being used in
laboratories across several industries, saving time and money by increasing sample throughput capacity and significantly reducing turnaround times, while providing accurate and reliable results. ColdBlock Technologies Inc. is a privately owned company based in Ontario, Canada ColdBlock样品消解技术利用短波红外加热和独特的冷却区，将固体样品物质溶解成溶液，用于多元素分析。与传统消解方法相比，此过程显著更快速、更简单且更安全。ColdBlock 的样品消解系统已被多个行业的实验室使用，通过提高样品处理能力和大幅缩短周转时间，节省了时间和成本，同时提供准确可靠的结果。ColdBlock Technologies Inc. 是一家总部位于加拿大安大略省的私人公司。

column3: Cytonic is compatible with most blockchains. It allows different transaction types to be processed together in a single block.
column7: Cytonic is a cutting-edge blockchain ecosystem designed to empower developers by providing a seamless environment for building, deploying, and scaling decentralized applications. Positioned as the "builder's chain," Cytonic addresses critical challenges such as virtual machine compatibility and liquidity management, facilitating rapid innovation. The platform supports multiple virtual machines (VMs), including EVM and SVM, enabling atomic cross-VM interoperability. With a strong focus on community-driven growth and user experience, Cytonic has attracted over 300,000 sign-ups since its launch. By offering robust support, educational resources, and a commitment to continuous improvement, Cytonic aims to lead the Layer 1 blockchain landscape and foster a vibrant ecosystem for decentralized technologies. Cytonic 是一个前沿的区块链生态系统，旨在通过提供无缝的环境来赋能开发者，以构建、部署和扩展去中心化应用程序。作为“建设者链”，Cytonic 解决了虚拟机兼容性和流动性管理等关键挑战，促进快速创新。该平台支持多种虚拟机（VM），包括 EVM 和 SVM，实现原子级跨 VM 互操作性。Cytonic 专注于社区驱动的增长和用户体验，自推出以来已吸引超过 300,000 个注册用户。通过提供强大的支持、教育资源和对持续改进的承诺，Cytonic 旨在引领 Layer 1 区块链领域，并促进去中心化技术的蓬勃发展

column3: D-Engraver Limited innovates private AI models for legal and corporate sectors expanding globally | D-Engraver Limited為法律和企業領域創新私人人工智慧模型，並在香港科技園，香港科技大學的支持下向全球擴張
column7:
D-Engraver Limited aims to create an accurate and private network of AI-powered large language models for professionals in the legal, financial and corporate sectors. The company is committed to building the world’s largest distributed artificial intelligence (DAI) network and building Hong Kong into an international DAI centre. Through a partnership with the HKUST E-Fund and the Hong Kong Science Park Accelerator,  D-Engraver Limited harnesses technology to transform industries,
reduce costs, improve outcomes and build trust. The company has a professional database and a large network of well-trained language models to provide localised AI language models to ensure customer data privacy. LawIntelliChain
Professional guidance and a consistent and reliable source of data are provided on the platform; it helps reduce administrative, research and writing burdens on attorneys, saving them 2 hours per day and increasing billing hours by up to 80% per day. At present, the company has more than 1,200 enterprise users in six countries, and its business continues to grow rapidly. D-Engraver Limited focuses on building the world’s largest DAI network, serving legal, financial and corporate professionals. The company’s goal is to use generative AI technologies to transform industry operations, reduce costs, improve performance, and increase trust. Our product, LawIntelliChain, is designed to support lawyers in terms of legal research, analysis, translation and document writing to improve their productivity. So far, we have attracted more than 1,200 corporate customers in the Asia-Pacific region and are committed to expanding the global market.
D-Engraver Limited is a portfolio company of the HKUST E-Fund and the Hong Kong Science Park Accelerator, and has established strategic partnerships with the law firm Robertsons and Microsoft. We use patented technologies such as KCTS and GOLD to solve hallucinations in the centralisation of legal large language models and reduce noise in the common knowledge graph, respectively, thereby improving data quality and response accuracy rate. The company's operating model is based on localised AI models, so as to ensure customer data privacy and provide reliable professional guidance. 诚镌科技有限公司旨在打造准确且私密的人工智能大型语言模型网络，专为法律、金融和企业领域的专业人士服务。公司致力于建设全球最大的分布式人工智能（DAI）网络，并将香港打造成为国际DAI 中心。透过与香港科技大学E-Fund 和香港科学园加速器的合作，诚镌科技运用技术来转型行业、
降低成本、提高成果及建立信任。公司拥有专业数据库和受训良好的大型语言模型网络，提供本地化AI 语言模型，确保客户数据隐私。 LawIntelliChain
平台支持专业指导并提供稳定可靠的数据来源；可帮助律师减少行政、研究和撰写工作的负担，每天可为其节省2 小时，并增加一天多达80%的计费时
数。目前，公司在六个国家已拥有超过1200 家企业用户，业务持续快速增长。 诚镌科技有限公司专注于建立全球最大的分布式人工智能网络，主要服务对象为法律、金融及企业专业人士。公司目标是利用生成型人工智能技术，转变行业运作、降低成本、提升绩效和信任。我们的产品LawIntelliChain，专为律师提供法律研究、分析、翻译和文档撰写上的支持，协助他们增强工作效率。目前，我们已在亚太地区吸引超过1200 名企业客户，并致力于全球市场扩展。
诚镌科技是香港科技大学E-Fund 和香港科学园加速器的投资组合公司，并与罗宾森律师事务所及微软等建立了战略合作关系。我们运用专利技术，如
KCTS 和GOLD，分别解决法律大语言模型中心化问题中的幻觉产生及降低常识知识图谱中的噪音，从而提升数据质量和回应正确率。公司的营运模式以
本地化AI 模型为基础，确保客户的数据隐私，并提供可靠的专业指导。 The content of this page has been translated by AI. In case of any discrepancies, please refer to the original document.

column3: Capitalizing on the Future: Invest in Zero Plastic Solutions   把握未来： 投资零塑方案
column7:
Company Overview
We are excited to present an investment opportunity in Ecoinno (H.K.) Limited, a leading innovator in the ESG sector. Based on our proprietary Green Fiber Technology, our pure plant fiber GCM® material, 100% compostable and degradable, outperforms all other plastic alternatives in terms of properties, sustainability and costs. Our disruptive GCM® material can be adapted to serve a multitude of applications, and has been extensively designed and tested to effectively replace single-use plastics across food packaging: frozen and cook-chilled packaging, airline catering tableware and cups; coffee capsules; pharmaceutical packaging; and industrial packaging. With zero-waste and sustainability focus, we have ensured our used products are 100% biodegradable, and can be composted to generate clean energy or organic fertilizers through food waste treatment and natural decomposition, achieving circular economy and carbon emission reduction. Market Opportunity
The zero plastic solution market is poised for significant growth, driven by global market trends (such as increasing demand for sustainable solutions, combatting greenwashing) growing customer awareness, regulatory changes, etc.. With our proprietary Green Fiber Technology and , we are strategically positioned to capture a substantial share of this expanding market. Join us in transforming the future of zero plastic solution with Ecoinno. We invite you to explore this investment opportunity and look forward to potentially partnering with you to achieve our ambitious goals. 公司概况
我们很高兴为您提供投资 Ecoinno (H.K.) Limited 的机会，该公司是 ESG 领域的领先创新者。基于我们特有的绿色纤维技术，我们的纯植物纤维 GCM® 材料是100% 可堆肥和降解，在性能、可持续性和成本方面优于所有其他塑料替代品。 我们具有颠覆性的 GCM® 材料可适用于多种应用场景，并经过了广泛的设计和测试，可有效替代食品包装中的一次性塑料：冷冻和冷藏包装、航空餐饮餐具和杯子、咖啡胶囊、药品包装和工业包装。 在零废弃和可持续发展的前提下，我们确保使用过的产品100%可生物降解，并可堆肥，通过食物垃圾处理和自然分解产生清洁能源或有机肥料，实现循环经济和碳减排。 市场机遇
在全球市场趋势（如对可持续解决方案的需求不断增长、打击 “洗绿 ”行为）、客户意识增强、市場監理变化等因素的推动下，零塑解决方案市场有望实现大幅增长。凭借我们特有的绿色纤维技术和我们的战略定位，我们将在这一不断扩大的市场中占据相当大的份额。 欢迎加入我们，与 Ecoinno 一起改变零塑解决方案的未来。我们诚邀您探讨这一投资机会，并期待与您携手实现我们的宏伟目标。

column3: Bridging Traditional Film & Video Production with AI Innovation
column7: The film and video production industry is evolving rapidly, driven by globalization and emerging technologies like AI. However, this exciting shift presents three critical challenges: Sourcing Resources Globally: Filmmakers struggle to find trusted crew, equipment, and suppliers in unfamiliar locations, often leading to delays and inefficiencies. Navigating Regulations: Every filming location has unique legal requirements and cultural nuances, making compliance difficult and risking project overruns or cancellations. Integrating AI into Workflows: While AI offers incredible creative possibilities, there’s no seamless way to connect modern tools like generative AI with traditional production workflows, resulting in inefficiencies and missed creative opportunities. Storyvord solves these challenges by offering an AI-powered platform that integrates production management, operations, and creative workflows. We connect filmmakers with global resources, provide real-time compliance guidance, and enhance creativity with tools like previsualization and AI-driven shot planning—all in one seamless solution

column3: Endowus is a fee-only wealth platform that provides investors with expert advice and access to institutional financial solutions at low, fair fees
column5: Senior Associate, Business Development and Partnerships
column7:
Endowus has launched in Hong Kong bevause we see a problem - In every demographic mix from private banks to retail banks, people struggle to invest their money because of high costs; a lack of aligned advice; and a lack of access to products.
Endowus works with clients from all spectrums including individual and professional investors, family offices, charities and foundations as well as institutional clients to provide conflict-free, evidence-based advice and institutional acess at low fair fees. Endowus was the first in Singapore to rebate trailer fees- and we are bringing the same practice to Hong Kong as we are on a mission to move towards global standards in lowering investing expenses, by charging fair and transparent fees to stay aligned with retail customers' interests.
We believe in financial education and literacy, especially in the area of retirement planning, and are committed to providing professional, independent advice alongside comprehensive and thoughtful content to help Hong Kongers navigate this complex landscape. We look forward to working with strategic partners in achieving our vision and mission. Endowus在香港推出是因为我们留意到一个问题 - 从私人银行到零售银行的每一种人口组合中，人们都因为成本高、缺乏一致的建议和缺乏获得产品的机会而纠结于投资与否。
Endowus与个人和专业投资者，家族办公室，慈善机构和基金会等各个领域的客户合作，以低廉的费用提供无冲突，基于证据的建议和机构许可。 Endowus是新加坡第一家回扣拖车费用的公司，我们将同样做法引入香港，因为我们的使命是通过收取公平透明的费用，以符合零售客户的利益，从而降低投资成本的全球标准。
我们相信金融教育和读写能力，特别是在退休规划方面，并致力于提供专业，独立的意见，以及全面和深思熟虑的内容，以帮助香港人驾驭这一复杂的局面。 我们期待着与战略合作伙伴合作，以实现我们的愿景和使命。"

column3: Health care) DTx combined with GLP-1 on the obesity
column7: Project Introduction Overview Our team, founded in 2016, currently focuses on the digital healthcare technology. Initially, the company started with a business focused on IoT solutions (especially digital tape measures), making measuring and storing body sizes easier. Recognizing the importance beyond size measurement in managing chronic diseases, we officially entered the DTx (Digital Therapeutics) development business in 2019, participating in various R&D projects under governmental R&D grants. In 2024, our project team became the first DTx company to sign a licensing-out agreement with a major pharmaceutical company, demonstrating its developed program’s clinical effectiveness and uniqueness. Company Name: XXX Established: January 2016 CEO: XXX, Ph.D. Number of Employees: 12 Industry: Digital Healthcare (Digital Therapeutics - DTx) Investment Stage: Series A or B (currently finalized Series A round) Intellectual Property: Holds over 30 domestic and international intellectual property rights Related News Articles: H Pharmaceutical's new challenge: Integrating 'obesity + DTx technology' for the 2027 launch integrating 'efpeglenatide', a Korean new drug under Developer of Digital Therapeutics, Known as the Third-Generation New Drug: Our team develops Digital Therapeutics (DTx). DTx is a type of Software as Medical Device (SaMD) that diagnoses a patient's condition and provides a treatment method for specific indications based on that diagnosis. DTx is typically implemented via smartphone applications. DTx requires a doctor's prescription and can only be downloaded and used by prescribed patients. Therefore, obtaining approval as a DTx necessitates clinical trials and regulatory approval from the relevant country's drug administration. Developer of Digital Therapeutics for the Obesity Sector, Expected to Experience Explosive Growth: Our team is jointly developing a digital therapeutics (DTx) for obesity treatment, in collaboration with a domestic pharmaceutical company, based on a GLP-1 agonist. Through this collaboration, the GLP-1 agonist and DTx will be combined into a digital convergence medicine, with a product release anticipated as early as Q4 of 2026. Financial Projections Price competitiveness: While the current market price for GLP-1 obesity treatments exceeds $1,000 per month, the target price for our combined treatment program is set at around $700 to $800 per month, allowing it to maintain price competitiveness even with the addition of the digital therapeutic compared to existing players. Revenue Recognition: During the development phase, the company will receive 2 billion KRW in cash upon achieving key milestones. In the sales phase, 40% of the sales price will be received as a technology licensing fee. approximately 110 billion KRW in net revenue. Growth Strategy Our team’s' unique technology for managing blood glucose variability through exercise intervention can be rapidly expanded to other indications, such as non-alcoholic steatohepatitis (MASH) and type 2 diabetes(T2DM), in a similar digital convergence medicine format. Additionally, this technology can be utilized for sarcopenia and various rehabilitation therapies. The company's digital therapeutic (DTx) uses continuous glucose monitors (CGMs) to diagnose an individual's condition and treats patients by combining traditional therapeutic drugs with the DTx, forming a digital convergence medicine. Bagel Labs is exploring opportunities to export GLP-1 from its partner pharmaceutical company and a CGM developed by a domestic biotech venture, along with its DTx, to the Middle East and SouthEast Asia region before US and Europe.

column3: DISCERN ESSENCE OF THE WORLD BY SOUND   諦聲科技，用聲音“看世界”。致力於為客戶提供工業設備聲學監測方案和一站式智慧化運維服務。   谛声科技，用声音“看世界”。致力于为客户提供工业设备声学监测方案和一站式智能化运维服务。
column7: AI acoustic detection is a novel approach which significantly enhances current equipment maintenance methods, resolving common pain points such as the shortage of technicians experienced in detecting mechanical malfunctions, as well as a lack of data-driven maintenance practices that result in inconsistent quality control in equipment maintenance and downtime. Ensonic’s advanced products and sophisticated data processing capabilities can detect equipment malfunctions early by matching sound samples from its co-developed industrial acoustic database, offering precise solutions for predictive maintenance. In addition, Ensonic’s proprietary signal collection microphone arrays can operate in highly complex and risky environments, improving safety for technicians. The arrays enable better spatial localization, active noise reduction, echo cancellation and blind signal separation. AI聲學檢測作為一種新型的故障診斷方法，它顯著提高了設備維運維的智慧型，解決了諸如缺乏經驗豐富的技術人員來檢測機械故障以及缺乏資料驅動的維護實踐等常見痛點，這些問題導致了設備維護中的品質控制不一致和停機時間。Ensonic的先進產品和複雜的資料處理能力可以通過匹配其共同開發的工業聲學資料庫中的聲音樣本來早期檢測設備故障，為預測性維護提供精確的解決方案。此外，Ensonic的麥克風陣列可以在高度複雜和危險的環境中實現信號採集，提高了技術人員的安全性。這些陣列能夠實現更好的空間定位、主動降噪、回聲消除和盲源分離。 AI声学检测作为一种新型的故障诊断方法，它显著提高了设备维运维的智能型，解决了诸如缺乏经验丰富的技术人员来检测机械故障以及缺乏数据驱动的维护实践等常见痛点，这些问题导致了设备维护中的质量控制不一致和停机时间。Ensonic的先进产品和复杂的数据处理能力可以通过匹配其共同开发的工业声学数据库中的声音样本来早期检测设备故障，为预测性维护提供精确的解决方案。此外，Ensonic的麦克风阵列可以在高度复杂和危险的环境中实现信号采集，提高了技术人员的安全性。这些阵列能够实现更好的空间定位、主动降噪、回声消除和盲源分离。

column3: Processing Mixed Solid Waste with Black Soldier Fly larvae at landfill co-located plants and converting recovered plastics to Syncoal™
column7: Entoq has an innovative process for the complete treatment of Mixed Solid Waste (MSW), with facilities that can be co-located at landfills for an efficient diversion into recovery and reuse. The process is employed most effectively at waste facilities nearing end-of-life, and operates a continuous process utilizing Black Soldier Fly (BSF) larvae to efficiently remove organics from the waste stream. Products derived from the BSF include animal feed, fertilizer and bio-fuel. The bio-cleaned plastics are treated to create Syncoal™, which recovers hydrogen and carbon for use in industry and as a sustainable energy alternative. The process is highly adaptable to different mixed waste profiles and the modular design of the plant enables scalability to match specific landfill capacities. The development programme has been undertaken in Australia, and the Entoq group is currently raising funds as equity or project financing to develop plants in Australia, North America and Kenya.

With a focus on early disease detection and a platform-based approach to testing, epiMedTech is committed to making advanced healthcare solutions accessible worldwide.  Our extensive lineup at epiMedTech Global includes a range of innovative health solutions designed to revolutionize early disease detection and proactive health management. Our global commercial offerings include: Ready To Go To Market Offerings: ·       epiCervix – early detection of cervical cancer ·       epiLiver – early detection of  liver cancer ·       epiPanCancer – detection of 33 different types of cancers Products in Development ·       epi_Breast:_ for breast cancer ·       epi_Psych:_ for depression and stress ·       epi_MGMT:_ for personalizing chemotherapy ·       epi_Spec:_ for identifying the cancer tissue of origin ·       epi_Opioid:_ for evaluating opioid exposure Products in Discussion Planning Phase ·       epi_Card:_ for early detection of cardiovascular disease ·       epi_Alz:_ for early detection of Alzheimer disease ·       epi_Tox:_ for detecting exposure to drug and toxins. epiMedTech Global(https://epimedtech.com/) 是一家处于商业阶段的领先医疗保健集团，在表观遗传学、早期癌症检测和个性化健康解决方案方面处于领先地位。该公司致力于通过表观遗传学的力量改变医疗保健，并利用先进的 DNA 甲基化分析和尖端技术来加强我们的研究和产品开发。epiMedTech 专注于早期疾病检测和基于平台的检测方法，致力于让全球都能获得先进的医疗保健解决方案。 epiMedTech Global 的广泛产品线包括一系列创新的健康解决方案，旨在革新早期疾病检测和主动健康管理。我们的全球商业产品包括： 准备上市的产品： ·       epiCervix – 宫颈癌早期检测 ·       epiLiver – 肝癌早期检测 ·       epiPanCancer – 检测 33 种不同类型的癌症 正在开发的产品 ·       epi_Breast:_ 用于乳腺癌 ·       epi_Psych:_ 用于抑郁和压力 ·       epi_MGMT:_ 用于个性化化疗 ·       epi_Spec:_ 用于识别癌症组织来源 ·       epi_Opioid:_ 用于评估阿片类药物暴露 讨论规划阶段的产品 ·       epi_Card:_ 用于心血管疾病早期检测疾病 ·       epi_Alz:_ 用于早期检测阿尔茨海默病 ·       epi_Tox:_ 用于检测药物和毒素的暴露情况。

column3: B2B sourcing platform for Indian buyers from verified suppliers of Hong Kong and China |  面向印度采购方的 B2B 外包平台，涵盖一系列经认证的中国及中国香港供应商
column7: Project Details Problem to solve - Currently buyers in India source from a limited set of HK and Chinese sellers , to find new sellers they have to travel to trade fairs which requires spending on travelling etc, or search online where there is difficulty to verify authenticity and quality. HK and Chinese Sellers are seeking new buyers and distributors for their goods and find it very difficult to source them in India due to various restrictions of travel, language, and the size of the market. Given the size of India-HK/China trade to grow to $200Bn by 2030, we can capture a $10Bn market share Solution - Create a Hong Kong based marketplace that connects suppliers in HK and China with verified buyers from India , and powering this marketplace with payments, compliance and financing" "项目详情 待解决的问题 - 当前印度采购方所能选取的中国香港和中国大陆的供应商范围有限，为寻找新的供应商，他们不得不前往贸易会，增加差旅等方面的开支，或是上网搜寻，确保真实性和质量面临重重困难。 中国香港和中国大陆的供应商也需要为货物寻找新的买家和分销商，但却因旅行限制、语言和市场规模等多因素限制，很难在印度寻得。 考虑到到 2030 年，印度和中国大陆及中国香港的贸易额将增加至 2,000 亿美元，我们可以估得有 100 亿美元的市场份额。 解决方案 - 打造建基中国香港的市场，连结中国香港、中国大陆的供应商与印度的大量采购方，并为市场提供支付、合规和融资支持”

column3: ENABLING COMMUNICATION FOR IMMOBILE INDIVIDUALS THROUGH VOCAL CORD VIBRATION
column7: We transform vocal cord vibrations into signals. The Hummingbird, Expertiqa’s flagship product, is a Class I assistive technology device transforming accessibility for non-verbal individuals with severe physical disabilities. Utilizing vocal cord vibration detection, the Hummingbird converts these signals into actionable outputs, enabling communication and control of devices like computers and AAC systems. The device features a user-friendly design, including a comfortable neckband and durable materials, and operates effectively in noisy environments. It offers versatile connectivity via Bluetooth, USB, and switch output cables. Clinically validated through trials at Holland Bloorview Kids Rehabilitation Hospital, the Hummingbird has demonstrated efficacy, safety, and user satisfaction. With support from institutions like the Ontario Brain Institute and BioNext Accelerator, Expertiqa is advancing accessibility and independence for individuals with disabilities while addressing critical gaps in the AAC device market. Expertiqa Technologies Inc. 是一家加拿大安的医疗科技初创公司，致力于无障碍领域的创新。公司专注于将学术研究成果转化为具有实际影响力的辅助技术。其旗舰产品Hummingbird是一款开创性的设备，专为无法语言交流且患有严重肢体残疾的人士设计。该设备通过先进的声带振动检测技术，帮助用户实现交流，并能够操控电脑及 AAC 等辅助设备。Expertiqa 坚持以人为本的设计理念，依托卓越的工程技术和医疗创新，为构建无障碍环境提供解决方案，满足特殊群体的实际需求。此产品已通过临床试验验证，并已证明其有效性、安全性和用户满意度。 *

SOURCES, AND REDUCING FALSE ALERTS "香港虚拟资产交易所（HKVAX）是一家获得香港证券及期货事务监察委员会颁发第1类（证券交易）和第7类（提供自动化交易服务）牌照，以及《打击洗钱及恐怖分子资金筹集条例》（AMLO）牌照的虚拟资产交易平台。作为领先的虚拟资产交易平台，HKVAX立足香港，致力于成为全球虚拟金融市场的重要参与者。 除了提供场外交易、交易所和托管服务外，HKVAX专注于证券型代币发行（STO）和实体资产通证化（RWA）业务。通过将传统金融与区块链技术相结合，为机构和专业投资者提供服务。 HKVAX始终将安全性和合规性置于首位，积极与监管机构合作推动行业标准，并与券商、货币服务运营商（MSO）、交易所买卖基金（ETF）发行商及其他平台建立战略联盟，共同构建合规的虚拟资产生态系统。通过这些努力，HKVAX推动香港金融创新发展，促进全球虚拟资产市场的进步。

column3: Feebris is the virtual operating system for precision healthcare at home, trusted by  patients and health systems  |   Feebris 是可以在家进行精准医疗的虚拟操作系统，深受患者和医疗系统的信赖

It’s inevitable that most people will increasingly manage their health needs at
home. Feebris is the operating system for hospital at home, trusted by UK's NHS to
power the most complex healthcare in the home. Over the last 5 years, we have
built a sustainable business in the UK, growing at 2-5X YoY to transform healthcare
across >200 healthcare providers. We have proven that we can deliver healthcare
outcomes effectively and at scale, reducing emergencies by 38% and
hospitalisations by 25% to dramatically scale clinical capacity. We have the unique
technology, the clinical evidence, and the business systems to be the #1 operating
system for precision healthcare at home globally 大多数人越来越倾向于在家中自主管理健康需求，这已成为一种不可阻挡的
趋势。Feebris 是一款专为家庭医院设计的操作系统，深受英国国家医疗服务体系 (NHS) 的信赖，
为复杂多变的家庭医疗保健提供了强大可靠的支持。过去五年间，我们
在英国建立了一项可持续业务，同比增长率达 2-5 倍，并助力超过 200 家医疗机构
变革其医疗服务模式。事实证明，我们可以有效地大规模提供医疗服务，
将急诊率降低 38%，住院率降低 25%，
从而大幅提升临床服务能力。我们拥有独特的技术
丰富的临床证据和完善的业务系统，
有信心成为全球领先的家庭精密医疗操作系统

column3: FlashGreen Discount Supermarket promote sustainability by selling near-expiry products through vending machines and mobile APP.
column7: FlashGreen Discount Supermarket is a pioneering social enterprise established in 2022 by university students focused on environmental sustainability. The initiative aims to reduce waste by integrating surplus production resources, enabling consumers to purchase high-quality products at discounted prices. A key innovation is the development of a mobile app that connects with self-service vending machines to sell near-expiry items, promoting responsible consumption. This approach has garnered recognition, including an award at the Geneva Invention Exhibition. The vending machines are strategically placed in schools, offices, and shopping malls to raise awareness about food conservation and waste reduction. In addition to retail operations, FlashGreen actively engages in community outreach to educate the public on sustainability practices. In 2023, the enterprise achieved notable success, winning multiple awards, such as the Champion of the Hong Kong Social Enterprise Challenge and the Most Socially Impactful Award at the Chinese University of Hong Kong Entrepreneurship Competition. FlashGreen 临期折扣超市是一个由大学生于 2022 年创立的创新社会企业，专注于环保和可 持续发展。此计划旨在通过整合生产过剩资源，减少浪费，让消费者以折扣价格购买高品质 商品。为了进一步推广这一理念，FlashGreen 开发了一款手机应用程式，结合自助售卖机， 销售临期产品，倡导负责任的消费行为。这一创新方法在瑞士日内瓦发明展中获得了奖项， 充分体现了我们的社会价值。 FlashGreen 的自助售卖机被战略性地部署于学校、办公室和商 场，旨在提高大众对食物保护和减少浪费的认识。此外，FlashGreen 积极参与社区活动，教 育公众有关可持续发展的实践。 2023 年，FlashGreen 取得了显著成就，荣获多项奖项，包括香港社会企业挑战赛冠军、香港大学生创新及创业大赛的一等奖，以及香港中文大学创业竞赛的最有社会影响力大奖，彰显了其对社会的深远影响。

column7: "Our award-winning product, GoByBus.hk, is Hong Kong’s first and only intercity coach platform. column3: Hydropower Intelli-Recycle System   水力发电智能循环系统
column7: Hydropower Intelli-Recycle System” (HPiRS) turns neglected hydropower into green energy in a building. For large scale decarbonization in Urban Area, HPiRS plays a crucial role in this effort by recycling the untapped energy used for transporting water within buildings. HPiRS is a small, intelligent hydropower system be built in a building. The amount of fresh and sea water used by inhabitants will generate to electricity directly. This innovative solution does not disrupt the water supply or pressure and is suitable for all buildings, without causing any disturbances to the occupants. It is affordable and easy apply. To be the essential apparatus in water tank to generate green energy. As water supply system in the building is essential part in human daily life, no matter we recycle or not, the energy must be used. Garbage can be recycled, why not recycle neglected energy? For long term, the cost is ZERO. HPiRS can also address AI water management for data collection of water usage and safety, as this is unprecedented innovation and application. 水力智能循环系统"（HPiRS） 可将建筑物中被忽视的水力转化为绿色能源。HPiRS 通过回收利用建筑物内用于输送水的未开发能源，在城市地区大规模去碳化的过程中发挥着至关重要的作用。HPiRS 是一种小型智能水力发电系统，可建在建筑物内。居民使用的淡水和海水可以直接发电。这一创新解决方案不会破坏供水或水压，适用于所有建筑，并不会对居住者造成任何干扰。它经济实惠，易于使用，是水箱中产生绿色能源的重要设备。 建筑内的供水系统在人类的日常生活中不可或缺，无论我们是否回收利用，都必须使用能源。垃圾可以回收利用，为什么不能回收利用被忽视的能源呢？从长远来看，这是零成本的。 HPiRS 还可以解决人工智能水管理问题，收集用水和安全数据。这是前所未有的创新和应用。

column3: HakkoBako
column7: Fermentation Chambers

column3: HakkoBako develops innovative fermentation technology to transform food waste into sustainable products for culinary and biotech applications.
column7: HakkoBako is revolutionizing fermentation technology to create sustainable solutions for food and biotech industries. Our advanced fermentation chambers enable precise control of environmental conditions, ensuring consistent and reliable processes. The technology repurposes food waste such as bread scraps, coffee chaff, and vegetable peels into high-value ingredients for culinary innovation and industrial applications. By collaborating with chefs, researchers, and developers, we aim to reduce food waste while fostering creativity in flavor development. Our future plans include launching a benchtop model for labs and food businesses in 2025, developing a consumer-friendly home version in 2026, and scaling up to industrial fermentation rooms by 2027. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, HakkoBako is bridging the gap between food technology and environmental responsibility. HakkoBako 正在革新发酵技术，为食品和生物技术行业创造可持续的解决方案。我们先进的发酵室能够精确控制环境条件，确保处理程序的一致性和可靠性。该技术可将面包屑、咖啡糠和蔬菜皮等食物垃圾转化为高价值配料，用于烹饪创新和工业应用。我们通过与厨师、研究人员和开发人员合作，致力于减少食物浪费，同时提升风味开发的创造力。我们的未来计划包括：在2025 年推出实验室和食品业使用的台式模型，在2026 年开发消费者友好型家用版本，在2027 年将业务扩大到工业发酵室领域。HakkoBako 注重可持续发展和创新，消弥食品技术与环境责任之间的差距。

column3: HealthBridge AI
column7:
HealthBridge AI is transforming healthcare with JarvisMD, a groundbreaking solution designed to reduce doctors’ administrative workloads by up to 70%. Cofounded by a Doctor with over 30 years of clinical expertise and an AI expert who has successfully scaled AI applications to over 17 million users, HealthBridge AI uniquely combines deep medical insight with advanced AI technology. JarvisMD features cutting-edge speech-to-text transcription for clinical summaries and referral letters, along with an AI clinical copilot delivering personalised, evidence-based responses to clinical queries. By streamlining workflows and improving decision-making, HealthBridge AI empowers healthcare professionals to prioritise patient care while enhancing efficiency and accuracy.

column3: E-Commerce Logistics and Showroom Hub in Nice South of France
column7: Project Description: E-Commerce Logistics and Showroom Hub in Nice South of France. This project aims to establish a state-of-the-art logistics hub and showroom in Nice, dedicated to Chinese brands and marketplaces. The objective is to provide a comprehensive solution for cross-border e-commerce by streamlining warehousing, customs clearance, and last-mile delivery across Europe. The integrated showroom will also showcase Chinese products, enabling online brands to access offline sales channels and build partnerships with European buyers. This strategic hub will accelerate market entry, improve delivery efficiency, and promote sustainable logistics solutions.

column3: Hong Kong Chamber of Commerce (Qianhai)
column7: The Hong Kong Chamber of Commerce (Qianhai) was established in Shenzhen on December 7, 2015, which has received strong support from governments at all levels, including the authorities of HKSAR, Guangdong Province, Shenzhen City, and Qianhai Zone. In 2021, as a representative of long-term Hong Kong residents in the Chinese mainland, HKCCQ successfully obtained a seat in the fourth sector of the Hong Kong Election Committee, which participates in the election of the Hong Kong Chief Executive and Legislative Council members. It is the only one non-governmental organization in Shenzhen that has the voting right in Hong Kong official elections. HKCCQ is the first nonprofit-commercial organization mainly composed of Hong Kong-funded enterprises, with a mission to strengthen the relationship between Shenzhen and Hong Kong. Specifically, HKCCQ aims to improve two-way connections of business, human resources, culture, and technology between HKSAR and Chinese Mainland, creating a platform for members, local governments, and other organizations. Currently, HKCCQ has attracted over 300 corporate members, including well-known Hong Kong-funded companies, state-owned enterprises, and SMEs from various industries. 深圳市前海香港商会于2015年12月7日成立，原香港特区行政长官林郑月娥，原香港中联办副主任仇鸿，原广东省委副书记、深圳市委书记马兴瑞，原深圳市委副书记、市长许勤以及招商局集团董事长李建红共同为前海香港商会揭牌，并对商会给予了大力的支持。 《2021年完善选举制度（综合修订）条例草案》通过后，前海香港商会作为内地港人团体代表，在香港选举委员会第四界别分组中获得席位，参与选举行政长官、立法会议员等职责，是深圳唯一一家获得选举投票权的商会，目前商会业务联络主管单位为香港中联办及前海管理局。 深圳市前海香港商会作为第一家由港资企业为主、深港企业结合组成的社会组织，义不容辞的集聚、动员并发挥民间社会资源和力量，将促进深港合作发展为使命，将香港资源引进内地、将内地资源输入香港，实现内地、粤港澳大湾区之间的经济资源、人力资源、文化资源、技术资源共通和分享。前海香港商会将不仅成为会员企业之间交流和合作的平台，也将致力于成为会员企业与粤港澳大湾区其他企业、政府部门、商业机构以及其他组织之间开展合作和沟通的桥梁。前海香港商会目前已汇集了包括新华集团、嘉里建设、华商林李黎（前海）联营律师事务所、招商局集团、华润集团、南海控股、中建国际、普华永道、毕马威、九龙仓、世茂集团、利丰集团、周大福集团、新世界发展有限公司、东亚银行、渣打银行、香江金融等知名企业，企业会员数量超过300家。

column3: Automotive Manufacturing Supply Chain Management Project
column7: The automotive manufacturing supply chain management sector is a multi-hundred-billion-yuan market. The shift towards electric vehicles is driving the ongoing transformation of supply chains. The pursuit of customization at the demand end has led to a massive demand for flexible supply chains, with projections indicating growth to around 500 billion yuan by 2030. The standards for supply chain service providers in the automotive industry are rising: they must offer high levels of informatization and intelligence, possess robust capabilities in flexible planning and execution, exercise stringent collaborative control, and provide a high degree of customization. Meritar digital supply chain management platform streamlines the information chain, captures data, and fosters collaboration among multiple parties. It includes an agile, low-carbon procurement planning module, an efficient and cost-effective transportation planning module, a market-driven inventory control module that spans the entire process, a supplier quality management module, an AI-powered supplier prediction and control module, and a safe, energy-efficient asset operations and maintenance module. This platform enables real-time decision-making for every transaction, every link, and every planning stage and design efficiency in the supply chain, while conveying critical information and operational specifics. Meritar intelligent logistics equipment platform is tailored for in-factory logistics scenarios. Its rich semantic structure and navigation algorithms allow for the integration of diverse mainstream robots, enabling them to operate under a unified interface with a common language and logic. It can select complex actions based on the scenario at hand and facilitates superior human-machine interaction. With our proprietary Meritar digital supply chain management platform and Meritar intelligent logistics equipment platform, we cater to the needs of automotive manufacturers such as Geely Automobile, BYD Automobile, and Stellantis, as well as multinational automotive component suppliers like Bosch, ZF, Magna, and CATL etc. Since our inception 10 years ago, we have sustained an average annual growth rate of 50%, and we now have 20 branches across China, covering key automotive production bases. Internationally, we have established subsidiaries in the Philippines, Malaysia, Mexico, and Indonesia, and we maintain stable cooperative relationships with service organizations in Europe, North America, Japan, and South Korea, thus creating a global network.

column3: Home blood-potassium monitoring
column7: High blood potassium (hyperkalemia) is a common result of many chronic diseases and medications for them—eg chronic kidney disease (CKD), heart failure (HF), hypertension—and causes heart attacks and huge treatment costs. Medicare alone spends $41B/year on hyperkalemia. However, patients can't measure and control their potassium to control costs. Hylid Diagnostics will put a cost-effective and lab-accurate meter in the hands of patients, allowing them to get frequent feedback on their potassium levels from a fingerprick drop of blood. Measurements will also be sent to physicians, who can oversee care remotely, with AI assistance. This will allow effective management, and the ability to accurately dose recently-cleared counteracting medications. Our team has decades of experience in designing, manufacturing, and global marketing of hospital-based blood testing equipment, including the Siemens epoc handheld blood analyzer (as well as systems for Abbott, Fresenius, etc). We’re now applying this experience where it’s needed most: to help patients help themselves. 高血钾（高血钾症）是许多慢性病和药物治疗（例如慢性肾病 [CKD]、心衰 [HF]、高血压）的常见后果，会引发心脏病，带来极高的治疗成本。仅 Medicare 医疗保险就在高钾血症上每年支出 410 亿美元。然而，患者无法测量并控制自身血钾，以控制这种支出。 Hylid Diagnostics 将为患者手中提供一种高性价比且与实验室中一样精确的测量设备，让他们只需从指尖采血，便能不时获取自身血钾数据。测量结果也将发往医生处，其可进行远程监控，运用 AI 辅助。这能够提供有效管理，还能精准补充近期已代谢出的拮抗药物。 我们的团队在设计、制造和全球销售基于医院的血检设备方面具有数十年经验，所涉设备包括西门子 EPOC 手持式血气分析仪（以及雅培、费森尤斯等品牌的系统）。我们现在将会把这一经验运用到最需要的地方：帮助患者助力自身。

column3: Keeping fresh food fresh at room temperature  让新鲜食品在常温下保持新鲜
column7: IXON has developed and patented Advanced Sous-vide Aseptic Packaging (ASAP) technology that revolutionizes food preservation. This breakthrough enables meats, seafood, and ready meals to stay fresh at room temperature for up to two years without preservatives or refrigeration. Our technology has proven its commercial viability through successful pilot production runs with major food manufacturers in Asia and North America. Having secured our first commercial orders, we are positioned for rapid growth. The market opportunity is substantial, with the global ready meals market projected to reach USD 156 billion by 2025, alongside a USD 340 billion cold chain logistics market. Growing demand for shelf-stable premium foods further validates our trajectory. Investment will accelerate production capacity scaling, market expansion, commercial partnership development, and IP portfolio strengthening. IXON 已研发并取得「先进真空低温无菌包装」(ASAP) 技术专利，彻底革新食品保存方式。这项突破性技术让肉类、海鲜和预制菜无需防腐剂或冷藏，便可在室温下保存长达两年。我们的技术通过在亚洲和北美洲主要食品制造商的试产测试，证实具商业可行性。在取得首批商业订单后，我们已准备好迎接快速增长。市场机遇庞大，全球预制菜市场预计到2025年将达到1,560亿美元，冷链物流市场规模将达到3,400亿美元。对优质常温食品日益增长的需求进一步验证了我们的发展方向。投资将用于加快产能扩充、市场拓展、商业伙伴关系发展以及知识产权组合强化。

column7: JS-TJZ Sojourn Properties Limited Partnership Fund (the “Fund”) focuses on investment opportunities in Osaka vacation rental development projects, aiming to achieve rapid multi-rounds returns. The fund primarily invests in a trust structure known as Specified Beneficiary Securities Issuance Trust (“SIST”)in Japan, with the underlying asset being land designated for the development of vacation rental properties in Osaka. By employing foreign exchange hedging strategies, the fund effectively mitigates the risk of USDJPY exchange rate fluctuations. The General Partner, JS Group, adopts an integrated tourism-focused operational model, specializing in brownfield projects that encompass acquisition, development and sales of the pr operties. This approach maximizes capital efficiency and delivers capital appreciation for fund shareholders. Investment Strategies **・Value-Added Fund：**The fund focuses on acquiring and holding land for the development or renovation of Minpaku-style real estate properties to meet the demand for high-quality vacation rental accommodations in the Osaka market. ・Experienced Team Strong Execution Abilities: The General Partner, JS Group, is a market leader in developing and operating Osaka’s vacation rental accommodation. With a well-established development and management process and a target-driven sales team, JS Group ensures a seamless process from asset enhancement to facilitate rapid e**&**xits from development projects. ・Efficient Execution with Cost-Effective Operations： With JS Group’s dominant market position, the fund achieves high efficiency and low-cost project execution, thus shortening the asset appreciation cycle.

column7: Kayamo welcomes long-term investors interested in joining us through an equity investment to accelerate our regional expansion and innovation roadmap. Kayamo is a digital lending platform that provides underserved micro and small businesses with fast, accessible working capital solutions. Leveraging proprietary analytics, alternative data sources, and local market insights, Kayamo streamlines the loan application and approval process—often delivering funding within days. By integrating with leading online marketplaces and community groups, we identify promising entrepreneurs, mitigate risk through data-driven underwriting, and foster inclusive economic growth in the ASEAN region’s vital MSME sector. __________ Kayamo is striking strategic partnerships towards building a nationwide MSME database strengthening support ecosystems. Kayamo is partnering with grassroots communities, private entrepreneurial networks, and government agencies to spearhead the development of a nationwide database of MSME activity in the Philippines. This database will pull from various alternative data sources that capture the reality of grassroots entrepreneurship. It will serve as the backbone for a more meaningful MSME support ecosystem—enabling new products and services, more targeted programs, and opportunities for more stakeholders to participate in growing this underserved sector. In the Philippine context, where MSMEs are vital yet often lack access to resources, such an initiative is essential. Kayamo’s extensive partnerships and regional networks make it a potent player to lead this effort. By launching more services catering to various industry sectors, we are building towards this nationwide database, further empowering MSMEs and supporting entrepreneurial success nationwide. Kayamo正与基层社区、私人创业网络和政府机构合作，率先建立菲律宾全国MSME活动数据库。该数据库将从多种替代数据源获取，真实反映基层创业。它将成为更有意义的MSME支持生态系统的基础，推动新产品和服务、更有针对性的项目，以及更多利益相关者参与发展这一欠服务的部门。在菲律宾，MSME虽重要但常缺资源，此举必不可少。Kayamo广泛的合作和区域网络使其有力领导此项工作。通过推出更多行业服务，我们正构建这一全国性数据库，进一步赋能MSME，支持全国创业成功

column3: Energy Efficient HEPA
column7: According to the WHO, air pollutions is a silent killer that has affected 99% of household and killed more than 3 million people annually. Nanoparticles are particularly bad as they tend to get everywhere, and only removed using HEPA filters. However, traditional HEPA filters are not suited for typical HVAC system due to higher power requirement. Our nanofiber-based filter-media can turn any central HVAC system into an air-purifier, which is akin to LED, able to replace traditional media with a more energy efficient and longer lasting product. Not only does our filter-media captures harmful particles efficiently, but it will also enhance the HVAC system by extending their operational life. With our technology, we can now create clean, dust-free environment at a lower cost, easing access to high-end production rooms and better healthcare environments. Our nanofiber-based filter-media grants low-cost access to clean air, necessary for advanced manufacturing process, better health for the occupants, and improve longevity of equipment.  Our product have the potential to improve the life and efficiency in practically all aspect of modern life. 据世卫组织称，空气污染是一个沉默的杀手，影响了99%的家庭，每年造成300多万人死亡。纳米颗粒特别有害，因为它们往往无处不在，并且只能使用HEPA过滤器去除。但是，由于功率要求较高，传统的 HEPA 过滤器不适合典型的 HVAC 系统。 我们基于纳米纤维的过滤介质可以将任何中央 HVAC 系统变成类似于 LED 的空气净化器，能够用更节能、更持久的产品取代传统介质。 我们的过滤介质不仅能有效捕获有害颗粒，还能通过延长其使用寿命来增强 HVAC 系统。 凭借我们的技术，我们现在可以以更低的成本创造清洁、无尘的环境，以便人们轻松进入高端生产室和更好的医疗保健环境。 我们基于纳米纤维的过滤介质可实现低成本的清洁空气获取，这是先进制造工艺所必需的，能够改善用户的健康，并延长设备的使用寿命。 我们的产品有可能改善生活以及现代生活几乎所有方面的效率。
column8: Consumer,Healthcare Technology,Manufacturing Technology,Infrastructure and Real Estate Services,Environment, Energy and Clean Technology

column3: Kilde
column7: Kilde is a cutting-edge investment platform designed to provide individual investors seamless access to private credit opportunities traditionally reserved for institutional players. As a regulated entity licensed under Singapore’s Monetary Authority, Kilde ensures a secure and transparent investment experience. The platform specializes in high-yield, asset-backed lending, offering investments in debt instruments with annualized returns ranging from 11% to 15%. These investments are secured by cash-generating receivables from non-banking financial institutions (NBFIs) operating in high-growth markets like Southeast Asia, Central Asia, and Europe. Kilde prioritizes capital preservation while maintaining attractive yields by focusing on senior-secured, first-lien debt structures. With a proven track record of a 0% default rate since its inception in 2019, Kilde employs a rigorous, institutional-grade risk assessment process, leveraging proprietary machine-learning algorithms to evaluate borrower creditworthiness. Monthly cash coupons and flexible redemption options ensure liquidity and consistent returns for investors. The platform simplifies the investment process, from onboarding and deal discovery to portfolio management, offering real-time dashboards and automated deal selection through its proprietary AutoInvest function. By eliminating traditional barriers like high minimum investments and extensive due diligence requirements, Kilde democratizes access to private credit investments, saving investors substantial transaction costs.

column3: KIN Farms - Working with better Farms on Branding and Distributing sustainable food products to our Hotel Chain, Global Catering and Retail partners
column7: KIN Farms offers ingredients farmed in harmony with nature. In a world where food origins and farming practices are often unclear, we prioritize transparency and reject systems that prioritize cheap production over ingredient quality and environmental health. Our mission is to bring better farms to you—providing better food for our KIN and yours. Founded by renowned restaurateurs Matt Reid, Malcolm Wood, and Jonathan Yeoh, KIN Farms aims to transform the way we eat by sourcing essential ingredients with significantly lower carbon footprints, promoting soil health, ethical farming, and competitive pricing against industrial farming. Today, KIN Farms leads the local organic and cage-free egg markets in Hong Kong, anticipating the sale of over 6 million eggs in the coming year. We recently placed third in the prestigious Rosewood Foundation/Brinc Food Innovation and Sustainable Agriculture Technology Competition, a testament to our successful model. In 2025, KIN Farms plans to expand beyond Hong Kong into Singapore, Thailand, and the UAE as well continue to launch more essential ingredients for our chef’s and supermarkets. We are looking for strategic partners to join in scaling and growing in this growth sector in Food

column3: KlickPoints
column7: Our solution solves one simple but big problem. Break the barrier between traffic sources and location-based merchants. When you're a traffic source which gets a lot of attention, you can basically sell any products and earn potentially a lot of commissions. However, you can't do the same for restaurants, hotels, stores and etc, because there are no solutions in the market which verify the transactions you generate for these location-based businesses. Our solution is tailor-made for this. Through various features, we record all revenue a traffic source generates. We address this simple but important problem by empowering performance-based collaboration between traffic sources and location-based businesses, recording and analyzing which traffic sources work best for what location-based businesses, and settling the international payments as a third party between innumerable traffic sources and businesses. 我们的方案专注于解决一个简单但极其重要的问题，即打破流量来源和基于位置的商家之间的壁垒。 这个问题之所以重要，一方面是因为年轻人和下一代消费者将会越来越多地依赖这些流量来源获取信息，另一方面，以旅游消费为代表，我们面向的市场规模的每年的总额都超过一万亿美元。 成为一个备受关注的流量来源意味着您基本上可以销售任何产品，并可能赚取丰厚的佣金。但是，这对于餐馆、酒店及商店却无法实现同样的效果，因为市场上没有任方案可以验证您为这些基于位置的业务带来交易。我们的方案就是为此量身定制的，并可以通过多种功能来记录流量来源所产生的所有收入。 我们通过以下方式解决这个简单而重要的问题： 增强流量来源和基于位置的业务之的绩效合作。 记录并分析哪些流量来源最适合哪些基于位置的业务，以及 作为大量流量来源和商家之间的第三方来处理国际支付结算。

column3: We enable ultrahigh-speed optical interconnections and computing by our scalable and cost-effective photonic system-on-chip solutions.
column7: In today’s AI data centers, the demands for massive information transmission and processing are becoming increasingly stringent. However, traditional electronic chips are limited by bandwidth and high energy consumption, significantly hindering the further development of AI. To address these bottlenecks, we utilize the most advanced integrated photonic chips as a solution, replacing traditional electronics with photons for information transmission and processing. Our chips offer high speed, large bandwidth, low latency, and low energy consumption, meeting the future needs for high-bandwidth signal interconnection, sensing, and computing. This technology serves various applications, including AI, 6G, microwave/terahertz wireless communication, quantum technology, autonomous driving, low-altitude economy, and smart cities. 當今AI資料中心對於資訊的傳遞和處理越發嚴苛。然而傳統電子晶片進行資訊處理時頻寬有限且能耗巨大，極大限制了AI的進一步發展。針對這些瓶頸，我們採用最先進的集成光子晶片作為解決方案，即用光子來代替傳統電子進行資訊傳輸和處理。我們的集晶片高速率、大頻寬、延遲低、能耗小，可以滿足未來高頻寬信號互連、傳感以及計算的需求，從而服務於AI、6G、微波/太赫茲無線通訊、量子技術、自動駕駛、低空經濟、智慧城市等場景。 当今AI数据中心对于信息的传递和处理越发严苛。然而传统电子芯片进行信息处理时带宽有限且能耗巨大，极大限制了AI的进一步发展。针对这些瓶颈，我们采用最先进的集成光子芯片作为解决方案，即用光子来代替传统电子进行信息传输和处理。我们的集芯片高速率、大带宽、延迟低、能耗小，可以满足未来高带宽信号互连、传感以及计算的需求，从而服务于AI、6G、微波/太赫兹无线通讯、量子技术、自动驾驶、低空经济、智慧城市等场景。

column3: RapidMarket is a low-latency market quotation system independently developed by LTP.   |   RapidMarket是LTP独立研发的低延迟市场报价系统。
column7:
RapidMarket is a low-latency market quotation system independently developed by LTP. The application requires two servers, one on the host end and one on the client end, communicating via ZeroMQ. An independent server is required for deployment on the client end. in order to receive optimized market data. Supported exchanges and products:
• Exchanges: Binance, Coinbase, OKX, Bybit, Gate.io, Kucoin, Deribit
• Trading Products: Spot, COIN-futures, USDT-futures The system is highly stable, cross-platform, and cross-programming language:
• High Stability: Subscription is available via multiple IPs with aggregated quotations, so that data stability and continuity can be ensured when a single subscription is disconnected
• Cross-Platform: The client side supports Windows, Linux, & macOS systems
• Cross-Language: Most major programming languages are supported. We provide examples for Python & C++ RapidMarket 是 LTP 自主研发的低延迟行情系统，应用需要两台服务器，一台在主机端，一台在客户端，通过 ZeroMQ 通信，客户端需要部署独立服务器，以便接收优化的行情数据。 支持的交易所及产品：
• 交易所：Binance、Coinbase、OKX、Bybit、Gate.io、Kucoin、Deribit
• 交易产品：现货、COIN-期货、USDT-期货 系统稳定性高，跨平台、跨编程语言：
• 高稳定性：可通过多个 IP 进行聚合报价订阅，当单个订阅断开时，可以保证数据的稳定性和连续性
• 跨平台：客户端支持 Windows、Linux 和 macOS 系统
• 跨语言：支持大多数主流编程语言，我们提供 Python 和 C++ 的示例

column3: Building An Optimal Logistics Portfolio  |  建立最佳物流组合
column7:
Businesses Consistently Have To Confront Geo-Political & Economic Risks Across Their Supply Chain Networks; From Changes In Customer Demands, To Supply Chain Disruptions, To Financial Concerns!.....The List Is Countless! Think Of An Inter-modal Transport Service Provider, Whether Inland Or Across The Sea, Transporting Freight Will Come Across Various Challenges - Shifting Of Goods Across Vehicles, Ships, Planes, etc - Warehousing, Storage Requirements - Inventory Management & Documentation - Insurance Coverage (Like Cost Of Goods In Transit) - etc Developing A Sustainable Logistics Network Requires Addressing These & Several More Risks! Read The Full Analysis At: https://magentacore.net/investment-log/f/building-an-optimal-logistics-portfolio 企业在整个供应链网络中不断面临地缘政治和经济风险；
从客户需求变化到供应链中断，再到财务问题！......数不胜数的清单！
想象一家多式联运服务提供商，
无论是陆运还是海运，货物运输都会遇到各种挑战
货物在各种交通工具间转移，包括车辆、船只、飞机等
仓储、存储需求
库存管理和文件记录
保险覆盖范围（如在途货物成本）
等等
建立可持续的物流网络需要解决这些风险以及其他风险！
阅读完整分析请访问：
https://magentacore.net/investment-log/f/building-an-optimal-logistics-portfolio

column3: Smart Traffic Management  |  智能交通管理
column7:
Leveraging Big Data Analysis, Traffic Density & Demographics Can Be Assessed To Potentially Develop Fruitful Solutions, Without Excessive Financial Burden To Fiscal & Municipal Government Budgets! Channeling This "Analytics Intelligence" To A Traffic Management System, Can Prioritize Traffic & Monitor Pollution Output [Predictive Analytics]; However, Risk Management Will Still Be Required! As No Cloud Or IoT System [etc] Is 100% Accurate! "False Positives & False Negatives" For Example: Energy Consumption & Sourcing Will Have To Be Considered! This Is Due To The Negative Impact That Big Data Centers Can Have Over The Environment, Due To Significant Quantities Of Electricity Required To Power Up These Systems; Read The Full Analysis At: https://magentacore.net/investment-log/f/smart-city-development---traffic-planning 利用大数据分析，可以评估交通密度和人口统计数据，从而制定有潜能并有效的解决方案，而不会给财政和市政府预算带来过多的财务负担！
将这种“分析智能”引入交通管理系统，可以优先考虑交通并监测污染排放[预测分析];
然而，仍然需要风险管理！因为没有云端或物联网系统等是百分之百的准确度！
""假阳性和假阴性""
例如：
必须考虑能源消耗和采购！
这是因为大数据中心对环境可能造成负面影响，而且这些系统需要大量电力来运行；
阅读完整分析请访问：
https://magentacore.net/investment-log/f/smart-city-development---traffic-planning

column3: Water Conservation & Sustainability  |  水资源保护与可持续发展
column7:
With The Disruptive Impact Of Climate Change, & The Growing Demands For Water From Industrial & Agriculture; It Is A Pressing Requirement For The Public & Private Sectors To Implement More Efficient Water Management & Conservation Planning Whilst Governments Have A Key Role To Play; Market Sectors Like Semi-Conductor & Farming, Need To Urgently Implement Better Water Utilization & Conservation Strategies Further, Better Water Management For Homes Can Significantly Improve Water Availability ESG Doesn't Have To Be A Burden For Finance; If Harmonized, It Can Be A Driver Of Efficient Financing & Sustainability 随着气候变化的破坏性影响以及工业和农业对水资源的需求日益增长，公共和私营部门迫切需要实施更有效的水资源管理和保护规划。
尽管政府发挥着关键作用，但半导体和农业等市场部门需要紧急实施更好的水资源利用和保护策略。
此外，更好的家庭用水管理可以显著提高水资源的可用性。
环境、社会和公司治理（ESG）对于金融业并不是负担；如果协调一致，它可以成为有效融资和可持续性的驱动力。

column3: Healthcare access platform   医疗保健平台
column7: The healthcare platform it is a app that allows access to a part of the population in need of care, taking care and empowerment of the entire process of the patient experience (end to end). Our platform is user-friendly, simple and of great added value for everyone. We serve the 10 most sought after medical specialties such as: Internal Medicine, Pediatrics, General Surgery, Gynecology and Obstetrics, Anesthesiology, Occupational Medicine, Orthopedics, Traumatology, Cardiology, Ophthalmology and Radiology and Diagnostic Imaging. Our business model is low cost. We offer a platform that allows users to access healthcare, saving not only money but also time for commuting. The application locates the offices closest to where the patient is, offering two options of offices for scheduling. Payment for the consultation is made at the time of scheduling, in the application by credit and/or debit card. Once the patient has completed the consultation, all their data is saved in a cloud base that is periodically updated with the patient's history. The patient has access to their history of appointments, exams and medications. The application also allows integration of relationship data with specialized clinics and other services such as ambulances and wakes. The doctor at the office uses a robot that, using artificial intelligence, can consult the symptoms to identify the disease and recommend the most appropriate treatment. Healthcare platform是一个应用程序，帮助需要护理的人群获得护理，全面管理患者体验过程的各个环节（端到端）。我们的平台便于用户使用，操作简单，能为每个人带来巨大的附加价值。我们为 10 个最受欢迎的医学专科提供服务，例如 内科、儿科、普通外科、妇产科、麻醉科、职业医学科、骨科、创伤科、心脏科、眼科、放射科和影像诊断科。我们的商业模式是低成本模式。我们提供的平台使用户能够获得医疗服务，不仅节省了金钱，还节省了通勤时间。 该应用程序能找到离病人最近的诊室，并提供两种诊室供病人选择。预约时可在应用程序中使用信用卡和/或借记卡支付诊费。 病人完成咨询后，其所有数据都会保存在一个云数据库中，该数据库会定期更新病人的历史记录。患者可以查看自己的预约、检查和用药历史。该应用程序还可以将关系资料与专科诊所和其他服务（如救护车和叫醒服务）进行整合。医生在诊室里使用的机器人可以利用人工智能咨询症状，识别疾病并推荐最合适的治疗方法。

column7: McLantis Group is focused in the designing, developing and production of high performance pre-press equipments, laser imaging equipments, digital printing machine and consumables, including CTP machine, CTCP machine, CTS machine, digital printing machine, LDI machine, auxiliary washing machine, auxiliary drying oven, offset printing plate, conventional PS plate, CTP plate, CTCP plate, screen printing emulsion etc. And, we commit to the development and research in laser photonics, imaging, material handling, robotics and automation. McLantis has been supporting its customers worldwide for many years in the fields of printing industry, PCB industry and various manufacturing industry. McLantis GroupMcLantis Group is a group of factories of pre-press equipments, laser imaging equipments, digital printing machine and consumables. McLantis Group is started as a prepress solution provider by Shanghai McLantis Printing Technology Co.,Ltd, Shanghai Yaxing Printing Plates Factory, Jiangsu MIGAS laser technology factory and Beijing Kylin Software Technology Co.,Ltd. McLantis Group also establishes the laser technology R&D center in Beijing and Jiangsu. McLantis Group is a joint venture by UK and China. McLantis prides itself on an integrated production and R&D bases inside China. We fully understand the international standards inline with standard technology work. Coupled with this, after years of experience, we have established a unique understanding of cutting edge technology of international printing, electronic and MEMS market. McLantis Group 专注于设计、开发和生产高性能的印前设备、激光成像设备、数字印刷机和耗材，包括CTP机、CTCP机、CTS机、数字印刷机、LDI机、辅助洗版机、辅助烘干炉、胶印版、常规PS版、CTP版、CTCP版、丝网印刷感光乳胶等。我们致力于激光光子学、成像、物料处理、机器人技术和自动化的开发和研究。目前，McLantis掌握了几项核心技术，包括激光MEMS微封装技术、DLP数字处理系统技术、高精度镜头技术和精密运动控制系统，并获得了多项专利和软件版权。多年来，McLantis一直在印刷行业、PCB行业和各种制造业领域为全球客户提供支持。 McLantis Group是一家印前设备、激光成像设备、数字印刷机和耗材的工厂集团。McLantis Group由上海McLantis Printing Technology Co.,Ltd、上海亚星印刷版厂、江苏MIGAS激光技术工厂和北京麒麟软件技术有限公司等公司共同创立成为一家印前解决方案提供商。并且还在北京和江苏建立了激光技术研发中心。 McLantis Group是中英合资企业，在中国拥有一体化生产和研发基地。我们充分了解国际标准，并采用标准技术开展工作。此外，经过多年累积的经验使我们对国际印刷、电子和MEMS市场的前沿技术有了独特的理解。

column7: Bio-K Plus International, A Kerry Company是加拿大领先的（益生菌）生物科技公司，1994年在加拿大魁北克省蒙特利尔市成立，20多年来始终专注于益生菌的产品研发、临床医学研究和市场推广。Bio-K+®益生菌的独家专利配方在益生菌中独树一帜，因为它是唯一获得加拿大卫生部批准用于预防抗生素相关性腹泻和与抗生素一起使用时预防艰难梭菌相关性腹泻的益生菌。 迄今为止，已有超过3.5万名服用过Bio-K+®益生菌的患者被作为临床医学研究案例，验证其品质及功效的学术论文在世界上众多权威的同业评论期刊上发表，其中包括《美国胃肠病学杂志》和《临床传染病》。Bio-K+®益生菌胶囊采用“靶向释放技术”特殊制作工艺，可确保益生菌到达人体肠道时仍然存活。Bio-K+®益生菌目前在加拿大和美国的保健食品商店、超市和药房广泛销售。Bio-K+® 益生菌已连续8年被评为加拿大药剂师最愿意推荐的益生菌品牌，也是美国保健食品商店最畅销的益生菌品牌之一。Bio-K+® 益生菌适用于: (1) 调节肠道菌群，平衡和改善肠道功能; (2) 恢复肠道菌群健康，提高机体免疫力; (3)降低因服用抗生素引发的腹泻风险; (4)降低艰难梭菌引发的腹泻和肠炎风险。 Looking for investor, possible trade, R&D, Clinical Trial in Hong Kong and GBA.

column7: Global Supply Chain Management, Foreight Trade Zone Solutions in Canada, USA, China, managing Global Avaition companies MRO and Parts Depots in FTZ , successfuly provide FTZ solutions to investors for manufacturing with duty free solutions; E-commerce Solutions with trade and customs compliance in Canada, USA, and China; Tier 1 supplier for Airbus, Bombardier in aviation tooling/jigs/parts manufacture, M&A project on aviation industry; Project owner(Rep. of Bio-K+ Probiotics, Canada No. 1 functional Probiotics); MEA Group 提供全球供应链管理，加拿大、美国、中国的FTZ外贸区保税仓库/保税制造的解决方案，协助投资者在加拿大设厂，提供全面的解决方案； MEA Aviation 为自贸区的全球航空公司MRO维修和零部件仓库, 空客、庞巴迪航空工装/夹具/零部件的制造，并在航空行业有投资和并购的意向； MEA 为投资者提供自贸区的保税入口制造和物流供应链的解决方案，以免税入区的方案进行保税制造，出口美国；MEA E-commerce也为加拿大、美国和中国贸易和海关合规的电子商务解决方案；MEA healthcare 是加拿大第一功能性益生菌Bio-K+益生菌在亚洲的推广和销售代表。 谢谢！

column3: Hong Kong-based superfood technology company dedicated to developing new protein products using sustainable ingredients.
column7: Tiga Milk (Tiger Nut Oat Milk) combines three high-quality plant ingredients: tiger nuts, oats, and unscented soybeans. Through a complex formula and patented enzymatic technology, it enhances the nutritional composition of plant milk and improves the protein content. Additionally, it is sugar-free and uses the natural sweetness of plants to achieve a smoother and richer taste. It is a perfect complement to various tea beverages, allowing you to experience a new and delightful local plant milk experience 太加奶结合三种优质植物原料，虎坚果、燕麦和无腥味大豆。透过复合配方和专利的酶解技术，提升植物奶的营养成分，完善蛋白质。同时，无添加糖，以植物的天然甜分，使口感更顺滑，更浓郁。完美配合不同茶饮应用，感受本地香甜馥浓的植物奶新体验。

column3: AI-driven platform for optimizing sales, retention, and customer service processes in the insurance industry.
column7: MediMe Ltd is an advanced InsurTech company established in 2020, based in Israel. The company specializes in AI-driven solutions designed to enhance efficiency in the insurance sector. MediMe's platform focuses on optimizing sales, retention, and customer service processes through its innovative technology. The solutions include tools for one-click policy comparisons, detailed analytics on coverage options, and interactive customer support features, like smart bots linked to a robust database. These tools collectively help insurance companies streamline operations, improve customer engagement, and maximize sales opportunities. MediMe operates on a hybrid pricing model, blending subscription fees with success-based commissions, aiming to cater to a diverse client base including insurance companies, agents, and consultants. The company seeks investment to expand its capabilities and market reach, enhancing its position as a leader in the InsurTech industry. MediMe Ltd是一家成立于2020年的先进保险科技公司，总部位于以色列本尼布拉克。该公司专注于开发基于人工智能的解决方案，旨在提高保险行业的效率。MediMe的平台专注于通过创新技术优化销售、客户保留和客户服务流程。解决方案包括一键比较保单的工具、关于覆盖选项的详细分析以及交互式客户支持功能，如与强大数据库连接的智能机器人。这些工具共同帮助保险公司简化运营、提高客户参与度并最大化销售机会。MediMe采用混合定价模式，结合订阅费和基于成功的佣金，旨在服务于包括保险公司、代理人和顾问在内的多样化客户群。公司寻求投资以扩展其能力和市场覆盖范围，增强其作为保险科技行业领导者的地位。

column3: US Merchant Banking Firm Virgo Partners Led Smart Home Appliances R&D Center in Asia   美国商业银行 Virgo Partners 在亚洲成立智能家电研发中心
column7: Overview Virgo Partners is leading the initiative to build a Smart Home AI Appliance R&D Center focuses on research, development, and innovation in smart home technology, especially appliances that are powered by AI. This center would aim to design and test appliances that improve convenience, energy efficiency, security, and comfort in the home. Here are some key aspects and goals for such an R&D center: 1. Smart Appliance Integration Develop AI-powered appliances, such as refrigerators, washing machines, ovens, and vacuums, that can learn from user behavior to optimize performance. Focus on cross-device compatibility, enabling seamless integration and communication between appliances. 2. Voice and Gesture Control Enable natural voice and gesture interfaces for appliances, allowing users to control devices intuitively. Work on multi-language and contextual understanding for international market adaptability. 3. Data Privacy and Security Implement secure data handling protocols to ensure user data privacy. Research advanced encryption, anonymization, and local processing solutions for sensitive home environments. 4. Energy Efficiency and Sustainability Develop AI models that help appliances use power more efficiently, potentially reducing energy consumption and environmental impact. Work with smart grids and renewable energy sources to sync appliance usage with energy availability. 5. Personalization and Adaptability Create adaptable appliances that personalize their functionality based on user preferences and lifestyle patterns. Develop AI algorithms that can adapt to seasonal or situational changes, like higher fridge cooling during warmer months. 6. Health and Wellness Monitoring Integrate health and wellness tracking features, such as monitoring air quality, water purification levels, and food freshness. Collaborate with healthcare data systems to alert users of potential hazards or opportunities for health improvements. 7. Predictive Maintenance Implement AI diagnostics that predict when maintenance or repairs will be needed, potentially reducing appliance downtime and repair costs. Use sensors and data analytics to monitor the condition of appliance components continuously. 8. Remote Access and Control Develop robust mobile and web applications for remote monitoring and control. Allow users to track appliance usage, manage settings, and receive notifications remotely. 9. User-Friendly Design and AI Transparency Design appliances that are user-friendly, accessible, and transparent about AI-driven actions. Provide users with insights into how AI influences appliance behavior, offering options to adjust or disable specific features. 10. Collaboration with Smart Home Ecosystems Partner with other smart home systems (like lighting, security, and HVAC) for enhanced interoperability. Explore integrations with virtual assistants (e.g., Google Assistant, Alexa) to expand capabilities. A Smart Home AI Appliance R&D Center could help shape the future of intelligent living spaces by bringing together the latest AI and IoT technologies for real-world applications, helping make homes smarter, safer, and more sustainable. 概述 Virgo Partners 正在牵头建立一个_智能家居人工智能家电研发中心_，专注于智能家居技术的研究、开发和创新，特别是由人工智能驱动的家电。该中心的目标是设计和测试能够提高家庭便利性、能源效率、安全性和舒适性的电器。以下是该研发中心的一些主要方面和目标： 1. 智能家电集成 开发人工智能驱动的电器，如冰箱、洗衣机、烤箱和吸尘器，这些电器可以从用户行为中学习，从而优化性能。 关注跨设备兼容性，实现家电之间的无缝集成和通信。 2. 语音和手势控制 实现家电的自然语音和手势界面，让用户能够直观地控制设备。 努力实现多语言和语境理解，以适应国际市场。 3. 数据隐私与安全 实施安全数据处理协议，确保用户数据隐私。 为敏感的家庭环境研究先进的加密、匿名化和本地处理解决方案。 4. 能源效率与可持续发展 开发人工智能模型，帮助电器更高效地使用电力，从而降低能耗和对环境的影响。 与智能电网和可再生能源合作，使电器使用与能源供应同步。 5. 个性化和适应性 创造可调节的根据用户的偏好和生活模式个性化其功能的家电。 开发能够适应季节或环境变化的人工智能算法，比如在温暖的月份提高冰箱制冷量。 6. 健康监测 整合健康和保健跟踪功能，如监测空气质量、水净化水平和食品新鲜度。 与医疗保健数据系统合作，提醒用户潜在的危害或改善健康的机会。 7. 预测性维护 实施人工智能诊断，预测何时需要维护或维修，从而减少设备停机时间和维修成本。 使用传感器和数据分析技术，持续监测家电部件的状况。 8. 远程访问和控制 开发强大的移动和网络应用程序，用于远程监控。 允许用户跟踪设备使用情况、管理设置并远程接收通知。 9. 用户友好型设计和人工智能透明度 设计出对用户友好、易于访问、人工智能驱动的操作透明的设备。 让用户了解人工智能如何影响设备行为，提供调整或禁用特定功能的选项。 10. 与智能家居生态系统合作 与其他智能家居系统（如照明、安防和暖通空调）合作，增强互操作性。 探索与虚拟助手（如谷歌助手、Alexa）的集成，以扩展功能。 智能家居人工智能设备研发中心可将最新的人工智能和物联网技术应用于现实世界，帮助塑造未来的智能生活空间，使家庭更智能、更安全、更可持续。 "
column8: Consumer,Manufacturing Technology,Digital Entertainment and Media,Infrastructure and Real Estate Services

column2: Midwest USA Chinese Chamber of Commerce
column3: US Merchant Banking Firm Virgo Partners Led Iconic Double Ring Ferris Wheel Project in Zhongshan
column7: Overview An Iconic Double Ring Ferris Wheel is a conceptual or proposed design for a Ferris wheel that features two interconnected, concentric rings. This design would set it apart from traditional Ferris wheels by offering a unique visual and structural appeal. It might rotate as a single entity or with the rings moving independently, providing a novel experience for passengers. Key Features Two Intertwined Rings: The double-ring design consists of two rotating rings, which could move together or separately. This innovative structure offers the possibility of more cabins and a dynamic experience. Aesthetic Appeal: The design is visually striking and could symbolize unity, infinity, or duality. It would likely serve as an iconic landmark, drawing attention for its unique shape and design. Engineering Complexity: Building a double-ring Ferris wheel presents engineering challenges, particularly in terms of structural integrity, weight distribution, and how the two rings would rotate. Advanced engineering solutions would be required to ensure the safety and functionality of the structure. Enhanced Ride Experience: With two rings, this Ferris wheel could offer more cabins and possibly different movement dynamics, such as rotating in opposite directions or at varying speeds, enhancing the experience for riders. Symbolic Design: The dual-ring structure could represent themes like balance, eternity, or interconnectedness, which could make it a meaningful cultural or city symbol. Examples & Similar Projects While not a widespread or established design yet, the idea of a double-ring Ferris wheel shares similarities with other landmark Ferris wheels: London Eye: Although not a double-ring, this large observation wheel is an iconic structure known for its unique design and 360-degree views. Global Ferris Wheel Projects: Cities worldwide, like Las Vegas and Singapore, have proposed or built large Ferris wheels. A double-ring design would be a unique variation on these popular attractions. Benefits Tourism: The double-ring Ferris wheel would be a major tourist draw, offering panoramic views and a thrilling ride experience. Urban Icon: Its distinctive design could become an iconic symbol of the city, enhancing the skyline and city branding. Commercial Opportunities: The large space created by the double rings could host retail, dining, or entertainment venues, adding economic value. Cultural Symbolism: The double-ring could symbolize unity or sustainability, depending on the cultural context of the city. Challenges High Costs: The complex design would likely increase construction and maintenance costs, making it a more expensive project. Engineering Safety: The challenge of ensuring both rings rotate smoothly and safely would require extensive engineering solutions. Location and Space: A project of this scale requires a large footprint and would be most effective in highly populated or tourist-heavy areas. Conclusion The Iconic Double Ring Ferris Wheel offers a groundbreaking design that blends engineering innovation with aesthetic value. While it remains a concept, its potential to become a global landmark is significant, offering unique ride experiences and symbolic meanings for the cities that choose to implement it. 概述 标志性的双环摩天轮是一种摩天轮的概念设计或拟议设计，其特点是有两个相互连接的同心环。这种设计将有别于传统的摩天轮，具有独特的视觉和结构吸引力。摩天轮可以作为一个整体旋转，也可以让两个环独立运动，为乘客带来新奇的体验。 主要特点 双环交织： 双环设计由两个旋转环组成，它们可以一起旋转，也可以分开旋转。这种创新结构可提供更多舱室和动态体验。 美学魅力： 该设计具有视觉冲击力，可象征统一、无限或二元性。它可能会成为一个标志性地标，以其独特的形状和设计吸引人们的注意。 工程复杂性： 建造双环摩天轮对工程技术提出了挑战，特别是在结构完整性、重量分配以及两个环如何旋转等方面。需要先进的工程解决方案来确保结构的安全性和功能性。 增强游乐体验： 有了两个环，摩天轮就可以提供更多的乘舱，还可能提供不同的运转模式，如向相反的方向旋转或以不同的速度旋转，从而增强乘客的体验。 象征性设计： 双环结构可以代表平衡、永恒或相互联系等主题，使其成为一种有意义的文化或城市象征。 实例与类似项目 虽然双环摩天轮还不是一种普遍或成熟的设计，但它与其他地标性摩天轮有着相似之处： 伦敦眼： 虽然不是双环摩天轮，但这个大型观景轮以其独特的设计和 360 度景观而闻名，是一个标志性建筑。 全球摩天轮项目： 世界各地的城市，如拉斯维加斯和新加坡，都提出或建造了大型摩天轮。双环设计将是这些热门景点的独特变体。 优点 旅游业： 双环摩天轮将成为吸引游客的一大亮点，既能让游客欣赏全景，又能让游客获得惊险刺激的乘坐体验。 城市标志： 其独特的设计可以成为城市的标志性符号，提升城市天际线和城市品牌形象。 商业机会： 双环所创造的巨大空间可以容纳零售、餐饮或娱乐场所，从而增加经济价值。 文化象征： 根据城市的文化背景，双环可以象征团结或可持续性。 挑战 成本高： 复杂的设计可能会增加施工和维护成本，使项目更加昂贵。 工程安全性： 要确保两个环平稳安全地旋转，需要大量的工程研探及方案。 位置和空间： 这种规模的项目需要很大的占地面积，在人口稠密或游客密集的地区最为有效。 结论 标志性双环摩天轮**提供了一个突破性的设计，将工程创新与美学价值融为一体。虽然它仍然是一个概念，但其成为全球地标的潜力是巨大的，可为其所在的城市提供独特的游乐体验和象征意义。

column2: Midwest USA Chinese Chamber of Commerce
column3: US Merchant Banking Firm Virgo Partners Led Urban Redevelopment Project in Beijing CBD   美国商业银行 Virgo Partners 主导的北京中央商务区 城市重建项目
column7: Overview of the Project Virgo Partners, a U.S.-based merchant banking firm, is leading an urban redevelopment initiative in Beijing's CBD, one of the city's most economically significant areas. The project spans a prime area between the East Second Ring and East Third Ring Roads, and it aims to modernize the district, create mixed-use spaces, improve infrastructure, and enhance sustainability, ultimately transforming the area into a modern business, residential, and cultural hub. Key Goals The redevelopment project is driven by several key goals: Modern Infrastructure: Revamping the area's infrastructure to support global business needs and modern urban living. Mixed-Use Development: Introducing office, residential, retail, and recreational spaces to foster a dynamic, 24/7 environment. Sustainability: Incorporating green building technologies and energy-efficient designs to reduce the project's environmental impact. Architectural Innovation: Enhancing the visual appeal of the area through striking modern designs that reflect both China’s heritage and its modern ambitions. Economic Growth: Attracting multinational businesses, increasing property values, and contributing to local employment. Enhanced Urban Livability: Improving the quality of life through parks, pedestrian-friendly zones, and cultural amenities. Key Features of the Redevelopment Commercial Office Spaces: New high-rise office towers designed for global corporations, particularly in sectors like finance, technology, and consulting. State-of-the-art facilities with smart technologies and flexible workspaces to attract multinational companies. Mixed-Use Developments: The inclusion of luxury residential units alongside commercial spaces to create a well-rounded urban environment. Retail spaces, cafes, restaurants, and entertainment venues to make the area a vibrant, 24/7 location. Public and Green Spaces: The project integrates green spaces like parks, pedestrian walkways, and recreational areas to balance urbanization with nature. Sustainable design elements such as energy-efficient lighting, green roofs, and eco-friendly waste management. Transportation Infrastructure: Improved access to public transit systems, including subway lines and bus routes, making the area highly accessible. Creation of transportation hubs to support the increased flow of people. Smart City Features: Cultural and Social Amenities: Economic and Environmental Impact Economic Impact: The project will drive economic growth by attracting global investment, boosting local property values, and creating job opportunities, especially in finance and tech sectors. Environmental Impact: The project will prioritize sustainability through energy-efficient building systems, renewable energy sources, and waste management systems to minimize its environmental footprint. Partnerships and Stakeholders Virgo Partners is leading the project, handling financing, planning, and execution. Local Authorities (Beijing government) are involved in approving and coordinating the redevelopment with broader urban goals. Architectural and Engineering Firms will design and implement the urban spaces, ensuring quality and sustainability. Commercial Tenants (corporations and investors) will be key players in leasing the new office spaces and residential units. Conclusion Virgo Partners’ urban redevelopment project in Beijing’s CBD represents a transformative shift for the area, integrating business, residential, and cultural spaces while promoting sustainability and livability. Through modern infrastructure, eco-friendly building practices, and the creation of vibrant mixed-use environments, the project aims to establish the CBD as a global business hub, enhancing Beijing’s position in the international economic landscape.
