column2: 武汉大通黎峰股权投资有限公司
column3: 软易云」下一代无代码应用开发平台Next-Generation No-Code Application Development Platform
column7: Market Opportunity l Rapidly Growing No-Code Development Market No-code development platforms are becoming a core tool for driving digital transformation in enterprises. The global demand for no-code platforms is growing rapidly, and it is expected that the market for no-code application development platforms will reach billions of dollars by 2026. As enterprises increasingly demand efficiency, flexibility, and rapid responses to market changes in application development, no-code platforms are becoming a key technology for helping businesses save development costs and shorten time-to-market. l Target Market n Small and Medium-sized Enterprises (SMEs) and Startups: These companies often lack sufficient technical resources or developers and are eager to quickly build, modify, and maintain applications through no-code platforms. n Enterprise IT Departments: Large enterprises aim to empower business personnel through no-code platforms, enabling fast application development and integration of AI features to enhance business flexibility and responsiveness. n Technical Developers: Programmers can use the platform for rapid AI-driven application development while leveraging seamless integration with AI services to quickly iterate and maintain applications. Technological Advantages l Innovative No-Code Framework n Full-Scenario Development: No coding is required to support various platforms, including web, embedded, mobile, etc. The platform adapts to different scenarios such as healthcare, education, industry, e-commerce, breaking traditional development limitations. n AI-Driven Application Building: The internal AI models assist users in analyzing requirements, enabling conversational application generation and modification of application requirements. Building AI Applications: The platform supports the integration of AI capabilities by allowing the construction of Agents within the application to aid developers in fast AI capability integration. l Support for Cloud and On-Premise Deployment The platform offers flexible deployment options, supporting both cloud and on-premise solutions, catering to different customer needs, ensuring efficient data processing and data security. Business Model Our AI-driven no-code platform will adopt a SaaS subscription-based revenue model. Users can choose from different subscription plans based on usage and functionality requirements. The specific pricing tiers include: l Basic Plan: Designed for small businesses and individual developers, offering limited features and resources. l Professional Plan: Aimed at medium-sized enterprises, offering more features, higher computational resources, and customized support. l Enterprise Plan: Tailored for large corporations, providing full functionality, premium support, and customized services. Additionally, we will generate extra revenue through value-added services such as custom development, technical support, and private deployment. Fundraising Requirements We plan to raise $1 million in this funding round, which will primarily be used for the following areas: l Technology Research and Development (50%): Increase investment in the platform’s technical development, enhancing the AI model library and automation tools. l Marketing and Promotion (30%): Strengthen marketing and promotional efforts to expand the platform's brand influence. l Team Expansion (20%): Hire more technical and operational talent to enhance service quality and user experience. Investment Return According to our financial forecasts, we expect to break even within three years and reach an annual revenue of $200 million by the fifth year. As the market continues to expand and the product evolves, we anticipate the platform's valuation will exceed $1 billion within the next three to five years. Revenue Forecasts 2025: Projected revenue of $5 million；2026: Projected revenue of $15 million；2027: Projected revenue of $50 million.

column3: 大汉口热干面Dahankou Hot and Dry Noodles
column7: Profile of Wuhan Hankow Food Co., Ltd. Wuhan Hankow Food Co., Ltd. is a modern production company that integrates production, sales and R&D and focuses on developing and producing products such as the “Hankow” branded non-fried hot-and-dry noodle series and frozen fresh instant noodles, as well as pairing sauce packs. There are more than 10 varieties of “Hankow” hot-and-dry noodles, which are characterised by 8 non-fried instant hot-and-dry noodles that realise a healthy concept of non-fry, a complete set of patented process technology, producing a bowl of authentic hot-and-dry noodles in one minute, as well as breaking the industry bottleneck by realising the storage of fresh noodles for 12 months at -18°C for the first time. The products have now covered the whole China, being sold at KFC, Zhongbai Lawson, Meiyijia, Metro Walmart, Wushang wholesale supermarket, AEON, Today, 7-11, and Zhongbai Warehousing; the company runs its own e-commerce platforms on Taobao, Tmall, JD.com, Pinduoduo, BESTORE, Pu Pu, Hema, Douyin, Kuaishou, Youzan and other platforms, as well as in large chain E-end consumer networks and supermarkets. The products are sold to foreign countries such as the United States, Canada, Singapore, Australia, France and Germany. Hankow hot-and-dry noodles are bestsellers for 26 years, and the “Hankow” trademark has been registered in 26 countries and regions. The company drafted and formulated DBS42/005 "Local Food Safety Standards for Wuhan Hot-and-Dry Noodles (Instant Noodle)" and the group standard "Quick-freeze Hot-and-Dry Noodles", with 86 invention patents, 36 utility model patents, 16 design appearance patents, and 36 registered trademarks; it also won several awards including the national demonstration enterprise for staple food processing industry, Hubei Province high-tech enterprise, Hubei Province agricultural leader enterprise, Hubei Province special, new and small giant enterprise, and FDA certification. Wuhan Hankow Food Co., Ltd. has been endeavouring for the industrialisation, standardisation, scale and intelligence of Wuhan hot-and-dry noodles, hoping that everyone who loves the food can see our efforts. The content of this page has been translated by AI. In case of any discrepancies, please refer to the original document. 武汉大汉口食品有限公司简介 武汉大汉口食品有限公司是一家集生产、销售、研发于一体的现代化生产公司，主要研发生产“大汉口”牌非油炸热干面系列和速食冻鲜面及配套酱料包等产品。 “大汉口”热干面品种口味有上十余种，其特点有8非油炸方便型热干面实现非油炸健康理念、拥有整套专利工艺技术、一分钟出一碗地道的热干面、打破行业瓶颈鲜面首创零下18摄氏度可保存12个月。 产品国内目前已覆盖全国，进入肯德基、中百罗森、美宜佳、麦德龙沃尔玛、武商量贩、永旺、Today、7-11、中百仓储;公司自主运行电商平台8淘宝、天猫、京东、拼多多、良品铺子、朴朴、盒马、抖音、快手、有赞等平台及大型连锁E端C端网络及商超。国外远销美国、加拿大、新加坡、澳大利亚、法国、德国等国家。 大汉口热干面热销全球26年，“大汉口”商标现已在26个国家及地区注册。公司起草制定了DBS42/005《食品安全地方标准武汉热干面(方便型)》、团体标准《速冻热干面》86项发明专利、36项实用新型专利、16项外观设计专利、36项注册商标，获全国主食加工业示范企业、湖北省高新技术企业、湖北省农业龙头企业、湖北省专精特新小巨人企业、FDA认证等殊荣。 武汉大汉口食品有限公司一直在为武汉热干面的工业化、标准化、规模化、智能化而不断努力着，希望每位爱着武汉热干面的人们，能够看见我们的努力。

column2: 武汉大通黎峰股权投资有限公司
column3: 电机及其拖动系统节电智能优化技术Power-saving intelligent optimization technology for motors and their driving systems
column7: The direction is to solve the energy saving problem of high and low voltage motors: the matching relationship between motor output and load. 1. The output of a conventional motor (power frequency) is constant and cannot be adjusted when the load (working conditions) changes. 2. For variable frequency motors, the voltage and current can be adjusted with deeper depth and good energy-saving effect. Applications: large-scale, high-energy-consuming motors with stable working conditions. Scenario (high-pressure air compressor, chiller, high-pressure fan, etc.) 方向是高低压电机节能 解决：电机输出与负载匹配的关系。 1、常规电机（工频）输出恒定，负载（工况）变化没法调整。 2、针对变频电机调电压调电流深度更深，节能效果好 应用：大型工况稳定的高耗能电机。 场景（高压空压机、冷水机组、高压风机等）

column3: Happy World Children's Park 欢乐世界儿童乐园
column7: Executive Summary I. Project Overview Squirrel Wonderland is an innovative theme park project combining mechanical rides, pet interaction, camping experiences, family fishing, fitness zones, and more. It aims to provide an integrated experience of sports, entertainment, and education for children of all ages and their families while offering memorable interactive and exploratory experiences for all-age visitors. The project plans to rapidly expand market share through mergers and acquisitions of profitable park resources, leveraging industry expertise and standardized operational models to establish a strong brand presence. Secondary consumption (e.g., DIY crafts, food services, and themed activities) will further enhance profitability, ensuring steady revenue growth and driving industry upgrades. According to a report by Research Insights, the Chinese amusement park market reached a total scale of 90 billion RMB in 2023 and is expected to grow to 120 billion RMB by 2025, with an annual growth rate of approximately 14%. Among emerging segments, non-powered parks stood out, with a market size of 10 billion RMB in 2023, projected to exceed 30 billion RMB by 2025, reflecting an annual growth rate of 45%. By offering differentiated positioning and diverse activities, Squirrel Wonderland fills a market gap while setting new industry directions with its customer-focused experiences. Target Market Family Interaction Demand ● In 2022, Chinese families spent 300 billion RMB on children's entertainment and education, with over 20% allocated to amusement parks. This trend underscores the growing demand for family entertainment as families increasingly value shared activities to strengthen relationships. Health and Education Focus ● Modern parents prioritize their children’s physical and mental development, favoring venues that combine exercise, learning, and fun. Non-powered parks address this need with edutainment activities that foster physical and intellectual growth. Filling Market Gaps ● China’s amusement park market is primarily dominated by traditional mechanical parks, lacking natural interaction and family-oriented facilities. Squirrel Wonderland bridges this gap, appealing to families seeking fresh, high-quality experiences. Investment Highlights ● Agreements for acquiring 20 parks are nearing completion, showcasing strong resource integration capabilities. ● ● Vast market potential with differentiated positioning. ● ● Planned IPO within two years, offering investors an exit channel. Financing Plan Financing Objective ● Seeking first-round financing of 50 million RMB in exchange for 15% equity. Allocation of Funds ● Acquisition of 20 Parks ○ Majority of funds will be used to complete acquisition negotiations with target parks, ensuring resource integration and expansion to rapidly increase market share. ● Standardization and Operational Optimization ○ A portion of funds will be allocated to developing and implementing standardized operational processes to improve management efficiency and ensure consistency and high-quality service across all parks. ● Brand Awareness Development ○ Investments will be made in branding, marketing, and promotional activities to boost brand recognition and attract more families and children to the parks. ● Facility and Experience Upgrades ○ Funds will be utilized to enhance park facilities, adding interactive and educational elements to ensure a rich and engaging experience for the target market. Profit Forecast ● Initial Revenue: Estimated annual revenue of 40 million RMB in the early stages. ● Mature Revenue: Annual revenue projected to reach 540 million RMB, with a net profit margin of 70%. ● Investment Payback Period: Estimated at 6.65 years, with stable and reliable

column2: 武汉云辅材科技有限公司
column3: 武汉云辅材科技有限公司——让装修辅材采购变得更轻松！
column7: 武汉云辅材科技有限公司（简称“云辅材”）成立于2016年，是一家立足湖北武汉，面向华中地区的装修辅材采购、仓储、配送一体化服务的新锐高科技建材配送企业。云辅材是全国建材配送行业转型领导者，“让装修辅材采购变得更轻松”是云辅材的使命。 云辅材为行业客户提供集“采购统筹+仓储管理+配送到户+信息服务”于一体的SaaS管理系统，依托互联网技术，通过大数据优化整个供应链。建立标准化服务体系，提升用户体验，减少客户购买材料的出行成本、时间成本、与门店的沟通成本。为行业B端赋能打通线上线下，实现数据化全流程服务，助力企业转型升级实现“零库存”的高效运营模式。我们始终不忘初心，让装修用户“省心、省力、省钱”地轻松采购，致力于铸就装修辅材一站式配送行业的新平台。 Wuhan Yunfucai Technology Co., Ltd. (abbreviated as "Yunfucai") was founded in 2016. It is a cutting-edge high-tech building materials distribution enterprise based in Wuhan, Hubei, and serving the central China region, integrating the procurement, warehousing, and distribution of decoration auxiliary materials. Yunfucai is a leading force in the transformation of the national building materials distribution industry. Its mission is to "make the procurement of decoration auxiliary materials easier". Yunfucai provides the industry customers with a SaaS management system that integrates "procurement coordination + warehouse management + door-to-door delivery + information services". Relying on Internet technology, it optimizes the entire supply chain through big data. By establishing a standardized service system, it enhances the user experience and reduces the travel costs, time costs, and communication costs with stores for customers when purchasing materials. It empowers the B-end of the industry, bridges the online and offline sectors, realizes the full-process data-driven service, and helps enterprises to transform and upgrade, achieving the highly efficient operation mode of "zero inventory". We have always stayed true to our original aspiration, enabling decoration users to purchase easily with "less worry, less effort, and less cost", and are committed to building a new one-stop distribution platform for decoration auxiliary materials.

column2: 南京抒微智能科技有限公司
column3: Product philosophy centered around "Lidar + Algorithms," the company provides industry-specific solutions and intelligent modules through LiDAR sensors.
column7: The core team has long been committed to the research and development of military LiDAR projects. Leveraging their profound research capabilities in military products, they have independently developed high-precision LiDAR, a core component relied upon by autonomous driving systems. They have successfully overcome technical bottlenecks related to miniature high-repetition-rate LiDAR, maintaining military-grade quality in core technical parameters, environmental adaptability, and reliability. The company currently offers ranging photoelectric sensors, 2D rotating LiDAR for robot positioning and navigation, and MEMS semi-solid-state LiDAR for forward target detection and recognition. Its business spans smart robots, intelligent logistics, smart transportation, intelligent manufacturing, and other fields, forming holistic solutions by integrating industry-leading artificial intelligence, cognitive computing, and big data technologies. 核心團隊曾長期致力於軍用光達專案研發，憑著深厚的軍品科研實力，自主研發了無人駕駛所依賴的核心部件高精度雷射雷達，成功突破了微型高重頻雷射雷達相關技術瓶頸，在核心技術參數、環境適應性和可靠性等方面可保持軍品品質。本公司現有測距型光電感測器、用於機器人定位與導航的2D旋轉雷射雷達、用於前向目標偵測與識別的MEMS半固態雷射雷達。業務涵蓋智慧機器人、智慧物流、智慧交通、智慧製造等領域，結合業界領先的人工智慧、認知運算和大數據技術形成整體解決方案。 核心团队曾长期致力于军用激光雷达项目研发，凭着深厚的军品科研实力，自主研发了无人驾驶所依赖的核心部件高精度激光雷达，成功突破了微型高重频激光雷达相关技术瓶颈，在核心技术参数、环境适应性和可靠性等方面保持军品品质。公司现有测距型光电传感器、用于机器人定位与导航的2D旋转激光雷达、用于前向目标检测与识别的MEMS半固态激光雷达。业务涵盖智能机器人、智能物流、智慧交通、智能制造等领域，结合行业领先的人工智能、认知计算和大数据技术形成整体解决方案。

column3: iBrushPal爱伢伴——智能口腔护理平台
column7: iBrushPal Platform is an innovative social platform designed to allow users to brush their teeth online together with friends or new acquaintances in a fun way. The integration of the iBrushPal platform with AI smart toothbrush creates a powerful oral care solution that enhances users' brushing experiences and promotes better dental health **解決問題：**用戶不會刷牙，不喜歡刷牙，不知道有沒刷乾淨牙 ​ 技術介紹：1.個性化智能牙刷：根據平臺數據訂制個性化牙刷，配備感測器能夠監測刷牙數據，也可同步到口腔智能平臺更新。 2.數據分析平臺：利用雲計算和大數據分析，處理用戶的刷牙數據，生成個性化的建議和健康報告。​ 3.移動應用：用戶友好的介面，提供刷牙進度跟蹤、社交互動和教育內容，幫助用戶更好地管理口腔健康。​ 2.社區互動：用戶可通過平臺與朋友分享刷牙進度，參加挑戰活動，增強社交體驗。​ 3.健康管理：平臺生成個性化的口腔健康報告，幫助用戶制定更有效的護理計畫，促進長期的口腔健康。​

column2: 香港威達滙投資管理有限公司
column3: Discretionary Trading Program
column7:
About Weidahui is a prominent enterprise engaged in financial services and market analysis in Asia. Known for its strategic foresight and innovative approaches, Weidahui has been at the forefront of financial analytics and investment solutions. 关于威达汇是亚洲著名的从事金融服务和市场分析的企业。伟达汇以其战略远见和创新方法而闻名，一直处于金融分析和投资解决方案的前沿。 Weidahui Founder Bizhen Wang‘s not only a seasoned professional in investment Trading but also brings a deep understanding of market dynamics and risk management，And she is Confident in the future of the financial derivatives market." 威达汇创始人汪碧珍不仅是一位经验丰富的投资交易专业人士，而且对市场动态和风险管理有着深刻的理解，她对金融衍生品市场的未来充满信心。” Bizhen Wang Graduated From Xiamen University ，comes with over 16 years of experience in financial market analysis and trading. Starting from enterprise-level startups, he has honed his skills in financial planning and senior foreign exchange analysis. His strategies in psychological and economic game theory have proven essential in mastering the complex dynamics of financial markets. 汪碧珍 毕业于厦门大学，拥有超过16年的金融市场分析和交易经验。从企业级初创公司起步，磨练了理财规划和高级外汇分析的技能。事实证明，他的心理和经济博弈论策略对于掌握金融市场的复杂动态至关重要。
Highlights of Bizhen Wang’s career include: **汪碧珍职业生涯的亮点包括： • Comprehensive background in international financial derivatives and a profound understanding of risk management.** • 全面的国际金融衍生品背景和对风险管理的深刻理解。
• Expertise in technical analysis including K-line barometer techniques, trend analysis, and algorithmic strategies. • 技术分析方面的专业知识，包括K 线晴雨表技术、趋势分析和算法策略。
• Development of automated trading systems that minimize subjective interference and optimize market trend responsiveness. • 开发自动交易系统，最大限度地减少主观干扰并优化市场趋势响应能力。 We are actively seeking visionary investors to join us in shaping the future of AI-led investment management. 我们正在积极寻找有远见的投资者加入我们，共同塑造人工智能主导的投资管理的未来。 Weidahui® is a registered trademark。

column2: 香港捷貝樂科技有限公司
column3: 香港捷貝樂科技有限公司
column7: 本公司是初创企业，拟定业务范围包括数码产品、软件开发、技术服务，乐器及接口设备开发与销售，国际贸易等。随着人们生活质量的提高，越来越多的人加入学习音乐行列，二胡作为中国传统乐器，受到了广泛的关注。但我们发现，二胡的外围设备比较低端，功能单一（如琴箱），携带、使用诸多不便（如谱架和扩音设备）；且许多学习者在练习过程中难以掌握音准和技巧，因而半途而废、惋而息琴。为解决这一问题，推出本产品与服务：包括硬件（多功能琴箱）+二胡智能学习助手软件（AI音准控制器）+APP平台资源项目。硬件即多功能琴箱，旨在提供一种轻便实用、多功能的携带设备；软件部分即采用先进科技手段将传统的无品乐器，设计一种能在视觉上直观和感性上促进学琴的产品，将无形变有形，将无品变精准定音，使初学者快速掌握音感音准，坚定学习的信心和恒心。短期发展步骤，首先拟开发二胡多功能琴箱，以及运用AI声音识别技术开发的音品控制器（以上两项已提交申请专利）两个产品；其次运用该技术，以二胡为切入点扩展到其他无音品的弦乐器，如高胡、板胡、中胡等，将迭代产品不断受惠爱乐群体；再次，建立互动小区平台，AI+练习+分享，重塑新型练习和教育方式，物、互交融，让更多人喜爱音乐，通过小区活动给人们带来健康活跃的生活环境。

column2: 浙江普威新材料有限公司
column3: Join Hands with Zhejiang Puwei to Create Glories in Intelligent Fire Protection  攜手浙江普威，共鑄智能消防輝煌
column7: Zhejiang Puwei New Material Co., Ltd. is a wholly - owned subsidiary of UK Securistyle Hardware. It was founded in 2010 in Tangpu Industrial Park, Anji, covering an area of 60 mu with a construction area of 70,000 square meters. Puwei focuses on the full - set solutions for intelligent window openers, fire smoke exhaust systems, and smart home products. It integrates R & D, manufacturing, sales, and installation. Currently, it has over 500 employees, including more than 70 in the R & D team. The company actively introduces upstream supporting enterprises to build a benchmarking cluster area for intelligent fire protection. At present, it has become a leading brand in China, aiming to achieve the first - place global sales volume within five years. On the occasion of the Hong Kong Asian Financial Forum, Puwei sincerely invites elites from all walks of life to join hands, share the business opportunities in intelligent fire protection, and create new glories in the industry. 浙江普威新材料有限公司，係英國固力五金全資子公司，2010年成立於安吉塘浦工業園區，佔地60畝，建面70000平方米。 普威專注智能開窗器、消防排煙及智能家居全套方案，集研發、製造、銷售、安裝於一體。現有員工超500人，研發團隊70餘人。公司積極引入上游配套企業，打造智能消防標桿集聚區。目前已為國內領先品牌，目標五年內實現全球銷量第一。 值此香港亞洲金融論壇，普威誠邀各界精英攜手，共享智能消防商機，共創行業新輝煌。

column2: 海玉国际绿色能源供应链协作公司
column3: 1. Pilot project of green hydrogen production, filling station and green fertilizer in China and Morocco respectively.  |  分别在中国和摩洛哥的绿色氢能生产、加氢站及绿色肥料的试点项目。
column7: Although it has been recognized that there are huge market potential for green hydrogen in the world, the key for breaking through for taking profitable business is to achieve the lowest possible cost and highest reliability supported by leading technologies, the establishment of “The Global Green Energy Supply (Zhangjiagang) Center” formed by hundreds of leading manufactures, institutes and labs along the whole value chain from power generation, storage, hydrogen production onto the filling station controlled by innovative AI system is the accelerating the pace moving forwards to develop the pilot projects in China and internationally, particularly in Morocco respectively. Relying on this industry park, HyjadeChain is looking forwards to developing partners with HK and international funds to develop the pilot projects with innovative total solution and supply chain services.  We are aiming at becoming the head of whole value chain and your ideal strategic partners to develop green power and green hydrogen terminal market internationally.   HyjadeChain Co. and Zhangjiagang Center would be the center connection and key driver for international green energy partnership, we are keen on inviting you working with us hand in hand. 尽管绿色氢能的市场潜力已获得全球的广泛认可，但实现盈利性业务的关键是通过领先技术支持达到最低成本和最高可靠性。“全球绿色能源供应（张家港）中心”的建立，是由发电、储能、制氢到创新 AI 系统控制的加氢站及整个价值链上的数百家领先制造商、研究机构和实验室，推动了中国及其他国家（尤其是摩洛哥）国际试点项目的发展。 依托这一产业园区，海玉国际绿色能源供应链协作公司希望与香港及国际基金合作，开发创新的整体解决方案和供应链服务的试点项目。我们致力于成为整个价值链的领导者，并成为你在国际绿色能源和绿色氢能终端市场开发中的理想战略合作伙伴。 海玉国际绿色能源供应链协作公司及张家港中心将成为国际绿色能源合作的核心纽带和关键驱动力。我们诚挚邀请您与我们携手合作，共创未来。

column2: 能蜂（珠海横琴）能源投资有限公司
column3: 山东青岛集中储能电站需要投资，后期可回购
column7: 【青岛阆苑新能源 200MW/400MWh共享储能项目】: (1)、项目名称：阆苑新能源200MW/400MWh共享储能示范项目； (2)、可以设立公司，没有开户； (3)、青岛阆苑共享储能电站调峰330次左右，以电网正式合同为准，价格参与山东省电力市场化交易，这两年的平均价格在0.36-0.40元，容量租赁可以解决50%，价格在75-100元每千瓦时。容量租赁协议都在建成以后，并网之前签订协议合同，没有哪一家能提前签电力调度协议。 (4)、青岛阆苑共享储能项目，土地已经调整了土地属性，由划拨土地变成了建设用地，本项目土地为合规用地，租金为2万元/亩/年，共计约39亩，土地有租赁合同; 租赁合同是29亩，土地所出的文件是2.53公顷，根据需要，可以租39亩，其他的资料都齐了，资方需要的八个部门的批复那是针对新征土地的，阆苑项目是原有学校土地变更的土地性质，不需要办理手续，真的需要，只需资方确定收购签约，那八个部门可以给不需要办理手续的回复函 (5)、青岛市的批复已有,省网的批复电力接入批复12月9日已有; (6)、青岛阆苑储能项目，没要求指定设备，效益测算需要资方自己测算(因为没确定资方不好深化可研，出不了测算表)，并且如果项目方先出效益测算表，资方也会自己重新测算效益的。 (7)、商务条件预期：参照9月份股转类似的一个大储小e0.55的价格合作方式（参考2024年7月份成交的储能项目，价格可谈），股转小0.5~e0.55元每瓦时左右的价格【搞定所有容量租赁和签下来330次的保调协议】。资方测算 小e方负责的内容：除了储能集成设备以外的所有工程，包括土建部分，安装工程，办公室，调度中心，监控中心，外线等施工工程。要建220的升压站，包括在小e里。外送线路大概4.5公里。

column2: 能蜂（珠海横琴）能源投资有限公司
column3: 山东省集中式储能电站需要引入外资配比
column7: 山东储能项目情况及合作方案 新能源储能电站项目：24年示范项目。拟联合实力国企合作投资，共同出资，我方负责兜底运营EPC+O模式合作。 (1)总投资：可研8.5亿，价格，1.4元/wh，计划实际投资7.8亿元，控制1.3元/wh；国内最大站房式，建筑面积2万平米，容量300MW/600MWh。 (2)占地面积：40亩； (3)建筑面积：2万平； (4)储能电站规模：300MW/600MWh； (5)项目地：山东； (6)项目开工：土地已报卷，25年3月份拿地。 (7)并网时间：要求2025年12月30日，计划11.30； (8)特许经营权：25年； (9)接入方案已定，架空接入8公里接入220站，央企风电项目380MW风电接入储能升压站，合并送出。双方分担建设成本。储能实施送出项目。 (10)预计年收入：1.1亿元，（租赁按照最低200元/KW，满租可以实现，年租赁收入6000+5000现货交易及补贴)；目前，可以与两家央企，合计780MW风电，签订273MW预租赁协议，达到91%租赁比例，地方政府支持协调租赁。考虑运营费500万/年，年净收入10500万。 (11)项目要求，引入地方外资2400万美元。外资所需咨询成本1600万左右人民币及地方乡村振兴产业投资有我方负责。 (12)EPC系统集成中，须采用我方国资品牌电池；交流侧优先采用我方推荐国资品牌。 (13)合作方案：投资方给予包干EPC（包外资费用），1.3元/WH，站房式建筑及储能系统，一二次及配套工程、外线，交钥匙并网验收。签订EPC+O合同之后，完成股权转让，项目银行贷款融资支付预付款、进度款；投资方要证明其能获得银行融资或者自有资金能力。 (14)股权建议，大股东做融资支持，双方可以同股同权，各自为自身股权担保，原股东保留一定股份，并负责包干运营，制定年度运营计划，保障项目基本收入目标，并以双方合资公司，持续合作，发挥各方优势，拓展投资。 翻译： Shandong Energy Storage Project Overview and Cooperation Plan Renewable Energy Storage Power Station Project: A demonstration project for the year 2024. It is planned to jointly invest with powerful state-owned enterprises, with both parties contributing funds. Our party is responsible for underpinning the operation under the EPC+O cooperation model. (1)Total Investment: The feasibility study indicates a total investment of 850 million yuan, with a price of 1.4 yuan/wh. The planned actual investment is 780 million yuan, controlling the cost at 1.3 yuan/wh. It will be the largest station-housed type in China, with a building area of 20,000 square meters and a capacity of 300MW/600MWh. (2)Land Area: 40 mu (approx. 6.67 acres); (3)Building Area: 20,000 square meters; (4)Energy Storage Power Station Scale: 300MW/600MWh; (5)Project Location: Shandong; (6)Project Commencement: Land acquisition papers have been submitted, with the intention to acquire the land in March 2025. (7)Grid Connection Time: Required by December 30, 2025, with a planned date of November 30. (8)Franchise Rights: 25 years; (9)Access Plan Determined: An overhead connection of 8 kilometers to the 220kV station. A 380MW wind power project of a central enterprise will be connected to the energy storage booster station for combined transmission. Both parties will share the construction costs. The energy storage project will implement the transmission. (10)Estimated Annual Revenue: 110 million yuan (with a rental rate of at least 200 yuan/KW, full occupancy can achieve an annual rental income of 60 million + 50 million from spot trading and subsidies). Currently, pre-lease agreements can be signed with two central enterprises for a total of 780MW of wind power, achieving a 91% leasing ratio. Local government support will facilitate leasing. Considering an annual operating cost of 5 million yuan, the annual net income will be 105 million yuan. (11)Project Requirement: Introduce 24 million USD of foreign investment. The consulting costs required for foreign investment, approximately 16 million yuan, and local rural revitalization industrial investments will be our responsibility. (12)EPC System Integration: Our state-owned brand batteries must be used. The AC side preferably adopts our recommended state-owned brand. (13)Cooperation Plan: The investor will provide a turnkey EPC (including foreign investment costs) at 1.3 yuan/WH, covering station-housed buildings and energy storage systems, primary and secondary supporting engineering, and external lines, with turnkey grid connection acceptance. After signing the EPC+O contract, the equity transfer will be completed, and project bank loans will finance the payment of advance payments and progress payments. The investor must prove its ability to obtain bank financing or have its own funds. (14)Equity Suggestion: The majority shareholder provides financing support. Both parties can have equal shares and guarantee their respective equities. The original shareholders retain a certain percentage of shares and are responsible for turnkey operations, formulating annual operational plans, ensuring the project's basic income targets, and through a joint venture company of both parties, continuing cooperation, leveraging each party's advantages, and expanding investments.

column2: 能蜂（珠海横琴）能源投资有限公司
column3: 寻找愿意投资国内虚拟电厂的风投机构 Seeking venture capital for investing in domestic virtual power plants (VPPs)
column7: 伴随着国家政策的出台，2025年是中国虚拟电厂的元年，我们在苏州和东营港地区和地方政府成立了智慧能源联合体，有着非常多优质的项目和投资机会，欢迎您洽谈合作。 有想投资国内虚拟电厂的风投欢迎洽谈，用南昌大学设计研究院的混改主体，做国内首个基于人工智能的工商业服务型虚拟电厂。跟现在大多数虚拟电厂的服务对象只是电网不同，我们工商业服务型虚拟电厂将源网荷储和绿电直供以及电力现货交易全部纳入，运营人工智能模型提前一天制定次日运营策略，低价购电高价供电，全面帮助企业建设高可靠性的廉价电力能源服务系统。 With the introduction of national policies, 2025 marks the inaugural year for China's virtual power plants. We have established smart energy consortia with local governments in Suzhou and Dongying Port areas, where there are numerous high-quality projects and investment opportunities. You are welcome to discuss and collaborate with us. Seeking venture capital for investing in domestic virtual power plants (VPPs), we plan to utilize the mixed-ownership reform entity of Nanchang University Design & Research Institute to develop the first domestic AI-based industrial and commercial service-oriented virtual power plant. Unlike most current VPPs that only serve power grids, our industrial and commercial service-oriented VPP will incorporate all aspects including generation, grid, load, storage, direct supply of green electricity, and spot power trading. By operating an AI model, we will formulate operating strategies for the next day one day in advance, purchase electricity at low prices and supply at high prices, comprehensively assisting enterprises in building a highly reliable and low-cost power energy service system.

column7: Cellenergy (Zhuhai Hengqin) Energy Investment Co., Ltd was jointly established by the Design Research Institute of Nanchang University and Cellenergy Co., LTD in 2023. Aiming to integrate the intellectual resources of university talents and enterprise resources to work closely together, the firm is committed to providing smart energy and energy carbon revolution technologies. The company is now headed by Professor Zhang Zhonghui, a well-known power grid expert in China, as chief scientist, backed by a core technical team consisting of more than 10 PhD holders. Cellenergy adheres to the integrated production and learning approach and forms a smart energy consortium with central enterprises such as SPIC, China Huaneng, CIMC, and Power China to empower China’s new energy development. 能蜂（珠海横琴）能源投资有限公司是由南昌大学设计研究院与青岛能蜂电气于2023年共同发起成立，旨在结合高校人才智力资源与企业资源优势紧密合作，致力于智慧能源与能碳革命技术。公司现由国内知名电网专家张忠会教授任首席科学家，由十余名博士领军组成核心技术团队。能蜂坚持产学研金一体化路线，与国电投、华能、中集、中国电建等央企共同组成智慧能源联合体，为中国新能源发展助力赋能。 The content of this page has been translated by AI. column7: 深圳市华焰天下科技有限公司是一家集研发、制造、销售为一体的新能源高科技企业，产品垄断地位，电生明火行业的独角兽！总部坐落于中国深圳。公司以“等离子电火技术”为核心驱动力，10年磨一剑，已布局民用电火灶、商用电火灶、工业用电火技术等多款产品和技术解决方案，获评“国家级高新技术企业”荣誉。 华火电火技术，将电直接转换成明火！无需任何化石燃料，0碳排放，使用成本更低，划时代科技神器！旨在将人类因使用燃气导致的肺癌、中毒、爆炸死亡事故降低至0，从根本上改善和解决“全球空气污染难题”，实现能源替代，引领“电生明火”新时代。

column7: The Station-based Smart Taxi Management Platform is a software used to solve the problem of taxi management in key transportation hubs such as airports, railway stations, and ports. It is a traffic operation management software that scientifically, fairly and efficiently resolves conflicts between drivers and passengers in short-distance rides at stations, improves taxi operation efficiency and service quality, and optimizes passenger travel experience through the points incentive mechanism, intelligent vehicle track control and efficient operation AI analysis. The content of this page has been translated by AI. In case of any discrepancies, please refer to the original document. 场站出租车智慧管理平台是一款用于解决机场、火车站、口岸等重点交通枢纽出租车管理问题的软件。它通过积分激励机制、智能车辆轨迹管控和高效运营 AI 分析等功能，科学公平高效地化解场站短途出行司乘矛盾，提升出租车运营效率与服务质量，优化乘客出行体验，属于交通运营管理类软件

column7: 派尔城市的使命是通过打造“微软Windows ”式大数据操作 系统，通过数据不出客户服务器的模式，在保障数据安全和用户隐私的同时，为全球 10 亿+人提供更加经济、快捷、绿色的出行首选。派尔城市致力于成为碳中和和智慧城市时代的城市交通资产数字运营商，应用人工智能、大数据、数字孪生等数字科技，大幅提升城市交通资源利用效率和供需匹配效益，为合作的城市提供 每年共千亿元规模出行服务的效率提升和碳减排。特别是助力各大城市的地铁集团、公交集团、机场集团、大型出租车公司等城市交通运营商实现降本增效和碳中和。

column2: 黄山建投私募基金管理有限公司
column3: 黄山建投私募基金管理有限公司   |   Mount Huangshan Construction Investment Private Fund Management Co., Ltd
column7: "Established in November 2023, Mount Huangshan Construction Investment Private Fund Management Co., Ltd (referred to as  “Construction Investment Capital” below), has registered capital of RMB 50 million and paid in full. It is a wholly-owned state-owned investment company of Huangshan City Construction Investment (Group) Co., Ltd., which is responsible for equity investment, corporate mergers and acquisitions, overseas investment, corporate financing and other matters of the entire Group. Since its establishment, the company has established the RMB 10 billion “Huangshan Emerging Industry Fund”, the RMB 1 billion “Huangshan City New Energy Automobile Industry Fund”, and the RMB 1.4 billion “Huangshan Guangyang Fuhai Fund”, in accordance with the concept of “professionalism, efficiency, innovation and pragmatism”. Completed M&A of Changzhou NRB Corporation (002708), an A-share listed company, became the cornerstone investor of Ruichang International Holdings Limited (HK.01334), and completed the exit ODI procedures of capital in less than 3 weeks, creating a miracle in the industry and winning recognition in domestic and foreign capital markets. In July 2024, Construction Investment Capital set up “Huangshan Construction Investment (Hong Kong) International Limited” in Hong Kong to further expand the overseas investment channels and diversify overseas investment methods. At present, the negotiations for many H-share IPOs and cornerstone investment projects are in progress. The company is willing to work with various excellent partners at home and abroad to support the development of outstanding enterprises and boost the prosperity of the financial market in Hong Kong! 黄山建投私募基金管理有限公司（简称：建投资本），成立于2023年11月，注册资本金5000万人民币，并全部实缴到位，是黄山市建设投资集团全资国有投资公司，负责整个集团的股权投资、企业并购、境外投资、企业融资等事宜。公司成立以来，秉承“专业、高效、创新、务实”的理念，先后组建了“黄山市新兴产业基金”，规模100亿元，“黄山市新能源汽车产业基金”，规模10亿元，“黄山光洋富海基金”，规模14亿元。完成A股上市公司光洋股份(002708)的并购，担任了瑞昌国际（HK.01334）的基石投资人，并用不到3周的时间完成了资金出境ODI手续办理，创造了业内奇迹，并获得国内外资本市场好拼。2024年7月，建投资本在香港设立了“黄山建投（香港）国际投资有限公司”，进一步拓展境外投资渠道，丰富境外投资方式。目前，有多个港股IPO、基石投资项目洽谈之中。建投资本愿与国内外各类优秀伙伴合作，共同扶持优秀企业的发展，助力香港金融市场的繁荣！ The content of this page has been translated by AI. In case of any discrepancies, please refer to the original document."

column2: 厦门腾基生物科技有限责任公司
column3: 基于基因编辑技术（CRISPR/DX）的肿瘤快速早筛 Rapid early screening of tumors based on gene editing technology (CRISPR/DX)
column7: 厦门腾基生物科技有限责任公司，2021年落地厦门生物医药产业园，专注于肿瘤早筛领域，为客户提供面向基层医疗机构及居家、医院端、体检端等多元应用场景的肿瘤早筛产品和健康管理服务，集研发、生产、销售和服务为一体，核心应用场景为基层医疗机构/居家检测，填补市场洼地。2023年，入选福建省“百人计划”、厦门市“双百企业”及中国最具成长潜力留学人员创办企业。  愿景是肿瘤早筛，人人可及。  我们的创业理念是全新时代检验不应受限，我们致力于服务更广泛的人群，提高肿瘤早筛的普及率和检测频率。因此，我们以居家检测为核心，希望让更多群体受益。  为提供更高质量的产品及服务模式，我们积极创新，拥抱技术，以我们的核心技术，如基因编辑，结合AI人工智能、生物芯片等交叉学科领域高新技术手段，提供高可及性的居家检测方式。 公司自主研发了两大技术平台： 1)基于cMIT基因编辑技术的肿瘤快速检测平台——开发面向基层医疗机构/居家自测的产品（核心发展方向） 2)基于SPAM-PCR的肿瘤甲基化检测平台——开发应用于医院等专业医疗检测机构的产品（快速创收项目） 项目优势： 1.技术领先：团队在基因编辑领域，有超过12年的沉淀与打磨； 2.综合型团队：核心成员均具有10年以上相关经验，涵盖了研发、管理、销售等多方面的人才； 3.拥有丰富的海外商会资源和销售渠道。 4.肿瘤居家早筛市场潜力巨大，预计到2030年，市场规模将超过280亿美元； 5.符合国家长期战略。 获得荣誉: 入选全球首个微软创新赋能暨生态加速计划 第六届中国医疗器械创新创业大赛IVD类别赛三等奖 第六届中国医疗器械创新创业大赛决赛优胜奖 “智汇苏高新”创新创业大赛二等奖 “创享厦门”创业创新大赛三等奖 厦门生物医药港初创企业路演二等奖  Xiamen Tengji Medical Technology Co., LTD., located in Xiamen Biomedical Industrial Park in 2021, focuses on the field of tumor early screening, providing customers with tumor early screening products and health management services for multiple application scenarios such as primary medical institutions/home, hospital and physical examination. It integrates research and development, production, sales and services. The core application scenario is primary medical institutions/home testing to fill the market depression. In 2023, it will be selected as Fujian Province's "100 People Plan", Xiamen City's "Double 100 Enterprises" and China's most promising enterprises founded by overseas students.  The vision is early screening of cancer, accessible to everyone.  Our entrepreneurial philosophy is that the new era of testing should not be limited, and we are committed to serving a wider population and increasing the penetration and frequency of cancer early screening. Therefore, we focus on home testing, hoping to benefit more groups.  In order to provide higher quality products and service models, we actively innovate and embrace technology, with our core technologies, such as gene editing, combined with AI artificial intelligence, biochips and other interdisciplinary high-tech means, to provide high accessibility of home testing methods. The company has independently developed two technology platforms: Rapid tumor detection platform based on cMIT gene editing technology -- Development of products for primary medical institutions/home self-test (core development direction) Tumor methylation detection platform based on SPAM-PCR -- Development of products for professional medical detection institutions such as hospitals (rapid revenue generation project)  Project advantages: 1. Leading technology: The team has more than 12 years of precipitation and polishing in the field of gene editing; 2. Integrated team: Core members have more than 10 years of relevant experience, covering R & D, management, sales and other talents; 3. We have rich overseas chamber of commerce resources and sales channels. 4. The cancer home early screening market has huge potential, and it is expected that by 2030, the market size will exceed 28 billion US dollars; 5. The areas of focus are in line with the long-term strategic support of the country. Receive honors: Selected for the world's first Microsoft Innovation Empowerment and Eco-Acceleration Program Third prize in the IVD category of the 6th China Medical Device Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition Winner of the sixth China Medical Device Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition Second prize of "Wisdom gathers in Suzhou High-tech Zone" Innovation and Entrepreneurship Competition Third prize of "Create and enjoy Xiamen" Entrepreneurship and Innovation Competition Second prize in Xiamen Biopharmaceutical Port start-up roadshow

column3: 盛京家族联盟
column7: 盛京家族联盟创立于2020年，旨在服务辽沈大地优秀的家族和企业能在国家新的战略发展阶段保持旺盛的生命力和竞争力。盛京家族联盟的股东和创始人均有超过10年以上的香港及海外资产管理及传承服务经验，拥有和链接的金融牌照资源丰富。盛京家族联盟以高端平台资源整合及专业服务能力，从个人-家庭-企业三个维度全方位为会员家庭及其企业提供财富保值增值到家族传承安排的全生命周期服务，助力家族事业永续相传。 盛京家族联盟立足家族客户需求，做最受信赖的家族传承助力者。核心业务包括家族管理和企业投融资服务目前共计有七大服务版块，分别为家族资产配置、家族财富传承、企业投融资服务、海外金融服务、法律咨询服务、税务筹划、家族联盟特色课程。

column3: 惠裕全球家族智库FO共生计划
column7: 一、FO共生项目介绍 新型Mini家办已经如雨后春般设立起来，但如何建设高质量的家办才是行业共同的难点和心声。惠誉家族智库经过近十年对于家办服务行业的观察与实践，深度经历和体验这个发展周期的成果与痛点。AI时代以及新质生产力的提出，预示着FO也要在科技创新、生产要素创新性配置上做提升，更好更全面低体现行业的先进生产力。 新型mini家办将是未来市场兴起的主旋律，它标志着中国家办市场经历了10年的打磨和市场检验，淘汰了没有价值存在的“附庸者”，将依托以真正的独立视角及专业价值为特征的家族办公室赋能平台，遴选高产优质服务商，以惠裕OCOO(外包首席运营官系统)输出的整体解决方案，全面辅助新型mini家办的业务落地。 二、FO共生服务内容： 1、家办品牌定位和塑造：为新型家办品牌做精准定位和品牌力塑造 2、家办训练营：由中国家族管理各个领域的顶级专家授课,三天沉浸式家族训练营学习, 为家办从业者奠定专业根基 3、落地家族工作坊：资产工作坊、传承工作坊、慈善工作坊、艺术工作坊四大主题可以隨意选择 4、全方位家办方案和顶尖专家咨询：获得I-Match系统远程家办服务支持一年系统的使用权限 5、家族之旅/资产端考察：参与全国全球顶级家族交流活动和知名金融机构的考察 6、家办全产品线供应链服务：惠裕评价的供应商体系为家办提供靠谱有竞争力的供应链 7、家族办公室的创始人访谈节目：为家办创始人开设的专访节目,介绍家办的服务理念和个人从业经验 三、FO共生服务内核： 1、家办训练营-全方位高纬度培养家族办公室专业人才 2、家办工坊-通过浅咨询+深咨询+服务商选择，帮助家族业务具体落地 3、I-match家办千金方-家办行业的新质生产力，全方位家办方案和顶尖专家咨询

column2: 药捷安康（南京）科技股份有限公司
column3: 上市集资
column7: 药捷安康是一家以临床需求为导向、处于临床阶段的生物制药公司，专注于发现和开发肿瘤、炎症及心脏代谢疾病的小分子创新疗法。进一步借助对转化医学及药物设计的深入研究，我们旨在开发具有战略意义的同类首创或同类最佳候选药物，以满足全球范围内的迫切临床需求。

column3: 華榕集團有限公司
column7:
华榕(集团)有限公司成立于1985年，经国务院外经贸部批准在香港成立，是福州市正处级市管国有企业。
华榕(集团)有限公司将始终坚持“立足香港，面向世界，服务福州""的企业宗旨,经过30多年的发展壮大,形成了香港-福州双总部的格局。集团在港业务涉及经贸合作、投资发展、融资租赁、招商引资、项目推介等方面。华榕福州总部位于福州市台江区群众东路97号华榕大厦，已逐步构建安保产业、交通服务产业、城市建设产业、投融资产业等四大战略业务。

column2: 新疆禹孚生物技术股份有限公司
column3: 基于血液生物标志物的阿尔茨海默早筛和精准辅助诊断试剂盒开发和产业化项目
column7: 据中国老龄协会发布的《认知症老年人照护服务现状与发展报告》的数据显示，我国60岁及以上老年人中老年痴呆症患者超过1000万，2030年中国痴呆症患者将达到2220万，2050年将达到惊人的2898万。报告中同样指出，在我国，6成患者是在出现明显的老年痴呆的症状后才首次就诊；同时，通过体检和筛查发现问题后明确认知障碍的患者仅占10.06%，因此，现在亟需能精准筛查、诊断阿尔兹海默病的检测方法。 《阿尔茨海默病源性轻度认知障碍诊疗中国专家共识》中指出：β-淀粉样蛋白42（amyloid β-protein 42，Aβ42）、β-淀粉样蛋白40（amyloid β-protein 40，Aβ40）、磷酸化tau蛋白（phosphorylated tau，P-tau）181和217、神经丝轻链（neurofilament light chain，NfL）和胶质纤维酸性蛋白(GFAP)，被证实与脑脊液及PET结果都具有显著相关性，有可能替代脑脊液和影像学检查。目前这些指标都已被纳入AD研究标准ATN框架中。 新疆禹孚生物技术股份有限公司基于上述文件和研究成果，和国内最顶尖的三甲医院和科研机构合作，一起研发和验证上述阿尔茨海默病(AD)的基于化学发光平台的血液标志物的诊断试剂盒配以专门的算法以给出精准的AD诊断结果，解决行业里的多个痛点 缺乏可靠的血液标志物的诊断试剂盒 现有单分子免疫剂盒成本高，我们使用化学发光平台，建立和Quanterix的SIMOA平台检测能力一致的试剂盒，解决了精准和成本的问题 和顶级院校和医院合作开发的算法，可以用上述的系列指标综合推断疾病情况，解决了单指标的假阴假阳率高的问题 丰富的数据积累和AI模型的应用，不仅满足医院临床使用。可同时满足社区筛查，相关疾病保险设计，员工健康福利等多个赛道。
